{se} {badri}

seldutsinso

lujvo
s_2 is the angle/arccosine of cosine s_1.
Cf. {sinso}, {tanjo}, {dutsinso}, {selsinso}, {seltanjo}.

seldu'u

lujvo
x_1 stresses x_2.
Cf. {dukri'a}.

seldzu

lujvo
x_2=c_1 walks/strides/paces on surface x_1=c_2 using limbs x_3=c_3.
{se} {cadzu}

sele'a

cmavo-compound
BAI*
klesi modal, 2nd place as a category of/within ...

selfa'a

lujvo
x_1 is oriented/directed/pointing towards x_2 in frame of reference x_3.
See also {farna}

selfai

lujvo
f_2 shares f_1 with portions f_3.
Cf. {fatri}, {simxu}, {ponse}.

selfamti

lujvo
x_1 is an niece/nephew of x_2 by bond/tie x_3.
See {famti}, {tunba}, {tixnu}, {bruna}.

selfa'o

lujvo
f_2 terminates/ceases/stops/halts at f_1.
from ma'oste

selfargau

lujvo
x1=g1 aims x2=f2 at x3=f1

selfazyfe'u

lujvo
x1=fa2=fe1 is irate from x2=fa1=fe2's annoyances

selfityjbu

lujvo
j_1 is an altar for offering f_2 to f_3.

selfri

lujvo
x_1 is an event/experience happening to x_2.

selfu

gismu
-sef-
-se'u-
x_1 (agent) serves x_2 with service x_3 (activity); x_1 is a servant (noun) of x_2 performing x_3.
See also {sidju}, {sarji}, {gunka}.

selfu'a

lujvo
f_2 is dependant on luck/fortune for f_1=z_2 (event/property).
Cf. {funca}, {zanselfu'a}.

selgi'a

lujvo
g_2 follows (acts in accordance to) g_1 (person/object/event) in/at g_3 (event).
Cf. {gidva}, {ctuca}.

selgu'a

lujvo
x_1 is a task/work done by x_2 with goal/objective x_3.
Cf. {gunka}, {gu'agunma}.

selgu'era'a

lujvo
s1=sg1 pertains to country s2=sg2
Cultural gismu replacement for nationalities: From gismu {gugde} and {srana}.

seli'e

cmavo-compound
BAI*
lidne modal, 2nd place preceding ...;leading ... ; non-time sequence.

selja'e

lujvo
x_1 (event) results in x_2 (event)
Possibly synonymous to {banzu}. Proposed rafsi: -se'e- (for paralleling the other causal suffixes). See also {jalge}, {rinka}, {krinu}, {banzu}, {nibli}, {mukti}.

selja'i

lujvo
x_1=j_2 is adorned/decorated by x_2=j_1.
Cf. {jadycau}, {jadypijne}.

seljarki

lujvo
x_1 is a narrow dimension with narrow x_2 with narrowness standard x_3.

seljbejbibakni

lujvo
b_1=ji_1=jb_2 is a springer [female cattle] close to give birth/calving =ji_2=jb_1, of species/breed b_2.

seljbemabru

lujvo
j_2=m_1 is a mammal belonging to the class Theria [supercohort] of species m_2 giving birth to live young j_1.
Subclasses are: eutherians (including the placental mammals) and the metatherians (including the marsupials).

seljda

lujvo
x_1 is a member/adherent of religion x_2 with belief/creed x_3.
Cf. {ceikri}.

seljeftu

lujvo
x_2=j_1 is x_1=j_2 weeks in duration by standard x_3=j_3.
{se} {jeftu}

seljenca

lujvo
x_1=j_2 is shocked/stunned by x_2=j_1.

seljge

lujvo
j_2 (object/jo'u-objects) are entangled/knotted/clumped together with knot/clump j_1.
Cf. {jgena}, {gunma}.

seljibri

lujvo
j_2 is employed for job/employment/vocation (a type of work regularly done for pay) j_1.
From: {jibri}. Cf. {le'ipli}.

selji'i

lujvo
j_2 (du'u) is the opinion of j_1 that is true about subject/issue j_3 on grounds j_4.
Cf. {jinvi}, {sidbo}.

seljimcymivykle

lujvo
k_1=jm_1=ji_3 is a kingdom [biology] of domain [biology] k_2.
For biological cathegory in general (={ji'eske} {klesi}), domain (=?), kingdom (=this definition), phylum (={jicymivykle}), class (={xeljutsi}), order (={veljutsi}), family (={terjutsi}), genus (={seljutsi}), species (={jutsi}).

seljinvi

lujvo
j_2 (du'u) is the opinion of j_1 that is true about subject/issue j_3 on grounds j_4.
Cf. {jinvi}, {sidbo}.

seljmi

lujvo
x_1 is understood by x_2 about subject x_3.

seljmimu'o

lujvo
x_1=j_2=m_1 is grokked by x_2=j_1 about subject x_3=j_3 by standard x_4=m_3
Made from {jimpe} and {mulno}.

seljmina

lujvo
j_2 is an addition by agent j_1 to j_3 with result j_4.
Cf. {jmina}, {kansa}, {zenba}.

selju'i

lujvo
x_1 is paid attention/ attended to by x_2.

seljukpa

lujvo
j_2 is cooked/prepared-for-eating by j_1 according to recipee/method j_3 (process).
Cf. {jukpa}, {bregau}.

seljunri

lujvo
x_1 is regarded seriously by (person) x_2.

selju'o

lujvo
d_2 is knowledge held by d_1 about subject d_3 by epistemology d_4.
Cf. {djuno}, {sanji}, {cilre}.

selka'e

lujvo
k_2 (event/state] [can be done]/[is capable of being done] by k_1 under conditions of k_3 (event/state).
Cf. {kakne},

selkafpu'o

lujvo
p_1 is a quantity of coffee powder, made from source/bean/grain p_2=c_2.
Cf. {se}, {ckafi}, {purmo}.

selkajna

lujvo
x_1 is a supporting object for shelf/counter/bar x_2 for purpose x_3
See also {kajna}.

selkakclu

lujvo
c_1 is/are full of tears wept by k_1 about/for reason k_3 (event/state); c_1 is/are tearful.
Cf. {culno}, {klaku}.

selkarlygau

lujvo
g_1 collars/has a band put on k_2, the collar/band being k_1 made of material k_3.
Cf. {gasnu}, {karli}, {rinju}, {pinfu}, {kavbu}.

selke'a

lujvo
k_2 is hollow with hole/cavity k_1; k_2 is hollow at locus k_1.
Cf. {kevna}.

selke'i

lujvo
x_1 is a pitiable with pity x_2 with reason for pity x_3.

selki'a

lujvo
k_2 is a yell/cry/howl from k_1.
Cf. {krixa}, {camki'a}.

selkla

lujvo
T destination x_1, goes x_2 from x_3 via route x_4 by means x_5.

selklosamseltcana

lujvo
t_2=d_2 is a/the local area network (LAN) that includes nodes t_1=d_1=s_1 whose function/purpose is s_2.
See also: {tolselklosamseltcana}, {samseltcana}.

selklu

lujvo
k_2 is a civilization consisting of culture k_1.
Cf. {natmi}, {cecmu}.

selklucipra

lujvo
x_1=c_1 is a test/shibboleth for determining x_2=k_2=c_3's membership/belonging to culture x_3=k_1=c_2.
cf. {kulnu}, {cipra}. Made by motivation of la bandu.

selkra

lujvo
k_2 originates from k_1.
Cf. {cfari}, {tolcanci}.

selkrili

lujvo
x_1 is a crystal composition with crystal x_2 with crystal structure x_3.

selkrixa

lujvo
k_2 is a yell/cry/howl from k_1.
Cf. {krixa}, {camki'a}.

selku'e

lujvo
k_2 is the interval/gap/area/scope/extent/range across which k_1 ranges/extends/spans/persists/reaches.
Cf. {kuspe}.

selkunti

lujvo
x_1 is a material vacant from container x_2.

selma'e

lujvo
m_2 rides m_1.
Cf. {marce}, {muvdu}, {litru}, {klama}.

selma'ebi'o

lujvo
x_1 embarks on board / gets on vehicle x_2
See also {marce}.

selma'i

lujvo
x_2=m_1 is x_1=m_2 months in duration by standard x_3=m_3.
{se} {masti}

selmansa

lujvo
m_2 is satisfied by m_1 with regard to property (ka)/state m_3.
Cf. {mansa}, {gleki}.

selma'o

lujvo
x_1 is the class of structure word x_2, which means or has function x_3 in language x_4.
x_2 can, for some speakers, take not just cmavo but any word.

selmaxtamca

lujvo
t_1 is a crushed tomato of species/strain t_2.
See also tomato sauce (={tamcysanso}), tomato purée (={tamcrpasata}), tomato paste (={tamcypesxu}), ketchup (={sansrketcu}).

selme'u

lujvo
x_2=m_1 is x_1=m_2 minutes in duration by standard x_3=m_3.
{se} {mentu}

selmi'ecatra

lujvo
c_1=m_2 executes c_2 by method c_3 as ordered by m_1.
Cf. {minde}, {catra}, {sedycaugau}, {nebyka'a}.

selmikce

lujvo
m_2 is a patient, treated by doctor/nurse m_1 for ailment m_3 with cure m_4.
Cf. {mikce}, {selspita}, {kurji}.

selmixrikmi'i

lujvo
x_1=min_1 is a blender/machine for physically combining ingredients/items x_2=mix_2 into mixture x_3=mix_1.
cf. {minji}, {mixre}, {rinka}.

selmlatu

lujvo
x_1 is a cat species with cat x_2.

selmojnoi

lujvo
x_1=n_1 is a memorandum stating facts x_2=m_2 about x_3=m_3=n_2 from author x_4=n_3 to intended audience x_5=n_4=m_1 who should remember x_2 about x_3.
Cf. {morji}, {notci}, {mojgaunoi}, {notci'a}.

selna'a

lujvo
x_2=n_1 is x_1=n_2 years in duration by standard x_3=n_3.
{se} {nanca}

selnai

lujvo
x_1 is a people of nation with nation x_2.

selnei

lujvo
x_1 is liked by x_2.
{se} {nelci}

selne'i

lujvo
x_1 contains/has inside it x_2.

selneimau

lujvo
n_2=z_1 is liked more / preferred over z_2 by n_1 by margin z_4

selni'i

lujvo
n_2 logically follows n_1 under rules/logic system n_3.
Cf. {nibli}, {logji}, {jalge}.

selnu'e

lujvo
n_2 (event/state) is a promise/commitment/assurance/threat n_1 makes to n_3 [beneficiary/victim].
derived from ma'oste

selnuti

fu'ivla
x_1 (agent) does x_2 (property) unintentionally
See also {snuti}, {zukte}

selpa'akai

lujvo
p_2=c_1 brings hope.
Cf. {lakne}, {cumki}, {kakne}.

selpa'i

lujvo
x_1 is loved by x_2; x_1 is a loved one/beloved to x_2
See {se} {prami}

selpa'imle

lujvo
x1=p2=m1 is lovely to x2=p1=m2 in aspect x3=m3 by standard x4=m4

selpalci

lujvo
x_1 is a standard of evil x_2.

selpau

lujvo
x_1 has part/consists of x_2
See also {pagbu}.

selpi'i

lujvo
x_1 is a multiplicand with product x_2 with multiplier x_3.

selpinxe

lujvo
x_1 is a beverage, drink liquid refreshment drunk by x_2 from container, source x_3; x_1 is what x_2 drinks, imbibes from x_3
A shortcut of {se} {pinxe}.

selpla

lujvo
x_1 is a plan/program/scheme made/[put together] by planner x_2 for state/process x_3.
Cf. {platu}.

selpli

lujvo
x_1 is used by x_2 for purpose x_3

selplibre

lujvo
x_1 is ready for being used by x_2 for purpose x_3

selplibregau

lujvo
x_1 prepares x_2 for being used by x_3 for purpose x_4

selplijibri

lujvo
x_1=j_1 is an employment of / a job held by x_2=j_2=p_2 who is employed by x_3=p_1 for purpose x_4=p_3.
See also {pilno}, {jibri}.

selplirai

lujvo
x_1 is most used/most useful among x_2 by x_3 for purpose x_4.

selpo'acunmi

lujvo
c_1=s_2 is a quantity of puffed millet from unpuffed millet s_1.

selpo'amarantu

fu'ivla
a_1=s_2 is a quantity of puffed amaranth from unpuffed amaranth s_1.
From (lojban) "se spoja" + (latin) "amaranthus" (genus).

selpo'anuna

fu'ivla
a_1=s_2 is a quantity of puffed nuña bean(s) from unpuffed nuña bean(s) s_1 (Phaseolus vulgaris subsp. nunas).
From (lojban) "se spoja" + (spanish?) "nuña" (Phaseolus vulgaris subsp. nunas). See also nuña bean (={debrnuna}).

selpo'asorgu

lujvo
so_1=sp_2 is a quantity of puffed sorghum from unpuffed sorghum sp_1.

selpo'axruba

lujvo
x_1=s_2 is a quantity of puffed buckwheat from unpuffed buckwheat s_1.

selpo'azmu

lujvo
z_1=s_2 is a quantity of popped popcorn/popping corn from unpopped popcorn/kernels s_1 (Zea mays var. everta).

selpojbavmi

lujvo
b_1=s_2 is a quantity of puffed barley from unpuffed barley s_1.

selpojgru

lujvo
g_1=s_2 is a quantity of puffed grain from unpuffed grain s_1 from plant/species g_2.

selpojmavji

lujvo
m_1=s_2 is a quantity of puffed oat from unpuffed oat s_1.

selpojrismi

lujvo
r_1=s_2 is a quantity of puffed rice from unpuffed rice s_1.
Puffed rice cake (="lo nanba be lo selpojrismi").

selpra

lujvo
c_2 is a product created by c_1 through process c_3.
Cf. {cupra}, {zbasu}, {finti}.

selpraci'e

lujvo
c_1 is an economic system of x_2 (country/area)

selpre

lujvo
p_2 is the personality/persona exhibited by p_1.
x2 can be other than a human. Cf. {seltra}, {selzu'e}.

selpu'a

lujvo
p_2 enjoys p_1 under condition p_3.
Cf. {pluka}, {gleki}.

selratni

lujvo
x_1 is an element with atoms x_2 of isotope x_3.
see also {cmuxu'i}, {xu'icmu}

selrespa

lujvo
x_1 is the species/breed of reptile x_2.

selri'a

lujvo
x_1 is an effect with cause x_2 with causation conditions x_3.

selrigni

lujvo
x_1=r_2 is disgusted by x_2=r_1 under conditions x_3=r_3.

selrirbe'a

lujvo
x_1 is a grandson of x_2.
See also: grandchild (se {riryrirni}).

selrirni

lujvo
x_2=r_1 is a parent of/raises/rears x_1=r_2; x_2=r_1 mentors/acts parental toward child/protege x_1=r_2.
{se} {rirni}

selrirti'u

lujvo
x_1 is a granddaughter of x_2.
See also: grandchild (se {riryrirni}).

selrorci

lujvo
x_2=r_1 engenders/procreates/begets x_1=r_2 with coparent x_3=r_3.
{se} {rorci}; see also {panzi}

selru'eca'a

lujvo
c_1 is an input device controlled/[triggered] by c_3 (agent).
Cf. {teryru'eca'a}.

selsa'a

lujvo
s_2 is a song sung by s_1 to audience s_3.
Cf. {zgike}.

selsagmei

lujvo
x_1 is a song (lyrics, melody etc.as a whole)
As opposed to "{lo} {se} {sanga}" "salsagymei" explicitly describes all the components composing a song

selsai

lujvo
s_2 is a course of meal s_1.
Cf. {sanmi}, {citka}, {cidja}.

selsau

lujvo
x_1 finds x_2 familiar in property x_3

selsa'u

lujvo
x_1 (event) requires / depends on x_2 (event/proposition)
= {se} {sarcu}

selse'u

lujvo
x_1 is served by x_2 with service x_3 (activity).
Does not necessarily imply ownership (even if server is a slave), temporary or otherwise. Cf. {selfu}.

selsi'a

lujvo
s_2 is venerable to s_1.
Cf. {sinma}.

selsi'acau

lujvo
x1=s2=c1 is disgraced/[lacking respect] by x2=s1

selsiclu

lujvo
x_1 (sound, text) is a whistling sound, sibilant produced by x_2
See also {zunsna}

selsinso

lujvo
s_2 is the angle/arcsine of sine s_1.
Cf. {sinso}, {tanjo}, {seltanjo}, {seldutsinso}.

selska

lujvo
x_1 (abstraction) is the color of x_2
See {skari}, {zilska}

selsko

lujvo
x_1 is a cord material with cord x_2.

selsku

lujvo
c_2 is said by c_1 to audience c_3 via expressive medium c_4.

selskutidmulbi'o

lujvo
x_1=b_1=m_1=t_1 finishes reading what is expressed by x_2=c_1=t_2 to x_3=c_3 in medium x_4=c_4=t_3, by completion standard x_5=m_3, under conditions x_6=b_3.
See also {cusku}, {tcidu}, {mulno}, {binxo}.

selsmu

lujvo
s_2 means s_1 to interpreter s_3.

selsmudu'i

lujvo
x_1 is synonymous with / has the same meaning as x_2 for interpreter x_3; x_1 is a synonym of x_2
See {selsmudukti}

selsmudukti

lujvo
x_1 is an antonym of / has polar opposite meaning from x_2 for interpreter x_3
See {selsmudu'i}

selsnada

lujvo
x_1 is an achievement with succeed x_2 with means to success x_3.

selsnapra

lujvo
c_1=s_1 is a speaker/headphones/acoustic transducer producing sound/acoustic energy c_2=s_2 from signal/source c_3.
x_2 is the sound itself (a tone, a song, singing, etc.), x_3 is the source (MP3, vinyl, cassette, 2" tape, etc.).

selsne

lujvo
x_1 is a dream subject with dreamer x_2.

selsni

lujvo
x_1 is the meaning of symbol x_2 as observed by x_3
= {se} {sinxa}. See {smuni}

selsnidu

lujvo
x_2=s_1 is x_1=s_2 seconds in duration by standard x_3=s_3.
{se} {snidu}

selsnu

lujvo
s_2 is the subject of discourse/expression s_1.
Cf. {casnu}, {cusku}.

selsnuti

lujvo
x_1 is a cause/commiter of/ contributor to accident x_2.

selspa

lujvo
x_1 is a plant species with plant x_2.

selspaji

lujvo
x_1=s_2 is surprised/startled by x_2=s_1.

selspoblo

lujvo
b_1=d_2 is a wreck/boat destroyed by event d_1.

selsrustu

lujvo
st_1=sr_2 is a yard/courtyard/quadrangle/cloister, the location of st_2 (object/event), enclosed by sr_1.
Cf. {sruri}, {stuzi}.

selsumji

lujvo
x_1 is the difference x_2 minus x_3; x_1 is the amount that remains in substracting x_3 from x_2.
See also {vu'u}

selsurgau

lujvo
x_1=g_1 [agent] does x_2=g_2=s_2 to relax x_3=s_1; x_1=g_1 relaxes x_3=s_1 by doing x_2=g_2=s_2
cf. {surla}, {gasnu}

selsutra

lujvo
x_1 is done fast by x_2.

seltadni

lujvo
t_2 is the subject studied by t_1.
Cf. {tadni}.

seltagysipna

lujvo
x_1=t_2 snugly sleeps, wrapped in x_2=t_1, which is snug in direction x_3=t_3 at locus x_4=t_4
This does not imply comfort. It simply states that the sleeper is tightly wrapped in what would be assumed to be his/her/its covers. cf. {se}, {tagji}, and {sipna}

seltanjo

lujvo
t_2 is the angle/arctangent of tangent t_1.
Cf. {sinso}, {tanjo}, {selsinso}, {seldutsinso}.

seltarbi

lujvo
x_1 is pregnant with embryo x_2 from father x_3.
Cf. {tarbi}.

seltau

lujvo
x_1 is the modifying part of binary metaphor x_2 with modified part/modificand x_3 giving meaning x_4 in usage/instance x_5
In both English and Lojban, the word {seltau} is the usual way to refer to the left word in a tanru, whereas {tertau} refers to the right word in the tanru.

seltaxygau

lujvo
g_1 boxes t_2 inside t_1.
Cf. {tanxe}, {nenri}.

seltcana

lujvo
t_2 is a network/transport/communication/distribution system with nodes/stations including t_1.
Made from {se} + {tcana}.

seltcasamseltcana

lujvo
tcana_2 is a/the metropolitan area network (MAN) that includes nodes tcana_1=s_1 whose function/purpose is s_2.
See also: {samseltcana}.

seltci

lujvo
x_1=t_2 is the purpose of tool/utensil/resource/instrument/implement x_2=t_1.

seltcu

lujvo
x_1 is needed by x_2 for purpose x_3.

selte'a

lujvo
t_2 (event) frightens/scares/is feared by t_1.
Cf. {terpa}, {terpygau}.

selte'abra

lujvo
b_1=t_2 is huge/enormous/tremendous in property b_2 and feared by b_3=t_1.
{selte'a}+{barda}. See also: {brabra}, {caibra}, {tcebra}, {dukse}, {cimni}, {camganra}.

selte'i

lujvo
x_1 is/are the only one(s) with property x_2 among x_3.
See also {steci}, {po'o}

seltelgau

lujvo
x_1 locks/seals x_2 with lock/seal x_3 with locking mechanism x_4

seltenfa

lujvo
x_1 is an x_3rd root of x_2.
See also {fe'a}

selteptce

lujvo
m_1=t_2 is fearsome/terrifying/horrifying to t1
Cf. {terpa}, {mutce}, {selte'a}, {terpygau}.

selterselxeliumadbro

obsolete fu'ivla
x_1 is a lujvo using ridiculous SE-string x_2, irritating x_3, authored by crazy (probably xorxo) lojbanist x_4

selti'i

lujvo
x_1 is a suggestion made by x_2 to audience x_3
See also {stidi}.

selti'ifla

lujvo
f_1=s_2 is a bill specifying f_2 (state/event) for community f_3 under conditions f_4, proposed/drafted by s_1.
Cf. {flalu}.

seltinynalka'e

lujvo
x_1 is inaudible to x_2 against background/under conditions x_3.

seltivni

lujvo
x_1 is a program televised by x_2 via channel x_3 to television/receiver x_4.

selto'i

lujvo
t_2 (load/force/torque) twists/causes torsion in t_1.
Cf. {torni}.

seltonpabyca'a

lujvo
c_1 is a transmission from rotating shaft t_1 to shaft t_1 actuated by c_3

seltra

lujvo
t_2 (NU) is the conduct behaved by agent t_1 under condition t_3.
Cf. {selfra}, {seltigni}.

seltse

lujvo
x_1 is sat on by x_2.

selvai

lujvo
x_2=v_1 (object/event) is important/significant to x_1=v_2 (person/event) in aspect/for reason x_3=v_3 (nu/ka).
{se} {vajni}

selvanju

lujvo
x_1 is a source fruit of wine x_2.

selvensro

lujvo
s_1 is a/the sales inventory of goods s_2=v_2 sold by v_1 to v_3.
Cf. {vecnu}, {sorcu}, {vencu'u}, {terzbasro}.

selve'u

lujvo
x_1 is sold by x_2 to x_3 for price x_4.

selvi'a

lujvo
x_1 is seen by x_2 under conditions x_3.

selvoi

lujvo
x_1 is a means of flight used by x_2.

selxagri

lujvo
x_1 is a reed of/for wind instrument x_2.

selxai

lujvo
x_1=xr_2 is injured/harmed/damaged by event x_2=xr_1 in property x_3=xr_3 (ka) with injury x_4=xr_4.

selxanka

lujvo
x_2 worries x_1 under condition x_3.
Cf. {xanka}, {raktu}, {nabmi}, {pensi}.

selxanri

lujvo
xa_2 imagines xa_1.
Cf. {xanri}, {pensi}.

selxarkei

lujvo
k_1=x_2 pretends x_1[concept]
c.f. {xanri}, {kelci}.

selxarpau

lujvo
xa_2=p_1 is the imagination of p_2.

selxau

lujvo
x_1 [benefits from]/[is a beneficiary of] x_2 (object/event) according to standard x_3.
Cf. {se}, {xamgu}.

selxa'u

lujvo
xa_2 is a habitat/nest/home/abode with dweller/resident/inhabitant xa_1.

selxei

lujvo
x_1 is hated by x_2.

selxregau

lujvo
x_1=g_1 mixes ingredients/components x_2=m_2 into mixture/mix x_3=m_1.

selxu'aju'a

lujvo
j_1 (text) is a declarative sentence in which proposition j_2=x_2 (du'u) asserts/claims/declares to be true by x_1 in language j_3.

selylacka'e

lujvo
l_2=k_1 is trustworthy for l_1 to bring about/ensure/maintain l_3 under conditions k_3
c.f. {lacri}, {kakne}.

selylerci

lujvo
x_1 is a standard of lateness for x_2.

selyle'u

lujvo
l_2 is an alphabet/character set containing letter l_1 representing l_3.

selyli'a

lujvo
x_1 is left behind by x_2, that leaves by route x_3.
Cf. {cliva}

selyli'e

lujvo
l_2 follows l_1 in sequence l_3.
Cf. {lidne}, {porsi}.

selyli'erafsi

lujvo
x_1=r_1=l_1 is a suffix for word/concept x_2=r_2=l_2, form/properties x_3=r_3, language x_4=r_4
Cf. {li'enrafsi}, {rafsi}, {valsi}, {lujvo}, {pagbu}

selylispre

lujvo
x_1 is a character in story x_2
May or may not be fictional. See {lisri}, {prenu}, {protagonista}, {ralselylispre}

selzarkai

lujvo
c_1=z_2 is laudable to observer z_1.
Cf. {zanru}, {xamgu}.

selzau'inda

fu'ivla
x_1 is acceptable (worthy of approval) to x_2
Cf. {zanru}, {inda}, {e'akne}

selzaumi'o

lujvo
m_1=z_2 is popular among mass m_2=z_1.
Cf. {zmadu}, {misno}, {sopselnei}.

selzdi

lujvo
x_1 is amused with x_2 due to amusing property x_3.

selzgarivyka'e

lujvo
x_1=k_1=r_1=z_2 is a cryptic organism/stealth object/having the ability to avoid observation/detection by x_2=z_1=r_2=k_2 via senses/means (observer) x_3=z_3 through action/state x_4=r_3 (event) under conditions x_5=z_4=k_3.
x4 methods include camouflage (={ticta'u}), nocturnality (={ctenalcando}), subterranean lifestyle (={tumsfeni'a}), transparency (={klina}), and mimicry.

selzgi

lujvo
x_1 produces/performs music x_2.

selzgigau

lujvo
g_1 makes that z_2 plays z_1; x_1 plays on x_2 music x_3.

selzi'e

lujvo
z_2 (event/state) is done freely by z_1 under conditions z_3.
Cf. {zifre}, {terzi'e}, {zi'ezva}, {nunzi'e}.

selziltercla

lujvo
x_2 is the longest direction of x_1.
Does not however assert that the x1 is long in that direction.

sema'e

cmavo-compound
BAI*
marji modal, 2nd place made of material/composition ...

sema'i

cmavo-compound
BAI*
manri modal, 2nd place (of reference) as a reference standard for observing ...

semau

cmavo-compound
BAI*
zmadu modal, 2nd place (relative!) more than ...; usually a sumti modifier.

semaunai

cmavo-compound
BAI*
zmadu modal, 2nd place (relative!) not more than ...; usually a sumti modifier.

seme'a

cmavo-compound
BAI*
mleca modal, 2nd place (relative!) less than ...; usually a sumti modifier.

seme'anai

cmavo-compound
BAI*
mleca modal, 2nd place (relative!) not less than ...; usually a sumti modifier.

seme'e

cmavo-compound
BAI*
cmene modal, 2nd place (the named one) as a name for ...

semto

gismu
-sme-
x_1 reflects Semitic [metaphor: Middle-Eastern] language/culture/nationality in aspect x_2.
Semitic includes Arabic, Hebrew, Aramaic, and Ethiopian, among others. See also {xrabo}.

semu'i

cmavo-compound
BAI*
mukti modal, 2nd place motive therefore ...; motivating action ...

semu'inai

cmavo-compound
BAI*
mukti modal, 2nd place motive nevertheless ...

semu'u

cmavo-compound
BAI*
mupli modal, 2nd place as an example of property ...

senci

gismu
-sec-
x_1 sneezes (intransitive verb).
See also {bilma}, {kafke}.

sene'i

cmavo-compound
FAhA3
location tense relation/direction; containing / enclosing...
See {ne'i}, {vasru}, {nenri}

sengi

experimental gismu
x_1 is an elephant shrew/jumping shrew/sengi (member of Afrotherian mammal order: Macroscelidea) of subtaxon/type/genus/species/variety/breed x_2
Does not include shrews, nor rabbits/pikas. Rodents (including rats and mice) are in a completely different order of mammals (although they belong to the same infraclass) and therefore cannot be appropriately referred to by this word. See also: {carfu}, {ratcu}, {smacu}, {ractu}.

seni'i

cmavo-compound
BAI*
nibli modal, 2nd place entails therefore ...

seni'inai

cmavo-compound
BAI*
nibli modal, 2nd place entails nevertheless ...

senki'u

lujvo
x_1=k_1 justifies x_2=s_1's doubt/skepticism toward x_3=s_2 (du'u).
cf. {senpi}, {krinu}.

senpi

gismu
-sen-
x_1 doubts/is dubious/doubtful/skeptical/questions that x_2 (du'u) is true.
Also: x_2 is doubtful/dubious/questionable (= {selsenpi} for reordered places). See also {jinvi}, {krici}, {djuno}, {birti}.

senta

gismu
-set-
x_1 is a layer/stratum [shape/form] of x_2 [material] within structure/continuum/composite x_3.
See also {flecu}, {nenri}, {rirxe}, {sepli}, {snuji}, {jbini}, {bitmu}, {sruri}, {serti}.

senva

gismu
-sev-
-sne-
x_1 dreams about/that x_2 (fact/idea/event/state); x_2 is a dream/reverie of x_1.
Dream/reverie (= {selsne}). See also {sipna}, {xanri}.

se'o

cmavo
UI2
evidential: I know by internal experience (dream, vision, or personal revelation).
See also {senva}.

se'o'e

experimental cmavo
SE
elliptical/generic/unspecific/vague selbri conversion
Basically says 'in some (id est: at least one) ordering/permutation, these arguments and this selbri make sense [and I claim the produced sentence]'. The ordering may be complicated, or it could even be the case that multiple orderings work. Can be useful for when one does not quite remember or care about the exact definition of a brivla, including in sumti; can also be useful when the conversion is particularly complicated, when a desired terbri has a large index, or when multiple conversions are true; it is an allowed, if unhelpful, response to {se'u'o}.

sepa'a

cmavo-compound
BAI*
panra modal, 2nd place similarly; similar to ...

sepa'u

cmavo-compound
BAI*
pagbu modal, 2nd place (whole) partially; as a part of ...

sepcau

lujvo
s_1 is immediately next to x_2.
Cf. {sepli}, {claxu}, {temsepcau}, {zi}, {vi}, {lamji}.

sepi'o

cmavo-compound
BAI*
pilno modal, 2nd place (instrumental) tool/machine/apparatus/acting entity; using (tool) ...

sepli

gismu
-sep-
-sei-
x_1 is apart/separate from x_2, separated by partition/wall/gap/interval/separating medium x_3.
Also aloof (= {jiksei}); alone (= {rolsmisei} meaning apart or unlike all others of its kind; {pavysei}, {seirpavmei} meaning "only" or "one alone" - do not use when talking about, for example, two people who are alone); x_3 space. See also {bitmu}, {snuji}, {senta}, {fendi}, {curve}, {jinsa}, {bitmu}, {marbi}.

sepo'i

cmavo-compound
BAI*
porsi modal, 2nd place sequentially; sequenced by rules ...
"Under (total) ordering"

sepu'a

cmavo-compound
BAI*
pluka modal, 2nd place (for) pleasingly; pleasing ...; in order to please ...

sepu'e

cmavo-compound
BAI*
pruce modal, 2nd place (inputs) processing from inputs ...

sera'a

cmavo-compound
BAI*
srana modal, 2nd place (pertaining to) relevantly; concerning ... (less specific).

serai

cmavo-compound
BAI*
traji modal, 2nd place (property) -est; most extremely; superlative in ...

sera'i

cmavo-compound
BAI*
krasi modal, 2nd place originally; as an origin/starting point of ...

seri'a

cmavo-compound
BAI*
rinka modal, 2nd place (phys./mental) causal therefore ...

seri'anai

cmavo-compound
BAI*
rinka modal, 2nd place (phys./mental) causal nevertheless ...

seri'i

cmavo-compound
BAI*
lifri modal, 2nd place experiencing ...; undergoing ...

serlaxi

fu'ivla
x_1 is a shark of type/species x_2
See {finpe}. Syn. {serlaximorfa}

serlaximorfa

fu'ivla
s_1 is a shark of species s_2.
See also {finpe}.

serti

gismu
-ser-
x_1 are stairs/stairway/steps for climbing structure x_2 with steps x_3.
See also {stapa}, {loldi}, {senta}.

sesau

cmavo-compound
BAI*
sarcu modal, 2nd place (process) necessarily; necessary for ...

sesi'u

cmavo-compound
BAI*
sidju modal, 2nd place assisting ... (in doing/maintaining something).

sesre

experimental gismu
x_1 reflects USSR (Soviet Union)/Soviet culture/Soviet nationality in aspect x_2
{softo} doesn't mean Soviet ! Besides, some modern Russians hate Soviet period of their country. What is more, Russian Empire, USSR and Russian Federation are three different countries and CIS is not a country at all. Cf. {softo}, {rusko}, {vukro}, {slovo}, {gugdesu'u}, {soviet}.

setai

cmavo-compound
BAI*
tamsmi modal, 2nd place similarly; resembling ... (in ideal form).
{tamsmi} is x_1 resembles x_2 sharing ideal form/shape x_3 in property x_4

seta'i

cmavo-compound
BAI*
tadji modal, 2nd place methodically; as a method for doing ...

setca

gismu
-se'a-
x_1 (agent) inserts/interposes/puts/deposits x_2 into interior x_3/into among/between members of x_3.
Insertion need not imply a significant degree of 'filling'; inject (= {je'erse'a}); syringe/needle (= {se'arterje'e}, {je'erse'atci}, {jestu'u} or {tu'urjesni}); also pour, inflate, stuff, fill. See also {rinci}, {tisna}, {punji}, {jbini}, {nenri}, {jmina}, {culno}, {kunti}, {catlu}.

setese

cmavo-compound
SE*
complicated selbri conversion: exchange x2 and x3
Equivalent to {tesete}.

seti'i

cmavo-compound
BAI*
stidi modal, 2nd place suggestively; suggesting (idea/action) ...

seti'u

cmavo-compound
BAI*
tcika modal, 2nd place (for letters) at the same time as ... ; label with event.

setmice

fu'ivla
x_1 is a set (mathematical) consisting of elements x_2, x_3, x_4, etc.
See {setmima}, {ce}, {porsice}, {gunmace}, {menrece}

setmima

fu'ivla
x_1 is a mathematical set, containing members x_2
To be only used for sets in the mathematically defined sense. See {cmima}, {lu'i}

setpistabno

lujvo
s_1=p_2=t_1 is a quantity of/contains/is made of graphene.
See also: graphite (={pistabno}).

setu'i

cmavo-compound
BAI*
stuzi modal, 2nd place as a location of ...

se'u

cmavo
SEhU
elidable terminator: end discursive bridi or mathematical precedence;usually elidable.

se'u'o

experimental cmavo
SE
selbri conversion question
Asks for the SE word that is intended (or at least makes the sentence true). Subscript a set of numbers that represent the order of terbri in question; the subscripted set can be a set of ordered or unordered tuples, specifying exactly which terbri may be exchanged. 'la .ralf. se'u'o xi li re ce li ci pi'u li re cebo li ci klama by boi cy' = 'Did Ralph come to B from C or to C from B?' (notably, 'Did B come to Ralph from C?' is not a possible option for answering the question). An answer is a SE string that is allowed by the selbri and by the subscripts; continuing the example, if the response is 'Ralph went to C from B', one would respond with '.i {setese}'. Any SE word works for the general question possibility (which is the unrestricted/non-subscripted case). Essentially 'se'u'o xi sy' is equivalent to 'se xi li xo poi ke'a cmima sy' (where '{te}' is basically understood as ' se xi li jo'i pa boi ci te'u ', etc.), but the answer can be a complicated ordered sequence/string of SE words; this word complements specifically {fi'a} in the typical/same way that SE complements FA. Typically, leaving the subscripted set vague or not completely free of every possible semantic or syntactic pathology is perfectly fine; syntax and practicality will typically restrict it enough for reasonable responses to be made. See also: {re'au'e} (which alone would be used in answering that 'Ralph goes to B from C' in the previous question).

seva'o

cmavo-compound
BAI*
vanbi modal, 2nd place (environment) as conditions/environment of/for ...

seva'u

cmavo-compound
BAI*
xamgu modal, 2nd place beneficiary case tag for the benefit of...; with beneficiary ...

sevzi

gismu
-sez-
-se'i-
x_1 is a self/ego/id/identity-image of x_2.
See also cmavo list {mi}, {prenu}, {menli}, {jgira}.

sexmti

fu'ivla
x_1 is the Double Crown of Ancient Egypt
"sy xy my" is a common word in hieroglyphics that is used to denote power; sekhemti is thus the name for one of the most prominent symbols of absolute/divine power in their culture.

sezau

cmavo-compound
BAI*
zanru modal, 2nd place approvingly; approving ...

sezbanzu

lujvo
x_1 is self-sufficient/independent for purpose x_2 under conditions x_3.
See also {sevzi}, {banzu}, {se'a}

sezgalgau

lujvo
gas_1=s_1 raises/elevates it/his/her self by in frame of reference gal_2 as compared with standard/baseline gal_3.
Cf. {sevzi}, {galtu}, {gasnu}.

sezga'o

lujvo
x_1=s_2=g_2 is autistic/Aspergian, unable to understand social behavior x_2=g_3.

sezgle

lujvo
g_1=s_2 masturbates/has sex without partner(s).
Does not include masturbating others. Cf. {xangle}, {xanse'agle}, {gletci}, {runpinji}, {desmi'i}.

sezlacri

lujvo
x_1 is self-confident; x_1 relie/trust themselves to bring about/ensure/maintain x_2 (event/state)

sezlacydu'e

lujvo
d_1 is overconfidence [in s_1=l_2] by s_2=l_1 to bring about/ensure/maintain l_3 by standard d_3
sevzi lacri dukse

sezlu'i

lujvo
x_1 washes his/her/em/itself of dirt/contaminant x_2 in/with cleaning material(s) x_3.
cf. {sevzi}, {lumci}.

sezmarde

lujvo
x_1 is the conscience of x_2 (ind./mass) about situation x_3.
See {sevzi}, {marde}

sezmlugau

lujvo
g_1=se_2 pretends to have property(ies) si_2 to observer si_3 under conditions si_4
c.f. {sevzi} {simlu} {gasnu} {selxarkei}.

sezna'e

lujvo
x_1 (du'u) is a paradox / self-contradictory under rules/logic x_2

seznafmlu

lujvo
x_1 (du'u) seems/appears to be a paradox / self-contradictory under rules/logic x_2 to observer x_3

sezni'i

lujvo
x_1 is a tautology under rules/logic system x_2
Synonymous with {kutyje'u}. See also {nibli}.

sezreispu

lujvo
x_1=se_2=p_3=sp_1 answers one's own question about subject x_2=p_2.
{sevzi} {preti} {spuda}

sezre'o

lujvo
r_1=s_2 throws/launches/casts/hurls oneself to/at/in direction r_3.
Cf. {sevzi}, {renro}.

sezu'e

cmavo-compound
BAI*
zukte modal, 2nd place purposefully; goalfully acting at ...

sezybitygau

lujvo
x_1 assures themselves / makes themselves certain that x_2 (du'u) is true about subject x_3

sezycancydji

lujvo
d1 desires/wants/wishes vanishing/disappearance of them self for reason d3; d1 wants to disappear.
Possibly, but not limited to, suicidal.

sezycatra

lujvo
x_1 commits suicide / kills him/herself by method x_2.

sezycatrydji

lujvo
d1 desires/wants/wishes to die for reason d3; d1 is suicidal.

sezyci'i

lujvo
c_1 is self-interested.

sezycitri

lujvo
c_1 is the autobiography of s_2=c_2=c_3.

sezyfanta

lujvo
f_1=s_2 exercises/show self-restraint
from {sevzi} {fanta} c.f. {nunsezyfanta}

sezyjgidu'e

lujvo
j_1=s_2 is conceited by standard d_3
from {sevzi} {jgira} {dukse}

sezyse'u

lujvo
x_1=sel_1=sev_2 is selfish/self-serving/egotistical in regard to activity x_2=sel_3. x_1=sel_1=sev_2 is an egotist.

sezyskinoi

lujvo
n_1 is an autobiography/resumé/home page of n_2=n_3, intended for n_4.
Cf. {skicu}, {notci}, {skami}, {samseltcana}, {ueb}

sezyskivla

lujvo
x_1 is an autonym (word that describes itself) meaning x_2 in language x_3
Lojban examples: {gismu}, {cimjvo}, {u'ivla}. See {sevzi}, {skicu}, {valsi}

sezysku

lujvo
s_1=c_1 says c_2 to itself.

sezyta'a

lujvo
x_1 talks to himself/herself/themselves about x_2 in language x_3
See also {tavla}.

sezytoltro

lujvo
j_1=s_2 is out of control/temper of/with regard to j_3 (activity/event/performance).
Cf. {to'e}, {sevzi}, {jitro}, {se'itro}, {tolse'itro}, {fenki}, {fengu}.

sezyxra

lujvo
x_1 is an autoportrait/selfie of/depicting x_2, in medium x_3.
This lujvo essentially just merges the x2 and x3 of {pixra}.

sezyze'a

lujvo
s_1=z_1 improves itself/is self-improving/augmenting/increasing in property/quantity z_2 by amount z_3.
From {sevzi} + {zenba}. Dropped s2 place, as is common for sevzi lujvo.

sfaile

fu'ivla
x_1 is a file consisting of information x_2 with attributes/type/size x_3.
The example “sfaile fi lo pixra” translates to “image file”. The example “sfaile lo lisri ty xy ty translates to “file of type ‘txt’” or “text file”.

sfailrpidife

fu'ivla
x_1 is a PDF file containing x_2

sfane'u

lujvo
n_1=s_1 (agent) punishes n_2=s_2 [recipient] for atypical infraction n_3=s_3 (event/state/action) with punishment n_4=s_4.
Notes: The main difference to {sfasa} is that the infraction must be atypical. See also {malne'u}, {cnemu}.

sfani

gismu
x_1 is a fly [a small non-stinging flying insect] of species/breed x_2.
See also {cinki}, {bifce}.

sfasa

gismu
-sfa-
x_1 (agent) punishes x_2 for infraction x_3 (event/state/action) with punishment x_4 (event/state).
Also chastise, castigate, chasten, discipline, correct (one sense); also x_4 penalty. See also {cnemu}, {pleji}, {venfu}, {zekri}, {canja}, {dunda}, {jdima}, {jerna}, {kargu}, {prali}, {dapma}, {cirko}, {jinga}.

sfecmaci

lujvo
x_1=c_1 is topology of type/describing x_2=c_2.

sfe'ero

fu'ivla
x_1 reflects Swedish culture/nationality/language in aspect x_2

sferies

obsolete cmevla
Sweden.

-sfo-
