See also {nilce}.

sfubu

gismu
-sub-
-su'u-
x_1 dives/swoops [manner of controlled falling] to x_2 from x_3.
See also {farlu}

sfumabru

lujvo
x_1 is an ungulate of order/family/species x_2.
see {bakni},{xirma}, {lanme}, {kanba}, {xarju}

sfumatura

fu'ivla
x_1 is a shade, tint, dye, variety of x_2
Usually x_2 is a color. See also {versiio}, {nu'ansa}

sfu'utu

fu'ivla
x_1 is measured in x_2 (default 1) feet (US customary unit)
See {zmaile}, {iarda}, {inci}, {gutci}

si

cmavo
SI
erase the last Lojban word, treating non-Lojban text as a single word.

si'a

cmavo
UI3b
discursive: similarly.
See also {simsa}, {panra}.

si'ai

experimental cmavo
UI
marks a construct as being a reference/allusion - explicit marker of divorce/isolation of a construct from any external allusions that may come to mind
The subject of the allusion may be general cultural knowledge or to another utterance, especially in the same work/text/speech. There is an intent by the utterer to bring to mind somewhat external pieces of knowledge that are somewhat similar or relate to the marked construct in some (unspecified) manner. The audience is expected to understand but need not actually be able to do so. The subject of the allusion can be included via, for example, a {to}-{toi} construct. The allusion can be an exact or nearly-exact quotation or can be more loose/vague; the intensity of the marker will give some indication to this. The negation of this word marks a construct as standing on its own, independent and isolated/divorced from any potential allusions that may inadvertently arise. This is a rhetorical device. See also: {sitna}, {simsa}, {pau'ai}.

si'akro

lujvo
x_1 respectfully bows to x_2

si'artersla

lujvo
sl_3 is an ceremony/celebration for recognizing/honoring si_2 (object of esteem) with participants sl_1=si_1.
Cf. {sinma}, {salci}, {tersla}, {jmaji}, {jikca}.

si'arxai

lujvo
x_1 (event) hurts/damages the respect/high regard/esteem for x_2=s_2 held by by s_1 with result x_4 (state).
Cf. {sinma}, {xrani}.

si'astu

lujvo
st_1 is a place of honor/[shrine/podium/wall area/trophy case] for person/thing/[event] st_2=si_2 venerated/honored by si_1
c.f. {sinma} {stuzi} {tsina}.

si'au

experimental cmavo
UI2
evidential: it seems that...

sibli

experimental gismu
x_1 is a hissing sound
See {bacru}, {cusku}, {sanga}, {cladu}, {since}

sibrplatono

fu'ivla
x_1 is Platonic/a Platonistic ideal/philosophy about topic x_2 characterized by thoughts/ideals x_3 and methodology x_4, according to thinker/user/standard x_5.

sibvidru

lujvo
v_1 is an idea-carrying virus / meme / self-propagating idea capable of infecting / currently infecting v_3=s_3 with idea / concept / belief / opinion s_1 about thing / topic / subject s_2.
{vidru} place 2 is dropped due to redundancy with {sidbo}. Made of {sidbo} + {vidru}.

sibypei

lujvo
x_1 (agent) thinks idea x_2 (si'o abstract) about subject x_3
= {to'ai} {sidbo}

sicfi'ocinfo

lujvo
z_1=c_1 is a West African lion [Panthera leo senegalensis] of breed c_2.

sicko'o

lujvo
s_1 reflects Irish culture/nationality/language in aspect s_2.

siclu

gismu
-sil-
x_1 [sound source] whistles/makes whistling sound/note/tone/melody x_2.
See also {sance}, {tonga}, {sanga}, {zgike}, {savru}.

sicni

gismu
-si'i-
x_1 is a coin/token/is specie issued by x_2 having value x_3 of composition including x_4.
See also {fepni}, {jdini}, {rupnu}.

sicpi

experimental gismu
x_1 is rain of composition including x_2.
Cf. {bratu}, {snime}, {carvi}.

sidbo

gismu
-sib-
-si'o-
x_1 (idea abstract) is an idea/concept/thought about x_2 (object/abstract) by thinker x_3.
Also (adjective:) x_1 is ideal/ideational. See also {ciksi}, {jijnu}, {mucti}, {jinvi}, {nabmi}, {pensi}, {xanri}, cmavo list {si'o}.

sidju

gismu
-dju-
x_1 helps/assists/aids object/person x_2 do/achieve/maintain event/activity x_3.
See also cmavo list {si'u}, {rirni}, {sarji}, {vipsi}, {ferti}, {selfu}.

sidmeme

fu'ivla
x_1 is a meme
srana fa zo {sibvidru}

sidysmu

lujvo
x_1 is a figurative/metaphorical/non-literal meaning/interpretation of x_2 recognized/seen/accepted by x_3 .
See also {stidi}, {smuni}, {pe'a}

si'e

cmavo
MOI
convert number to portion selbri; x_1 is an (n)th portion of mass/totality x_2; (cf. gunma).

si'ecna

lujvo
c_1 is a snow shovel.

si'erboi

lujvo
s_1=b_1 is a snowball.

si'ercarvi

lujvo
c_1=s_1 snows to c_2 from c_3.
See also: “{snime}” (for the snow as a mass).

si'erdi'u

lujvo
d_1 is an igloo for purpose d_2.
Cf. {boldi'u}, {zdani}.

si'erjoijaucarvi

lujvo
c_1=s_1=d_1 sleets [rain with snow] to c_2 from c_3.
See also: “{si'ercarvi}” (to snow), “{jaurcarvi}” (to rain (water))

si'ermatryma'e

lujvo
m_1 is a snowmobile/snow scooter carrying m_2 on snow m_3, propelled by force m_4.

si'erta'o

lujvo
t_1=s_1 is a snowboard of material/property t_2.
From {tanbo}, {snime}. See also {xilta'o}.

si'exra

lujvo
p_1=s_1 is a snow sculpture/statue/[work of art made from snow] representing/depicting/showing p_2 made by artist p_3.
See also: {remkemsi'exra}.

sifnaptera

fu'ivla
x_1 is a flea of species x_2.
Cf. {cinki}, {blusfani}, {civla}, {gerku}.

sigja

gismu
-sig-
x_1 is a cigar/cigarette/cigarillo made from tobacco/smokable substance x_2 by x_3.
See also {danmo}, {jelca}, {tanko}, {marna}.

sigma

experimental gismu
x_1 is the standard variation of/in data set/distribution x_2; x_1 is the quantified (in)accuracy of the results x_2 given by some observation or measurement (procedure), calculated from/by standard x_3
Technically, there really is only one possible standard deviation, but in practice, it is often approximate via some means x3 (such as assuming that the distribution is Gaussian, even if it actually is only a finite data sample x2).

sigva'u

lujvo
v_1 is a cigarette/cigar smoker; v_1 smokes cigarettes/cigars.
Cf. {sigja}, {vasxu}. See also {tankyva'u}, {damva'u}, {marnyva'u}.

sigyple

lujvo
p_1 is a / is a quantity of rolling paper from source p_2.
Cf. {sigyplebo'o}, {sigja}, {pelji}.

sigyplebo'o

lujvo
p_1 is a piece of rolling paper from source p_2.
Cf. {sigyple}, {boxfo}.

si'i

cmavo
VUhU4
trinary mathematical operator: [sigma summation of a using variable b over range c].

si'impetotki

fu'ivla
x_1 (value, state, form) is the asymptote/limit [Calculus sense] of x_2 as independent variable x_3 tends toward x_4 along path x_5
x1 is asymptotic (one sense); x2 is asymptotic (different sense). Although usually used in English when an extreme value is involved (in either x1 or x4) the Lojban usage can probably be pretty general and mean "limit along a path"; in this usage, delete x5 for "limit" in the stronger sense.

si'irja'i

lujvo
j_1=s_1 is a medaillion (decorative coin) which decorates j_2.
Note the focus is on the decorative aspect. For “medal” in the sense of “award”, see {si'irvelne'u}.

si'irvelne'u

lujvo
s_1=c_1 is a medal for c_2 given for atypical c_3 (event/property) by c_4.
As in {cnemu}, a positive/negative connotation is not implied. See also: {ve}.

si'irzbaprali

lujvo
p_1 is seigniorage earned by p_2=z_1 in making coin z_2=s_1

sijypi'e

lujvo
p_1=s_3 ski-jumps to p_2 from p_3 reaching height p_4 propelled by/using ski p_5=s_1.
Cf. {skiji}, {plipe}.

sikta

experimental gismu
x_1 affects x_2 in manner x_3 (nu / ka-of-x_2)
See {rinka}, {gasnu}, {galfi}, {stika}

siktoldi

lujvo
x_1 is a silkmoth/silkworm [probably Bombyx] of species/breed/type x_2
No implication is made about its present life stage; for specific/scientific usage, use {bombiksia}; for the larval/caterpillar/worm form, use {sikykemciftoldi}; for the moth/mature/adult form, use {sikma'ubortoldi}; for the cocoon, use {siktodlanka} or {todbi'olanka}. Since many moths have silken cocoons, in order to reference a member specifically of genus Bombyx, use {bombiksia}.

siktysi'u

lujvo
x_1 (plurality) interacts in manner x_2
Uses experimental gismu {sikta}. See {simxu}, {simsikta}

silka

gismu
-sik-
x_1 is a quantity of/contains/is made of silk produced by x_2.
See also {curnu}, {bukpu}, {cilta}.

silna

gismu
x_1 is a portion/quantity of salt from source x_2, of composition including x_3.
See also {sakta}.

siltci

lujvo
x_1 is a tool-whistle [v].

silxuete

obsolete fu'ivla
x_1 is a silhouette of x_2; x_1 is a representation of the outlines of x_2

simbasti

lujvo
x_1 trades places with x_2 in circumstance x_3.
See also {simxu}, {basti}. Similar in meaning to {basysi'u}, but keeps {basti}'s place structure.

simbasygau

lujvo
x_1 interchanges x_2 and x_3 in circumstance x_4.
See also {simbasti}, {gasnu}

simbi'o

lujvo
x_1 (plural) become mutual in property x_2 (ka).
See also {simxu}, {binxo}, {jorne}, {ckini}, {girzu}.

simda'a

lujvo
x_1 fight [each other] over issue x_2 (abstract).
Cf. {simxu}, {damba}, {da'arsi'u}, {da'asnu}, {dausnu}.

simfoni

fu'ivla
x_1 is symphony number x_2 key x_3 composed by x_4 performed by/at x_5 (event).
Cf. {zgike}, {nolzgi}, {simfoni zei pagbu}, {konceto}, {zgifi'i}.

simfoni zei pagbu

zei-lujvo
p_1 is a movement of symphony number k_3 in key k_4 composed by k_5.
Cf. {simfoni}, {pagbu}, {zgike}, {nolzgi}.

simkarbi

lujvo
x_1 compares x_2 (set/plurality) in property x_3 (ka), determining x_4 (du'u/state)
{simxu} + {karbi}. karbi_2 and karbi_3 are combined into simkarbi_2.

simlu

gismu
-mlu-
x_1 seems/appears to have property(ies) x_2 to observer x_3 under conditions x_4.
Also: x_1 seems like it has x_2 to x_3; suggest belief/observation (= {mlugau}, {mluti'i}); looks like/resembles (= {smimlu}, {mitmlu}). See also {catlu}, {viska}, {simsa}, {zgana}, {ganse}, {jarco}.

simpapybi'o

lujvo
x_1 make up/peace with each other under condition x_2.
Cf. {simxu}, {panpi}, {binxo}, {papsimbi'o}.

simpe'o

lujvo
x_1 are friends [of each other].
Cf. {simxu}, {pendo}.

simsa

gismu
-smi-
x_1 is similar/parallel to x_2 in property/quantity x_3 (ka/ni); x_1 looks/appears like x_2.
Also: x_1 is a likeness/image of x_2; x_1 and x_2 are alike; similarity and parallel differ primarily in emphasis. See also {dunli}, {frica}, {mintu}, {panra}, {simlu}, {vrici}.

simsikta

lujvo
x_1 interacts with x_2 in manner x_3
Uses experimental gismu {sikta}. See {simxu}, {siktysi'u}

simsimu

fu'ivla
x_1 is sesame of species/variety x_2.
syn. {xonxoli}, {jerjelino}

simsumji

lujvo
x_1 is the sum of all of x_2 added together
See also {si'i}, {sujysi'u}

simtermosygau

lujvo
x_1 rubs x_2 together.
Cf. {simxu}, {mosra}, {gasnu}, {termosygau}.

simtu'i

lujvo
x_1 (set) agree with each other that x_2 (proposition) is true about matter x_3
See also {djuno}

simxu

gismu
-sim-
-si'u-
x_1 (set) has members who mutually/reciprocally x_2 (event [x_1 should be reflexive in 1+ sumti]).
Members of x_1 do to each other/one another x_2, and in return do x_2; x_1 (plural set) do the same thing x_2 to each other. See also {kampu}, {mintu}.

since

gismu
x_1 is a snake/serpent of species/breed x_2.
See also {curnu}, {danlu}, {respa}, {vindu}.

sincrboua

fu'ivla
x_1 is a boa of species x_2

sincykaifi'e

lujvo
x_1 is an eel of species x_2.
syn. {angila}

SINgapur

cmevla
Singapore.

sinma

gismu
-si'a-
x_1 esteems/respects/venerates/highly regards x_2 [object of respect].
Also: x_2 is respected/esteemed/celebrated (= {selsi'a} for reordered places). See also {banli}, {censa}, {misno}, {nelci}, {prami}, {salci}, {jgira}.

sinsepalumi

fu'ivla
x1 is a member of genus Synsepalum (flowering plants in the chicle family Sapotaceae) of species/cultivar x2

sinso

gismu
x_1 is the trigonometric sine of angle/arcsine x_2.
See also {tanjo}.

sinsynatis

cmevla
Cincinnati, Ohio, U.S.A.
Entities deriving their name from Cincinnatus such that the name is pronounced with /s/'s and no /k/'s can follow similar Lojbanic translation; in particular, the Society of Cincinnati (after which the city is directly named) and probably the town of Cincinnatus, New York, U.S.A. will follow suit. However, the historic and legendary Roman figure of Cincinnatus should be translated as .{kinkynatys}. (modulo vowel length).

sinxa

gismu
-sni-
x_1 is a sign/symbol/signal representing/referring/signifying/meaning x_2 to observer x_3.
Also: x_1 signifies x_2; (adjective:) x_1 is significant/meaningful/of import; signal an action (= {sniti'i}), connotation (= se {sibyti'isni}, {sibyti'ismu}). See also {lerfu}, {tcita}, {barna}, {mifra}, {smuni}.

sinxrmanji

fu'ivla
x_1 is a manji/swastika symbol representing/meaning x_2 to observer x_3

si'o

cmavo
-siz-
NU
abstractor: idea/concept abstractor; x_1 is x_2's concept of [bridi].

si'oi'e

experimental cmavo
mekso unary operator: the result of the logistic function applied to/at a; 1/(1+\operatorname {e}^(-a)), where \operatorname {e} is the natural base

si'omdu

fu'ivla
x_1 (si'o) is an idea/concept/thought about x_2 (object/abstract) by thinker x_3.
Synonymous with {sidbo}. Added by analogy with {du'umdu}, {li'imdu}, and {su'umdu}. See {nundumu}, {nildumu}, {sumdaiklei}

si'o ze'ei du'u

cmavo-compound
NU*
abstractor: x_1 is x_2's concept of [bridi] (proposition or {kau}-question)
= {lo} {sidbo} {be} {lo} {du'u}. See {si'o}, {ze'ei}, {kau}

si'o ze'ei ka

cmavo-compound
NU*
abstractor: x_1 is x_2's concept of the property [bridi]
= {sidbo} {be} {lo} {ka}. See {si'o}, {ze'ei}

si'o ze'ei nu

cmavo-compound
NU*
abstractor: x_1 is x_2's concept of the event [bridi]
= {sidbo} {be} {lo} {nu}. See {si'o}, {ze'ei}

si'o ze'ei poi'i

cmavo-compound
NU*
abstractor: x_1 is x_2's concept of the object bound to {ke'a} and described by [bridi]
= {lo} {sidbo} {be} {lo} {poi'i}. See {si'o}, {ze'ei}

sipna

gismu
-sip-
x_1 is asleep (adjective); x_1 sleeps/is sleeping.
See also {senva}, {tatpi}, {cikna}, {sanji}.

sipsa'a

lujvo
sa_1 sings lullaby sa_2 to sa_3=si_1.
Cf. {sipna}, {sanga}, {sipselsa'a}.

sipsavgau

lujvo
g_1=s_1 snores.
Cf. {sipna}, {savru}, {gasnu}, {zbisnava'u}.

sipselsa'a

lujvo
sa_2 is a lullaby sung by sa_1 to sa_3=si_1.
Cf. {sipna}, {sanga}, {sipsa'a}.

sipsmacu

lujvo
x_1 is a dormouse of species x_2.

sipta'i

lujvo
t_1=s_1 is sleepy; t_1=s_1 needs/wants sleep.
Cf. {sipna}, {tatpi}, {sipydji}.

siptcu

lujvo
x1=s1=n1 is sleepy for reason x2=n3

sipybi'o

lujvo
b_1 falls asleep under conditions b_3
Also see {sipna}, {binxo}, {cikybi'o}

sipydji

lujvo
d_1=s_1 is drowsy/sleepy.
Cf. {sipna}, {djica}, {tatpi}, {sipta'i}.

sipygai

lujvo
x1=g1 is a blanket

sipyjitri'ufri

lujvo
x_1=l_1=r_1=s_1 experiences sleep paralysis including x_2=l_2 (event/experience)
I.e. becoming aware of muscle atonia (i.e. unability to move, speak or react) of falling asleep (hypnagogic) or awakening (hypnopompic). Often includes terrifying hallucinations (e.g. "night mare"). Cf. {narslutroka'e}, {sajysne}.

sipyva'u

lujvo
x1=s1=v1 snores

sirgazgau

lujvo
x1 (agent) aligns/arranges linearly objects x2 into organized arrangement x3 by rules x4
x3 and x4 are constrained by the linearity of the arrangement, but are not uniquely determined by this property: further specification is needed. Not to be used for happenstance or nonagentive meanest/causes for alignment (such as with syzygy).

sirjga

lujvo
j_1=s_1 is a straight angle (=180° or π radians) [2-dimensional shape/form] from vertex j_2 subtended by lateral [segment] j_3.

sirji

gismu
-sir-
x_1 is straight/direct/line segment/interval between x_2 and x_3; (adjective:) x_1 is linear.
See also {korcu}, {linji}, {kruvi}, {kuspe}.

sirmpetu

fu'ivla
x_1 is the [probably spatial] linear momentum [vector] of x_2 in frame of reference x_3
Three-vector. Technically, the word only implies a linear momentum; spatialness is perhaps implicit but should be specified in tanru for safety. See also: {impetu}, {nejnimpetu}, {cnampetu}, {ocnerta}.

sirsunla

lujvo
x_1 is is a quantity of/made from/consists of fur of animal/species/source x_2.

sirtaki

fu'ivla
x_1 is Sirtaki/Syrtaki (greek dance)

sirxo

gismu
-six-
x_1 reflects Syrian culture/nationality in aspect x_2.
See also {xrabo}.

sirzilganzu

lujvo
x1 (collection/system of objects, generally relative chaos) is/are in alignment/linear arrangement/generalized geometric syzygy/eclipsing configuration/linear set-up, the organization/pattern/result x2 of which is according to rule x3

sisku

gismu
-sis-
x_1 seeks/searches/looks for property x_2 among set x_3 (complete specification of set).
If searching for an object or an event, use tu'a in x_2. See also {cirko}, {kalte}, {kavbu}, {kucli}, {rivbi}, {manci}, {facki}.

sispe'i

lujvo
s_1=p_1 finds s_2=p_2 at/in location p_3.
Cf. {sisku}, {penmi}, {facki}.

sisti

gismu
-sti-
x_1 [agent] ceases/stops/halts/ends activity/process/state x_2 [not necessarily completing it].
See also {fanmo}, {mulno}, {cfari}, {denpa}, {fliba}.

sitna

gismu
-sit-
x_1 cites/quotes/refers to/makes reference to source x_2 for information/statement x_3 (du'u).
See also {krasi}.

sitsku

lujvo
c_1=s_1 cites/quotes c_2=s_3 (sedu'u/text/lu'e concept) to audience c_3 via expressive medium c_4 from source _s2.
Cf. {sitna}, {cusku}.

si'u

cmavo
BAI
sidju modal, 1st place (aiding agent) aided by ...

sivni

gismu
-siv-
x_1 is private/personal/privy/[secret/confidential/confined] to x_2; x_1 is not-public/hidden.
Also: x_1 is secret (one sense); x_2 is in the know/in touch with/privy to x_1 (= {selsivni} for reordered places); exclusion can be expressed by na'e(bo) in x_2: excluded/in the dark (= {nalselsivni}). See also {gubni}, {mipri}.

sivykarni

lujvo
x_1=k_1=s_1 is a private journal/diary with content x_2=k_2 written by x_3=k_3=s_2.

sivypo'eci'e

lujvo
c_1 is capitalism as practiced by p_1=s_2
From {sivni}, {ponse}, {ciste}. Cf. {guntrusi'o}, {fairpaltrusi'o}.

sivytinytci

lujvo
x_1 is an eavesdropping device

sixperli

lujvo
p_1 is a Syrian pear (Pyrus syriaca) [fruit] of variety p_2.

sizrmipmepi

fu'ivla
x_1 is mip-mapping (concept thereof).
See also: {pirnmipmepi}, {puvrmipmepi}.

sizyjvomi'u

lujvo
x_1 is the concept/idea of lujvo-equivalence, as held by x_2
See {si'o}, {jvomi'u}, {sidbo}. Essentially to be used to talk about the concept of {jvomi'u} as a feature of Lojban, and to discuss its advantages and disadvantages.

sizyzilmro

lujvo
x_1 is death/the idea of death according to x_2
Death as a noun that is neither a process/state of being dead (respectively: {puvzilmro}, {sazyzilmro}) nor deathness in the sense of the quality of being dead ({kamymro}) nor of the quality of death ({kamyzilmro}). This is the idea unto itself treated as a universal. See also: {sizyzilpalci}, {sizyzilji'e}, {sizyzilji'efri}

skacau

lujvo
x_1 is colorless to observer x_2
See {skari}, {claxu}

skaci

gismu
x_1 is a skirt/kilt/dress of material x_2; x_1 is skirted [garment open at the bottom; not legged].
A skirted garment may be full length ({pastu}), but must hang below the waist from support above or at the waist. See also {taxfu}, {palku}.

skadu'i

lujvo
x_1 and x_2 are the same color x_3
x_1=skari_1=dunli_1, x_2=skari_1=dunli_2, x_3=skari_2. See {skasmi}

skaip

cmevla
name: Skype (online communication program)
Also "la {skaipe}".

skaipe

fu'ivla
x_1 contacts x_2 by video-telephone/video-chat/teleconference service (product) x_3 provided by (company/producer/provider) x_4
The creation and/or use of this word does not endorse the Skype service provider/company nor any of its products, nor any other provider or product of such services, including but not limited to: teleconference/video-chat. Confer: {vidni}, {tavla}, {fonxa}.

skalduna

fu'ivla
x_1 is Basque in aspect x_2

skalpeli

fu'ivla
x_1 is a scalpel
A small straight knife with a very sharp blade used for surgery, dissection or craftwork. See also {mikce}, {larcu}, {dakfu}

skami

gismu
-sam-
x_1 is a computer for purpose x_2.
See also {kanji}, {minji}, {pensi}.

skapi

gismu
-kap-
x_1 is a pelt/skin/hide/leather from x_2.
See also {pilka}, {calku}, {kerfa}.

skari

gismu
-ska-
x_1 is/appears to be of color/hue x_2 as perceived/seen by x_3 under conditions x_4.
Conditions may include lighting, background, etc.. See also {blanu}, {bunre}, {cicna}, {cinta}, {crino}, {grusi}, {narju}, {nukni}, {pelxu}, {xunre}, {zirpu}, {carmi}, {kandi}, {xekri}, {blabi}.

skaruki

fu'ivla
x_1 is a peafowl/peacock/peahen of species x_2
Synonymous with {skaxruki}. See also {xruki}, {cipni}.

skarxetmele

fu'ivla
x_1 has the color of HTML / RGB hex code x_2
See {skarxuciba}, {zilska}, {skari}, {xetmele}, {dau}, {fei}, {gai}, {jau}, {xei}, {vai}.

skarxuciba

fu'ivla
x_1 has the color with red level x_2, green level x_3, blue level x_4
x_2 to x_4 are either scaled from 0~1, or subjective numbers ({so'u} / {so'i} etc.) See {zilska}, {skari}, {skarxetmele}

skasmi

lujvo
x_1 resembles x_2 in color x_3
x_1=skari_1=simsa_1, x_2=simsa_2, x_3=skari_2=jai-simsa_3. See {skari}, {simsa}, {ganseti}

skaxruki

lujvo
x_1 is a peacock/peahen of species x_2.

skefi'a

lujvo
c_1 is science/technology-oriented science fiction about plot/theme/subject c_2 by author c_3, based on science s_1.
Also known as ``hard science fiction''.

skeku'a

lujvo
x_1=k_1 is a laboratory [room] for studying science x_2=s_2.
Limited to rooms only. For the general workplace, see {skestu}.

skepre

lujvo
p_1 is a scientist pertaining to science s_1 about subfield s_2

skestu

lujvo
x_1=st_1 is a laboratory [workplace for the conduct of scientific research] for studying science x_2=sa_2.

skezu'e

lujvo
z_1 is an engineer in the branch of s_2 based on methodology s_3 with purpose/goal z_3
from {saske} {zukte} c.f. {mi'ircikre}

skicu

gismu
-ski-
x_1 tells about/describes x_2 (object/event/state) to audience x_3 with description x_4 (property).
See also {lisri}, {tavla}.

skicu zei uidje

zei-lujvo
u_1=s_1 is a tooltip describing s_2 to s_3 with description s_4 in user interface u_2.
See {uidje}.

skicyuidje

lujvo
u_1=s_1 is a tooltip describing s_2 to s_3 with description s_4 in user interface u_2.
See {skicu}, {uidje}. Syn. {skicu zei uidje}

skiji

gismu
-sij-
x_1 is a ski/skid/skate/runner for surface (of material) x_2 supporting skier/skater/sled/cargo x_3.
See also {sakli}, {marce}, {cutci}.

skikemckupli

lujvo
x_1=p_1=s_1 uses book x_2=c_1 about/containing x_3=c_2 by author x_4=c_3 for audience x_5=c_4 preserved in medium x_6=c_5 in order to explain x_7=s_2 to x_8=s_3.
cf. {skicu}, {cukta}, {pilno}.

skina

gismu
-kin-
x_1 is a cinema/movie/film about x_2 [plot/theme/subject/activity], filmmaker x_3, for audience x_4.
Also motion picture; x_2 may be a convention rather than a subject; cartoon/animation (= selxraci'a {skina}); television/tv show (= {tivyskina}, regardless of length, factual content, etc.). See also {tivni}, {vidni}, {pixra}, {finti}.

skiueli

fu'ivla
x_1 (quote) is a structured query language (SQL) query for performing x_2, having SQL type/version/flavor x_3.

skogarce'a

lujvo
x_1=c_1 is a bow/crossbow/ballista for shooting ammunition x_2=c_2 [arrow/quarrel/crossbow bolt] by flexing and releasing bow/prod/lath x_3=g_1 of material x_6=g_3, to whose two ends are tied bow string x_4=g_2=s_1 of material x_5=s_2.
To be clear, the launch mechanism is as follows: x_4 is pulled so as to bend x_3, while x_2 is placed on x_4, and x_4 is released, causing x_3 to snap back into its normal shape, launching x_2 as it does so.

skoma'e

lujvo
m_1 is an aerial tramway carrying m_2 in/on lift m_3, propelled by m_4=s_1.
Cf. {marce}, {benji}.

skomberu

fu'ivla
s_1 is a mackerel of species s_2.
Cf. {finpe}, {finprtuna}

sko'opu

fu'ivla
x_1 (text) scopes over x_2 (text)
Mostly used to discuss logical scoping of quantifiers, variables, and such

skorbuti

fu'ivla
x_1 has scurvy with symptoms x_2.
see also {nimre}

skori

gismu
-sko-
x_1 is cord/cable/rope/line/twine/cordage/woven strands of material x_2.
See also {cilta}, {jgena}, {marna}, {bikla}, {linsi}.

skorpiio

fu'ivla
x_1 is a scorpion (arthropod)

skospa

lujvo
x_1 is a vine of genus/species/variety x_2.
see also {vanjba}

skoto

gismu
-kot-
-ko'o-
x_1 reflects Gaelic/Scottish culture/nationality/language in aspect x_2.
Irish (= {sicko'o}), Scottish (= {sunko'o}), Celtic (= {dzeko'o}), Welsh (= {nanko'o}), Breton (= {fasko'o}); since Scottish/Gaelic is only the northern branch of the Celtic tribes, many would prefer a fu'ivla for Celtic; nationalism might also demand a separate fu'ivla for Irish. See also {brito}, {glico}.

skuba

experimental gismu
x_1 is a scuba set

skubancu

lujvo
x_1 is metalinguistic with respect to the expression by x_2 of text x_3 for audience x_4 via medium x_5 .
See also {cusku}, {bancu}, {sei}, {sa'a}

skudji

lujvo
d_1 means/intends to say c_2 to c_3 via medium c_4.

skumi'e

lujvo
m_1=c_1 expresses/states an order to m_2=c_3 for m_3 (event/state) to happen.
Cf. {cusku}, {minde}, {mi'esku}.

skunkua

obsolete fu'ivla
x_1 is a skunk of species x_2

skuro

gismu
-ku'o-
x_1 is a groove/trench/furrow [shape/form] in object/surface x_2.
See also {plixa}.

skuselzu'e

lujvo
x_1 is a speech act, characterized by speaker x_2 uttering text x_3 to listener/audience x_4, for purpose x_5
See {cusku}, {zukte}, {bauske}, {banflese}

skuspu

lujvo
x_1=c_1=s_1 responds to x_2=s_2 by expressing/saying x_3=c_2 to x_4=c_3 via expressive medium x_5=c_4.
cf. {cusku}, {spuda}.

skutadji

lujvo
t_1 is a manner of expression of c_1, saying c_2 to c_3 via medium c_4 under conditions t_3.

skuxai

lujvo
x_1 (agent) insults x_2 with insult x_3 (text / sedu'u)
From {cusku} + {xrani}. See {oi'a}, {cnixai}

slabu

gismu
-sau-
x_1 is old/familiar/well-known to observer x_2 in feature x_3 (ka) by standard x_4.
This can cover both meanings of old. Old in years, i.e. age, can be conveyed through x_2 = the world, life, existence (= loi nu {zasti}); in usage this has been a common default for ellipsis. However slabu is not the opposite of 'young' (= {nalci'o}, {tolci'o}), but the opposite of 'new' (= {tolni'o}); also ancient (= {tcesau}), age (= {nilsau}); x_2 is used to x_1 (= selsau for reordered places); historic/historical (= {cirsau}, {cirselcedra}; also {vaipru}). (cf. {clani}, {citno}, {cnino}, se {djuno}; not the opposite of {citno}, {djuno})

slagei

lujvo
x_1 rejoices/is-joyful in/about x_2 (event/state)

slaka

gismu
x_1 is a syllable in language x_2.
See also {sance}, {valsi}, {bangu}.

slaka bu

bu-letteral
BY*
letteral: Lojban ',' character.

slakypau

lujvo
p_1 is a mora [linguistics]/component of syllable p_2=s_1 in language s_2.
A syllable containing one mora is said to be monomoraic (={pavyslakypau}); a syllable with two morae is said to be bimoraic (={relslakypau}). Also, in rarer cases, a syllable with three morae is said to be trimoraic (={cibyslakypau}).

slakypaucibmei

lujvo
m_1 is trimoraic/is the mass of three morae formed from set of mora m_2 whose n member(s) are m_3=p_1.
See also mora (={slakypau}).

slakypaupavmei

lujvo
m_1 is monomoraic/is the mass of one morae formed from set of morae m_2 whose n member(s) are m_3=p_1.
See also mora (={slakypau})

slakypaurelmei

lujvo
m_1 is dimoraic/is the mass of two morae formed from set of morae m_2 whose n member(s) are m_3=p_1.

slami

gismu
x_1 is a quantity of/contains/is made of acid of composition x_2; (adjective:) x_1 is acidic.
x_2: composition including x_2, which need not be complete specification. See also {slari}, {nimre}.

slamrmiristika

fu'ivla
x_1 is a quantity of/contains/is made of myristic acid.
See also nutmeg butter (={matnrmiristika}).

slamycarvi

lujvo
c_1=s_1 is acid rain raining on/to c_2 from c_3.
Cf. {carvi}, {slami}.

slamystogau

lujvo
g_1 pickles st_1 with acid sl_1
See also: {slami} (vinegar), {jirvi'odja} (pickled food).

slanu

gismu
x_1 is a cylinder [shape/form] of material x_2.
See also {kamju}, {gunro}.

slanydi'u

lujvo
x_1 is a tower for purpose x_2.
Also means "rook" in chess.

slari

gismu
-sar-
x_1 is sour/tart to observer x_2.
See also {slami}, {titla}, {kurki}, {nimre}.

slasi

gismu
-las-
x_1 is a quantity of/is made of/contains plastic/polymer of type/component unit(s) x_2.
See also {rutni}, {boxfo}, {bukpu}.

slemidju

lujvo
x_1 is a nucleus of cell x_2 [default biological].
See also {selci}, {ratmidju}.

slicka

lujvo
s_1=c_1 is a cradle made of c_2, holding c_3, rocking at speed s_2 through positions s_3.
See also {vercka}.

sligau

lujvo
g_1 swings s_1.
Cf. {slilu}, {desku}.

sligu

gismu
-lig-
x_1 is solid, of composition/material including x_2, under conditions x_3.
Conditions include temperature and pressure. See also {runta}, {litki}, {gapci}, {jdari}, {dunja}, {pulce}, {jduli}.

slilu

gismu
-sli-
x_1 oscillates at rate/frequency x_2 through set/sequence-of-states x_3 (complete specification).
Also (expressible either with desku or slilu): side to side, to and from, back and forth, reciprocal (motion), rotates, revolves. See also {dikni}, {rilti}, {morna}, {desku}, {janbe}, {boxna}.

slinkuui

fu'ivla
x_1 is a slinky (toy)
See {kelci}. This word gave a name to "slinku'i test". {kelrslinki} is a synonym

sliri

gismu
x_1 is a quantity of/contains/is made of sulfur/brimstone (S); [metaphor: foul odor, volcanic].
See also {xukmi}, {panci}, {pelxu}.

sliryslami

lujvo
sla_1=sli_1 is a quantity of/contains/is made of sulphuric acid (H2SO4).

slogane

fu'ivla
x_1 (text, entity) is a slogan of x_2 (entity)
See also {sinxa}, {lanci}

sloska

lujvo
x_1 = s_1 is golden/gold-colored when viewed/perceived by x_2 = s_3 under conditions x_3 = s_4.
Cf. {solji}, {skari}, {rijyska}, {ransyska}.

slovensk

cmevla
Slovakia.

slovino

fu'ivla
x_1 is Slovenian/Slovene in aspect x_2.
see also {nanslovo}, {slovo}, {slovako}

slovo

gismu
-lov-
-lo'o-
x_1 reflects Slavic language/culture/ethos in aspect x_2.
See also {softo}, {rusko}, {vukro}.

sluji

gismu
-slu-
x_1 is a/the muscle [body-part] controlling x_2, of body x_3; [metaphor: tools of physical power].
(adjective:) x_1/x_2/x_3 is muscular (different senses). See also {rectu}, {xadni}, {zajba}.

sluni

gismu
x_1 is a quantity of/contains onions/scallions of type/cultivar x_2.
See also {stagi}.

slunrjepsoni

fu'ivla
s_1 is a Jepson's onion (Allium jepsonii) of variety/strain s_2.
Jepson's onion, honoring renowned California botanist Willis Linn Jepson.

slunrkurati

fu'ivla
s_1 is a Kurrat/Egyptian leek (Allium ampeloprasum) of variety/strain s_2.

slunyspa

lujvo
sp_1 is an onion plant (genus Allium) of species/strain sp_2 with onions/scallions sl_1.

sma'acu

fu'ivla
x_1 is a computer mouse (physical object)
Syn. {pevysmacu}. See {samxa'e}

sma'ara

fu'ivla
x_1 experiences ASMR (Autonomous Sensory Meridian Response).
See also {frati}, {tirna}, {viska}, {ganse}, {pluka}, {kufra}.

smac

cmevla
Mouse
Mickey Mouse (=smikis.smac), Minnie Mouse (=sminis.smac)

smacni

lujvo
c_1 is calm about x_2=c_3.
Cf. {caucni}, {seicni}, {sivycni}.

smacrkobaiu

fu'ivla
x_1 is a guinea pig of species x_2.

smacu

gismu
x_1 is a mouse of species/breed x_2.
See also {ratcu}.

smadi

gismu
x_1 guesses/conjectures/surmises x_2 (du'u) is true about subject x_3; [epistemology].
Also: x_1 has a hunch that x_2 is true; x_1 imagines x_2 is true; words usable for epistemology typically have a du'u place. See also {djuno}, {facki}, {jijnu}, {sruma}.

smaji

gismu
-sma-
x_1 (source) is quiet/silent/[still] at observation point x_2 by standard x_3.
See also {kerlo}, {panpi}, {savru}, {tirna}.

smaka

experimental gismu
x_1 feels the taste x_2
See {tasta}, {vrusi}, {ganse}, {palpi}, {viska}

smani

gismu
x_1 is a monkey/ape/simian/baboon/chimpanzee of species/breed x_2.
See also {mabru}, {danlu}.

smanralenopiteku

fu'ivla
x_1 is an Allen's swamp monkey (genus Allenopithecus) of species/breed x_2.

smanrbonobo

fu'ivla
x_1 is a bonobo ape (Pan paniscus) of breed x_2.

smanrcebu

fu'ivla
x_1 is a gracile capuchin monkey (genus Cebus) of species/strain x_2.

smanrgorila

fu'ivla
x_1 is a gorilla ape (genus Gorilla) of species/breed x_2.

smanrmandrilu

fu'ivla
x_1 is a mandrill/drill (genus Mandrillus) of species/strain x_2.

smanroranguta

fu'ivla
x_1 is an orangutang (genus Pongo) of species/strain x_2.

smanrpapio

obsolete fu'ivla
x_1 is a baboon (genus Papio) of species/strain x_2.

smanrsaimiri

fu'ivla
x_1 is a squirrel monkey (genus Saimiri) of species/strain x_2.
The name of the genus Saimiri is of Tupi origin (sai-mirim or gai-mbirin < sai 'monkey' and mirim 'small').

smanrsapaju

fu'ivla
x_1 is a robust capuchin monkey (genus Sapuja) of species/breed x_2.
See also "gracile capuchin monkey" (={smanrcebu}).

smanrtcimpazi

fu'ivla
x_1 is a chimpanzee (Pan troglodytes) of breed x_2.

smanyjinkytoldu'evidru

lujvo
v_1=jt_1=s_1 is SIV [Simian immunodeficiency virus] of jt_2.
From {smani}, {jinkytoldu'e}, {vidru}. s2, v2 and v3 subsumed.

smartefono

fu'ivla
x_1 is a smartphone
See also {skami}, {fonxa}

smasku

lujvo
c_1 whispers c_2=s_1 (sedu'u/text/lu'e concept) to audience c_3 via expressive medium c_4, quietly by standard s_3
Cf. {smaba'u}, {lausku}, {laurba'u}, {mliba'u}, {laurblesku}.

smela

experimental gismu
x_1 is a plum/peach/cherry/apricot/almond/sloe [fruit] (genus Prunus) of species/variety x_2
{zirsmela} for plum, {xunsmela} for cherry, {najysmela} for peach, {pelsmela} for apricot, {ri'orsmela} for almond, {blasmela} for sloe. Cf. {rutrprunu}, {ricrprunu}, {flaume}, {persika}, {rutrceraso}, {birkoku}, {frambesi}, {fragari}, {plise}, {perli}, {rozgu}

smetana

fu'ivla
x_1 is made of/contains/is a quantity of sour cream of composition x_2
See also {kruji}, {ladru}, {matne}.

smidali

fu'ivla
x_1 is semolina made from grain x_2

smilodo

fu'ivla
x_1 is a saber-toothed tiger (extinct genus Smilodon) of species/breed x_2
See {bramlatu}, {cabnalza'i}

smimlu

lujvo
siml_1=sims_1 resembles/looks like/appears to be similar/parallel to sims_2 in property/quantity sims_3 to observer siml_3 under conditions siml_4

smisi'u

lujvo
The members of x_1=simx_1 (set) resemble one another in property x_2=simx_2.
{simsa}1 and simsa2 are merged into {simxu}1, by virtue of simxu's ability to take any 2-way relationship and make it into an n-way relationship (lujvopap.txt); cf. {simsa}, {simxu}, {dunli}, {mintu}, {panra}, ma'oste {du}.

smitra

lujvo
x_1=t_1=s_1 acts like/similarly to x_2=t_2=s_2 in property x_3=s_3 under conditions x_4=t_3.
See also {simsa}, {tarti}.

smoka

gismu
-smo-
x_1 is a sock/stocking [flexible foot and lower leg garment] of material x_2.
See also {cutci}, {taxfu}.

smokrtabi

fu'ivla
x_1 is a tabi of material x_2.
Cf. {smoka}.

smorodina

fu'ivla
x_1 is a currant of species/variety x_2
See {spati}, {jbari}, {grosela}

smucau

lujvo
x_1 is meaningless / nonsense to x_2
Syn. {nonselsmu}

smuci

gismu
-muc-
x_1 is a spoon/scoop (tool) for use x_2, made of material x_3.
See also {dakfu}, {forca}, {tutci}.

smudra

lujvo
x_1=d_1=s_1 is semantically correct in situation/context x_2=d_3, having meaning x_3=s_1 according to interpreter x_4=s_3=d_4.
Cf. {smuni}, {drani}.

smudu'a

lujvo
x_1 defines x_2 to mean x_3.

smudu'i

lujvo
x_1 means the same as/has the same meaning as/is identical in meaning to x_2 to interpreter x_3

smudukti

lujvo
d_1 and d_2=s_2 are antonyms of each other.
Cf. {smuni}, {dukti}.

smugau

lujvo
g_1 refers to s_1 with expression s_2 recognized by s_3.
Cf. {cusku}.

smuni

gismu
-mun-
-smu-
x_1 is a meaning/interpretation of x_2 recognized/seen/accepted by x_3.
Referential meaning (={selsni}, {snismu}). See also {jimpe}, {sinxa}, {valsi}, {tanru}, {gismu}, {lujvo}, {cmavo}, {jufra}.

smuske

lujvo
sa_1 is semantics with methodology sa_3.

smusku

lujvo
x_1 expresses meaning x_2 to addressee/audience x_3 by doing x_4 (property of x_1)
See also {cusku}, {smuni}.

smusu

experimental gismu
x_1 expresses meaning x_2 (du'u/si'o) to addressee/audience x_3 by doing x_4 (property of x_1)
Gismu form of {smusku}. The act (x_4) may or may not be linguistic. Proposed rafsi: -sus-. See also {cusku}, {smuni}, {corci}

smuvanbi

lujvo
v_1 is the context of meaning v_2=s_1 of event/action/object s_2 recognized by s_3.
Cf. {smuni}, {vanbi}, {jimpe}, {sinxa}.

smuvelski

lujvo
x_1 is a description of x_2's meaning
See also {smuni}, {skicu}

smuvrici

lujvo
v_1=s_2 is polysemous/ambiguous/vague, having many meanings including s_1 to observer s_3.
Does not necessarily imply that x_3 has trouble interpreting x_1. Cf. {pavysmu}.

snacku

lujvo
x_1 is an audiobook about x_2

snada

gismu
-sad-
x_1 [agent] succeeds in/achieves/completes/accomplishes x_2 as a result of effort/attempt/try x_3.
Also: x_1 reaches x_2; (adjective:) x_1 is successful; x_2 (event/state/achievement). See also {fliba}, {troci}, {jgira}.

snada'i

lujvo
d_1 knocks on/hits door/object d_2 with instrument [or body-part] d_3 making sound s_1

snadytoi

lujvo
x_1 tries to succeed in x_2

snafu'ivla

lujvo
x_1 is an onomatopoeic word meaning x_2 in language x_3, based on sound x_4 emitted by x_5
Syn. {sa'ei zei valsi}, {onmatopo'eia}. Note: do not be confused by the similarity to {fu'ivla}; {snafu'ivla} does not necessarily indicate a loan word; rather, it refers to copying ({fukpi}) a sound ({sance}).

snanorio

obsolete fu'ivla
x1 pertains to/reflects Sothoryos culture/nationality/geography in aspect x2

snanu

gismu
-nan-
x_1 is to the south/southern side of x_2 according to frame of reference x_3.
See also {berti}, {stuna}, {stici}, {farna}.

snapisa

fu'ivla
x_1 is mustard of species/breed x_2.
Cf. {armoraki}, {kobli}, {cpinytsapi}, {sansrmustardo}, {koblrsinapi}.

snasni

lujvo
x_1 is a sound/acoustic signal, produced/emitted by x_2 and meaning x_3 to x_4 (listener).

snavei

lujvo
v_1 is a sound recording of v_2 (data/facts/du'u) about v_3 on recording medium v_4.

snaveitci

lujvo
t_1 is a microphone for recording sound s_1 produced/emitted by s_2.
Cf. {dicyselsna}, {cukmirvelvei}, {srimakyvelvei}, {cukyku'ovelvei}.

snazga

lujvo
x_1 listens to x_2
Synonymous to {tinju'i}; see also {tirna}, {sance}.

snecrofant

cmevla
morphine
"morphine" is named after the Greek god of dreams, Morpheus, for its tendency to cause sleep.

sneju'e

lujvo
x_1 is a dreamcatcher, passing dreams x_2, stopping dreams x_3, with netting properties x_4.

snicmaci

lujvo
c_1 is an algebra of type/describing c_2
Includes both elementary and abstract algebra. See also {cmaci}, {sinxa}

snicne

lujvo
x_1 is a variable taking value x_2 under conditions x_3.
See also {sinxa}, {cenba}

snidari'a

fu'ivla
x_1 is a jellyfish/jelly/sea jelly/member of phylum Cnidaria of species/breed x_2.
See also {jdufi'e}.

snidu

gismu
-nid-
x_1 is x_2 seconds in duration (default is 1 second) by standard x_3.
See also {cacra}, {junla}, {mentu}, {tcika}, {centi}, {decti}, {dekto}, {femti}, {gigdo}, {gocti}, {gotro}, {kilto}, {megdo}, {mikri}, {milti}, {nanvi}, {petso}, {picti}, {terto}, {xatsi}, {xecto}, {xexso}, {zepti}, {zetro}.

snigau

lujvo
x_1 assigns symbol/variable x_2 to value/referent x_3 for observer x_4.
See also {sinxa}, {gasnu}

snile'u

lujvo
x_1 is an ideogram/symbol in writing system x_2 meaning x_3.
see also {jugle'u}, {misryle'u}

snime

gismu
-si'e-
x_1 is made of/contains/is a quantity/expanse of snow.
See also {bratu}, {carvi}, {bisli}.

snipa

gismu
-nip-
x_1 adheres/sticks to x_2; (adjective:) x_1 is sticky/gummy/adhesive.
Note that x_1 is the adhering surface being claimed; x_2 need not be sticky. See also {tarla}, {viknu}.

snisimsumji

lujvo
x_1 is the sigma summation of expression x_2 with variable x_3 over domain x_4.
See also {si'i}

snisku

lujvo
x_1 expresses/transmits symbol/meaningful expression x_2 for audience x_3 by doing x_4 (ternary relation between x_1, x_2 and x_3)
See also {smusku}, {cusku}, {sinxa}, {smuni}.

snitatu

fu'ivla
x_1 is a tattoo
See {sinxa}, {skapi}, {pilka}, {cagna}

snocanci

lujvo
c_1 fades from location c_2
c.f. {masno} {canci}

snomabru

lujvo
m_1 is a sloth of genus/species m_2.

snuji

gismu
-nuj-
x_1 is a sandwich/layering [not restricted to food] of x_2 sandwiched between x_3.
See also {midju}, {nenri}, {sepli}, {senta}, {jbini}, {bitmu}, {sruri}.

snukarni

lujvo
k_1 is a [shared journal]/blog about topic/subject k_2=c_2 published/administered by k_3 for participants/audience k_4=c_1.
Cf. {casnu}, {karni}, {snustu}, {kibykarni}.

snura

gismu
-nur-
-nu'a-
x_1 is secure/safe from threat x_2 (event).
See also {ckape}, {kajde}, {marbi}, {terpa}, {xalni}, {bandu}.

snustu

lujvo
s_1 is a forum for c_1 to discuss/talk about topic/subject c_2.
Cf. {casnu}, {stuzi}, {snukarni}, {kibykarni}, {kibysnustu}

snuti

gismu
-nut-
x_1 (event/state) is an accident/unintentional on the part of x_2; x_1 is an accident.
See also {zukte}, {cunso}.

so

cmavo
-soz-
PA1
digit/number: 9 (digit) [nine].

so'a

cmavo
-soj-
PA4
digit/number: almost all (digit/number).

sobde

gismu
-sob-
-so'e-
x_1 is a quantity of soya [grain/bean] of species/strain x_2.
See also {dembi}, {gurni}.

sobgrasu

lujvo
s_1=g_1 is a quantity of soybean oil from soybeans of species/variety s_2=g_2.

sobjau

lujvo
s_1=d_1 is made of/contains/is a quantity/expanse of soy milk/soya milk/soybean milk/soy juice/soy drink from soybeans of species/variety s_2.
Soy "milk" is produced by soaking dry soybeans and grinding them with water.

soblanbi

lujvo
s_1=l_1 is a quantity of soy protein of type/soy species s_2=l_2 .

sobrtempe

fu'ivla
s_1 is a quantity of tempeh from soybeans of species/strain s_2.

sobrtofu

fu'ivla
s_1 is a quantity of tofu/bean curd from soybeans of species/strain s_2.

sobysanso

lujvo
sa_1 is soy sauce for use with sa_2, containing ingredients including sa_3.
Cf. {kukfusra}, {tsapi}, {silna}, {furfipsanso}.

sobyxinmo

lujvo
s_1=x_1 is a quantity of ink of color/pigment x_2 used by writing device x_3 from soybeans of species/variety s_2.

sodna

gismu
x_1 is a quantity of/contains/is made of alkali metal of type x_2 [default sodium].
Also potassium, lithium, cesium. Soda. See also {jilka}, {jinme}.

sodnlrubidi

fu'ivla
s_1 is a quantity of/contains/is made of rubidium (Rb).

sodnrcesi

fu'ivla
s_1 is a quantity of/contains/is made of cesium (Cs).

sodnrfransi

fu'ivla
s_1 is a quantity of/contains/is made of francium (Fr).

sodnrkali

fu'ivla
x_1 is potassium (K).
see {sodna}

sodnrlito

fu'ivla
s_1 is a quantity of/contains/is made of lithium (Li).
Berzelius gave the alkaline material the name "lithion/lithina", from the Greek word "lithos", meaning "stone").

sodva

gismu
-sod-
x_1 is made of/contains/is a quantity of a carbonated beverage/soda of flavor/brand x_2.
Also: soft drink (though this sometimes includes tea and coffee as distinct from alcoholic beverages which are "hard drinks"). See also {jilka}, {jinme}.

so'e

cmavo
-sop-
PA4
digit/number: most.

so'eroi

cmavo-compound
ROI*
tense interval modifier: usually; objectively quantified tense; defaults as time tense.

softo

gismu
-sof-
x_1 reflects Russian empire/USSR/ex-USSR (Soviet]/CIS culture/nationality in aspect x_2.
See also {rusko}, {vukro}, {slovo}.

sofybakni

lujvo
x_1=b_1=s_1 is a Soviet cow/cattle/kine/ox/[bull/steer/calf] [beef-producer/bovine] of species/breed x_2=b_2 and reflecting USSR/ex-USSR [Soviet] culture/nationality in aspect x_3=s_2.
Why not give a definition to this word :) See {softo} {bakni}.

sofygu'e

lujvo
x_1 is USSR (Soviet Union)
Cf. {gugdesu'u}, {softo}, {sesre}, {rukygu'e}, {gugderu'u}, {sesrygugde}

soi

cmavo
SOI
discursive: reciprocal sumti marker; indicates a reciprocal relationship between sumti.

so'i

cmavo
-sor-
-so'i-
PA4
digit/number: many.

soi'a

experimental cmavo
PA
almost all/almost every/almost everywhere (technical sense): there is a conull subset of such things that are satisfactory
Can be used as a quantifier. See also: {soi'u}, {pisoi'a}

so'imei

cmavo-compound
MOI*
quantified selbri: convert many to cardinal; x_1 is a set with many members x_2 of total set x_3.

so'iroi

cmavo-compound
ROI*
tense interval modifier: many times; objective tense; defaults as time tense.

soirsai

lujvo
sa_1 is a field ration consisting of dishes including sa_2, for so_1 of army so_2.
Cf. {sonci}, {sanmi}, {bilni}, {jenmi}, {fatri}, {pagbu}

soi'u

experimental cmavo
PA
almost none/almost no/almost nowhere (technical sense): the subset of satisfactory such things is null
Can be used as a quantifier. See also: {soi'a}, {pisoi'u}

sojypa'a

lujvo
p_1 expects p_2 (event); p_1 expects p_2 to happen.
p_2 is likely. It has high probability. Cf. {pacna}, {sorpa'a}, {sotpa'a}.

soki'o

cmavo-compound
PA*
number/quantity: 9,000 expressed with comma.

sol

cmevla
Soul

soldei

lujvo
x_1 is Sunday of week x_2 on calendar x_3.

solgu'i

lujvo
x_1 is sunlight illuminating x_2 from sun x_3

solgu'idicyborprami'i

lujvo
x_1 is a solar panel / device for producing electricity from sunlight by process x_2 (ka).
The x2 is a property of the light illuminating the apparatus. Although the word "panel" appears in the definition, other shapes are encompassed by this word.

solgusli'i

lujvo
x1=l1 is a sunbeam/sunray/[line of sunlight] illuminating x2=g2

solji

gismu
-slo-
x_1 is a quantity of/contains/is made of gold (Au); [metaphor: valuable, heavy, non-reactive].
See also {ricfu}, {rijno}, {narju}, {pelxu}.

solminli

lujvo
x_1 is x_2 (default 1) Astronomical Unit(s) (AU)
from {solri} {minli} c.f. {gusminli} {tanminli}.

solnuncanci

lujvo
x_1 is a sunset at location x_2 as observed by x_3

solnuntolcanci

lujvo
x_1 is a sunrise at location x_2 as observed by x_3
See also {solnuncanci}, {solri}, {cerni}, {vanci}.

solri

gismu
-sol-
x_1 is the sun of home planet x_2 (default Earth) of race x_3; (adjective:) x_1 is solar.
'home planet' refers to a planet which is "home" to a race, but not necessarily the original "home" of a species if that species inhabits many worlds. See also {gusni}, {lunra}, {mluni}, {plini}, {santa}, {terdi}, {tarci}.

solris

cmevla
the Sun (the star in the middle of Earth's solar system).

solspa

lujvo
sp_1 is a sunflower (genus Helianthus) of species/strain/cultivar sp_2.

solspagrasu

lujvo
g_1 is a quantity of/is made of/contains sunflower oil from sunflower sp_1=g_2.

solspasamcu

lujvo
sp_1=sa_1 is a quantity of sunroot/sunchoke/earth apple/topinambour [edible starchy root of genus Helianthus ] of species/strain sp_2=sa_2.

solspatsi

lujvo
t_1 is/are (a) sunflower seed(s) of sunflower sp_1=t_2.

solsudgautamca

lujvo
g_2=su_1=t_1 is a sun-dried tomato of species/strain/variety t_2, dried by sun g_1=so_1 [default: sun of home planet Earth].

solxrula

lujvo
x_1 is a sunflower of species/variety x_2.

sombo

gismu
-som-
-so'o-
x_1 sows/plants x_2 [crop/plants] at/in x_3.
See also {crepu}, {tsiju}.

somcna

lujvo
c_1 is a trowel for digging c_2.
Cf. {sombo}, {canpa}.

somoi

cmavo-compound
MOI*
quantified selbri: convert 9 to ordinal selbri; x_1 is ninth among x_2 ordered by rule x_3.

sonci

gismu
-son-
-soi-
x_1 is a soldier/warrior/fighter of army x_2.
See also {bilni}, {damba}, {jenmi}, {xarci}, {pulji}.

songri

lujvo
x_1 is an army battalion, a subdivision of army unit x_2 which serves country/nation/group x_3.
Cf. {sonci}, {girzu}, {songripau}, {songripausle}, {jempausle}.

songripau

lujvo
x_1 is an army company, a subdivision of army unit x_2 which serves country/nation/group x_3.
Cf. {sonci}, {girzu}, {pagbu}, {songri}, {songripausle}, {jempausle}.

songripausle

lujvo
x_1 is an army platoon, a subdivision of army unit x_2 which serves country/nation/group x_3.
Cf. {sonci}, {girzu}, {pagbu}, {selci}, {songri}, {songripau}, {jempausle}.

sonjamkarce

lujvo
k_1 is an armoured personnel carrier propelled by k_3.
Cf. {sonci}, {jamna}, {karce}, {jamkarce}, {gutyjamkarce}, {xiljamkarce}, {tsakarce}, {karcycelxa'i}.

sono

cmavo-compound
PA*
number/quantity: 90 [ninety].

sonono

cmavo-compound
PA*
number/quantity: 900 [nine hundred].

so'o

cmavo
-sos-
PA4
digit/number: several.

sopselnei

lujvo
n_1 is liked by most people.
Cf. {so'e}, {nelci}, {misno}, {selzaumi'o}.

sopselneizgi

lujvo
z_1=n_2 is pop music produced/performed at/by z_2 (event).
Cf. {so'e}, {nelci}, {zgike}, {dja'aza}, {te'ekno}, {naizgi}, {nolzgi}.

sorbaucre

lujvo
c_1 is a polyglot, proficient in languages c_2=b_1.
Cf. {baucre}.

sorcinpa'i

lujvo
x_1=c_1=p_1 is sexually polyamorous/sexually loves many people/more than one person including, but not limited to, set x_2=p_2 in situation/activity/state x_3=c_2, exhibiting sexuality/gender/sexual orientation (ka) x_4=c_3 by standard x_5=c_4.
Leaving in all the places of {cinse} doesn't do much, but it probably doesn't hurt. See also {cinse}, {prami}, {so'i}, {sorpa'i}.

sorcu

gismu
-soc-
-sro-
x_1 is a store/deposit/supply/reserve of materials/energy x_2 in containment x_3.
x_3 need not be a container, but could merely be a site/location restriction; e.g. a heap. The sumti indicates how the supply is identified and distinguished from other occurrences of the stored x_2 that are not part of the store. (cf. {panka}; {vreji} for information storage; {sabji} for a store or reserve that is not necessarily tied to a site, {banxa}, {panka})

sordu'e

lujvo
x_1 is too many / too much / too numerous by standard x_2
See {so'i}, {dukse}, {sormei}, {sormau}, {sorme'a}, {sordu'i}, {du'e}

sordu'i

lujvo
x_1 equals in number to x_2
See {so'i}, {dunli}, {sormei}, {sormau}, {sorme'a}, {memlai}

sorgu

gismu
-sog-
x_1 is a quantity of sorghum of species/strain x_2.
See also {gurni}.

sorgugje'a

lujvo
j_1 is an empire governing over g_1 provinces with j_2=g_3 territories.
Made out of {so'i}, {gugde}, {jecta}

sorjaknykarce

lujvo
k_1 is a multiple rocket launcher propelled by k_3.
Cf. {so'i}, {jakne}, {karce}, {janjaknyxa'i}, {xumjimcelxa'i}, {gutyjamkarce}, {karcycelxa'i}.

sorjontai

lujvo
t_1 is a web-shape, manifested by t_2.

sorju'o

lujvo
x_1 is knowledgable about subject x_2 by epistomology x_3

sorlutca'u

lujvo
p_1=c_1 is a maze (an area with many paths) occupied by c_2, with route(s) leading to exit p_2 from entrance p_3 via points including p_4 (set).
See also {canlu}, {pluta}, {so'i}.

sormau

lujvo
x_1 is more numerous than x_2
Synonymous with {meizma}. See {so'i}, {zmadu}, {sormei}, {sorme'a}, {sordu'i}, {dubmau}, {memlai}, {za'u}

sorme'a

lujvo
x_1 is less numerous than x_2
See {so'i}, {mleca}, {sormei}, {sormau}, {sordu'i}, {dubme'a}, {memlai}, {me'i}

sormei

lujvo
x_1 are numerous/many
See also {so'i}, {mei}

sornai

lujvo
n_1 is an international group of peoples n_2.
from {so'i} {natmi}

sornairauci'e

lujvo
x_1 is the SI (International System of Units), defining units x_2
Syn. {sornai zei raurci'e}. Cf. {sornai}, {raurci'e}, {gradu}, {ciste}

sornai zei raurci'e

zei-lujvo
x_1 is the SI (International System of Units), defining units x_2
Syn. {sornairauci'e}. See {sornai}, {raurci'e}

sorni

experimental gismu
x_1 (ka) property of x_2 is metaphorically sufficient as to be equivalent to x_3 (ka).
This bridges the gap for the English usage of "so" used in hyperbolic/metaphorical equivalence. For example "My shadow is so small, it (virtually) doesn't exist."

sorpa'a

lujvo
p_1 hopes for p_2 (event); p_1 hopes that p_2 happens.
p_2 is possible and has medium probability. Cf. {pacna}, {sotpa'a}, {sojypa'a}.

sorpa'i

lujvo
x_1=p_1 is polyamorous/loves many people (romantic love implied), including, but not limited to, set x_2=p_2.
Romantic love, is, I suppose, not absolutely necessary, but seems likely. See also {prami}, {so'i}, {sorcinpa'i}.

sorpeka

fu'ivla
x_1 is a bus/coach for carrying passengers x_2, propelled by x_3
This is a zi'evla of the word {sorprekarce}.

sorprekarce

lujvo
k_1 is a bus/coach for carrying passengers p_1=k_2, propelled by k_3.
Cf. {karce}, {marce}, {tcana}, {klama}

sorprekarcytcana

lujvo
t_1 is a bus terminal/station/depot in transport system t_2 for buses for carrying p_1=k_2
from {sorprekarce} {tcana}.

sorselcei

lujvo
c_2 believes in many gods/deities c_1 with dominion over c_3; c2 is a polytheist.
Cf. {cevni}, {ceikri}, {nalceikri}, {selcei}, {pavyselcei}, {nonselcei}, {ceirsenpi}.

sorselsmu

lujvo
x_1 has many meanings/is polysemous to interpreter x_2

sorsipydi'u

lujvo
d_1 is a dormitory (building/place) where people x_2 (complete mass) sleep.
x_1 is from {dinju} and x_2 is invented but related to {sipna}_1. x_2 should be used for all the people; e.g. "mi se sorsipydi'u" incorrect speaking for yourself.

sorska

lujvo
sk_1 is/appears to be colorful/many-colored as perceived/seen by sk_3 under conditions sk_4.
Conditions may include lighting, background, etc. Cf. {so'i}, {skari}.

sorslemu'e

lujvo
x_1 is a cellular automaton containing cells x_2 defined by rules x_3
All of the cells in the cellular automaton are X2s. {rolkaipame} is useful as a relative clause on the X2 place, and {cimdylai} is useful as a modal formed with {fi'o}.

sorta

experimental gismu
x_1 sorta is/does x_2 (nu/ka) under conditions x_3
This is a joke word. Its main use is in the tanru {kinda} {sorta}

sortai

lujvo
x_1 is polymorphic, has polymorphism
See {so'i} {tarmi}

sortu'e

lujvo
x_1 is a myriapod

soryroi

lujvo
x_1 happens many times in interval x_2.
{so'i} {roi}

soryrulzgu

lujvo
r_1 is a many-flowered/multiflora/baby/Japanese/seven-sisters/Eijitsu roserose (Rosa multiflora) of species/strain r_2.

sosoce'i

cmavo-compound
PA*
number/quantity: 99% (number).

sostartai

lujvo
t_1 is a constellation of stars
Cf. {so'o}, {tarci}, {tarmi}, {tartai}, {tarso'imei}, {tarci'e}, {tarboi}, {cacryra'o}.

sosyzda

lujvo
x_1 is a hamlet/settlement with inhabitants x_2
from {so'o} {zdani} c.f. {cmatca}

sotmei

lujvo
x_1 are few
See also {so'u}, {mei}

sotpa'a

lujvo
p_1 wishes for p_2 (event); p_1 wishes that p_2 happened.
p_2 is unlikely. It has low probability. Cf. {pacna}, {sorpa'a}, {sojypa'a}.

sotroi

lujvo
x_1 happens seldom/infrequently/is rare in interval x_2.
{so'u} {roi}

so'u

cmavo
-sot-
PA4
digit/number: few.

so'uroi

cmavo-compound
ROI*
tense interval modifier: a few times; objective tense; defaults as time tense.

sovda

gismu
-sov-
-so'a-
x_1 is an egg/ovum/sperm/pollen/gamete of/from organism [mother/father] x_2.
(poorly metaphorical only due to gender- and species- being unspecified): ovoid, oblate (= {pevyso'aseltai}, but better: {claboi}); egg, specifically female (= {fetso'a}), of a bird (= {cpifetso'a}, {cpiso'a}), of a chicken (= {jipcyfetso'a}, {jipcyso'a}. (but note that Lojban does not require specificity, just as English doesn't for either milk or eggs; "sovda" is fine for most contexts); If fertilized, then {tsiju} or {tarbi}. (cf. {ganti}, {gutra}, {mamta}, {patfu}, {rorci}, {tsiju}, {lanbi}, {tarbi}; also {djine}, {konju} for shape, {tarbi})

soviet

obsolete cmevla
Soviet
Cf. {sesre}, {softo}, {gugdesu'u}

sovykruji

lujvo
k_1 is made of/contains a quantity of custard.
Cf. {sovda}, {kruji}.

sozepimu

cmavo-compound
PA*
number/quantity: 97.5.

sozmast

cmevla
September.
Cf. {xlima'i}, {sozymasti}.

sozmoija'a

lujvo
j_1 has the rank of General/Admiral/Air Chief Marshal (equivalent of NATO OF-9) in military unit /organization j_2.
Cf. {so}, {moi}, {jatna}, {jemja'a}, {vairsoi}, {pavnonmoija'a}, {bivmoija'a}. Based on STANAG 2116: NATO Codes for Grades of Military Personnel.

sozymasti

lujvo
x_1 is September/the ninth month of year x_2 in calendar x_3.
Duration. For date, use {masnso}. Cf. {pavmasti}, {nanca}.

spabi'u

lujvo
b_1 is a hedge separating b_2 and b_3 in b_4 made of plants of species s_2.
Cf. {spati}, {bitmu}.

spacivla

lujvo
x_1 is an aphid of genus/species x_2.

spacti

lujvo
c_1 is a herbivore eating plants s_1=c_2.
See also vegetarian (sense: vegetable-eater ={stagycti}). Herbivores may eat parts of the plant that is not edible for humans.

spageti

fu'ivla
x_1 - is spaghetti made out of/containing x_2.
See also {nanba}

spagrasu

lujvo
c_1 is a quantity of plant oil from plant c_2=s_1.

spaigopodidai

fu'ivla
x_1 is a pygopod (a reptile of family Pygopodidae) of subtaxon/genus/species/variety/breed x_2
Superficially similar to snakes, but not closely related (snakes belong to order Serpentes while pygopods belong to order squamata). Confer: {respa}, {since}.

spaji

gismu
-paj-
x_1 (event/action abstract) surprises/startles/is unexpected [and generally sudden] to x_2.
Also expectation (= {nalspaji}), alarm (= {tepspaji}). See also {manci}, {jenca}, {bredi}, {suksa}.

spalato

fu'ivla
x_1 is rooibos of species x_2

spali

gismu
x_1 (agent) polishes object/surface x_2 with polish x_3, applied using tool x_4.
See also {mosra}, {sraku}, {xutla}.

spano

gismu
-san-
x_1 reflects Spanish-speaking culture/nationality/language in aspect x_2.
Metaphorical restriction to Spain by contrast with xispo (comparable to the distinction between glico and merko/sralo/brito/kadno); Spain (= {sangu'e}); Spanish dialects spoken in Spain, especially Castillian (= {sansanbau}). See also {xispo}, {ketco}, {mexno}, {gento}.

spanraki

fu'ivla
s_1 is a peanut plant/plant from genus Arachis, of species/strain/cultivar s_2.

spapatxu

lujvo
p_1 is a plant pot/flower pot, made of material p_3.

sparaci

fu'ivla
s_1 is a plant of the genus Acis of species/strain/cultivar s_2.

fu'ivla
s_1 is a plant of genus Ada of species/strain/cultivar s_2.

fu'ivla
x_1 is a quantity of asparagus of species/strain x_2

fu'ivla
x_1 is a calamus/sweet flag (genus Acorus) of species/strain x_2.

fu'ivla
s_1 is a colicroot/colicweed/crow corn/unicorn root (genus Aletris) of species/strain/cultivar s_2.

fu'ivla
x_1 is a water-plantain (genus Alisma) of species/strain x_2.

sparalistremeria

s_1 is a Peruvian lily/lily of the Incas (genus Alstremeria) of species/strain/cultivar s_2.

sparalo'e

fu'ivla
s_1 is an aloe plant (genus Aloe) of species/strain/cultivar s_2 (default Aloe vera).

sparanakampti

See also annonin (={xukmranoni}).

fu'ivla

spararanda

fu'ivla
s_1 is an aranda (hybrid between orchid genera Arachnis and Vanda) of species/strain/cultivar s_2.

sparargirantemu

fu'ivla
s_1 is a marguerite/marguerite daisy/dill daisy (genus Argyranthemum) of species/strain/cultivar s_2.

spararktantemu

obsolete fu'ivla
s_1 is a plant of genus Arctanthemum of species/strain/cultivar s_2.

spararkti

obsolete fu'ivla
s_1 is a burdock (genus Arctium) of species/cultivar s_2.

spararnika

fu'ivla
s_1 is an arnica/mountain tobacco/Leopard's bane/Wolfsbane (genus Arnica) of species/cultivar s_2.

sparartemisia

obsolete fu'ivla
s_1 is a mugwort/wormwood/sagewort/sagebrush/tarragon/absinthe (genus Artemisia) of species/strain/cultivar s_2.

sparartropodi

fu'ivla
s_1 is a rengarenga/maikaika/renga lily/vanilla lily/ (genus Arthropodium) of species/strain/cultivar s_2.

spararunku

fu'ivla
s_1 is a goatsbeard plant (genus Aruncus) of species/strain/cultivar x2.

sparasfodelu

fu'ivla
s_1 is a plant of genus Asphodelus of species/strain/cultivar s_2.

sparasparagu

fu'ivla
x_1 is an asparagus plant (genus Asparagus) of species/strain x_2.
The common asparagus (Asparagus officinalis) = lo'e sparasparagu. See also asparagus vegetable(={stagrasparagu}).

sparasteri

fu'ivla
s_1 is a plant of genus Aster of species/cultivar s_2.

sparastroloba

fu'ivla
s_1 is a plant of genus Astroloba of species/strain/cultivar s_2.

sparbaptisia

obsolete fu'ivla
s_1 is a false/wild indigo (genus Baptisia) of species/strain/cultivar s_2.

sparbarkeria

obsolete fu'ivla
s_1 is a barkeria/bark (genus Barkeria) of species/strain/cultivar s_2.

sparbe'alara

fu'ivla
s_1 is a beallara/bllra. (hybrid between the orchid genera Brassia, Cochlioda, Miltonia and Odontoglossum) of species/strain/cultivar s_2.

fu'ivla
s_1 is a daisy (genus Bellis) of species/cultivar s_2.

sparberlini

fu'ivla

fu'ivla

sparbifrenaria

obsolete fu'ivla
s_1 is an orchid of genus Bifrenaria of species/strain/cultivar s_2.

obsolete fu'ivla
s_1 is a christmas bell (genus Blandfordia) of species/strain/cultivar s_2.

sparbletila

fu'ivla
s_1 is an orchid of genus Bletilla of species/strain/cultivar s_2.

sparblomeria

obsolete fu'ivla
s_1 is a goldenstar (genus Bloomeria) of species/strain/cultivar s_2.

sparbobgunia

obsolete fu'ivla
s_1 is a plant of genus Bobgunnia of species/strain/cultivar s_2.

sparbrasavola

fu'ivla
s_1 is an orchid of genus Brassavola of species/strain/cultivar s_2.

sparbrasia

obsolete fu'ivla
s_1 is a spider orchid (genus Brassia) of species/strain/cultivar s_2.

sparbrasidi

fu'ivla
s_1 is a brassidium (hybrid between orchid genera Brassia and Oncidium) of species/strain/cultivar s_2.

sparbrasokatli'a

fu'ivla
s_1 is an brassocattleya (hybrid between orchid genera Brassavola and Cattleya) of species/strain/cultivar s_2.

sparbulbofilu

fu'ivla
s_1 is an orchid of genus Bulbophyllum of species/strain/cultivar s_2.
Bulbophyllum is the largest genus in the orchid family Orchidaceae.

sparburage'ara

fu'ivla
s_1 is a burrageara (hybrid between orchid genera Cochlioda, Miltonia, Odontoglossum and Oncidium) of species/strain/cultivar s_2.

sparbutomu

fu'ivla
x_1 is a flowering/grass rush (genus Butomus) of species/strain x_2.

sparcefalantera

fu'ivla
s_1 is an orchid of genus Cephalanthera of species/strain/cultivar s_2.

sparceratofilu

fu'ivla
x_1 is a hornwort (genus Ceratophyllum) of species/strain x_2.

sparcesalpino

fu'ivla
s_1 is a nicker/holdback/plant of genus Caesalpinia of species/strain/cultivar s_2.
The generic name honors the botanist, physician and philosopher Andrea Cesalpino (1519-1603).

sparcice

fu'ivla
s_1 is a plant [legume] of genus Cicer of species/strain/cultivar s_2.
See also: chickpea (={debrcice}).

sparcicerbita

fu'ivla
s_1 is a blue sow thistle (genus Cicerbita) of species/strain/cultivar s_2.

sparciclopi'a

fu'ivla

See also {tcatrciclopi'a}.

sparcicnoke

fu'ivla
s_1 is an orchid of genus Cycnoches of species/strain/cultivar s_2.

sparcikimi

fu'ivla
x_1 is a Japanese star anise (Illicium anisatum) of strain x_2.
From japanese shikimi 樒. See also Chinese star anise (={tsaprilici}), anise tree (={sparilici}).

sparsagitaria

obsolete fu'ivla
x_1 is a sagittaria (genus Sagittaria) of species/strain x_2.
Sagittaria is a genus of about 30 species of aquatic plants whose members go by a variety of common names, including arrowhead, duck potato, iz-ze-kn, katniss, kuwai (くわい in Japanese), swan potato, tule potato, and wapato.

s_1 is a plant of genus Aspasia of species/strain/cultivar s_2.

Swainsona is named after English botanist Isaac Swainson. See also swainsonine (={xumrsueinsona}).

spati

gismu

The species may be mistaken for "Inula salicina" or for "Arnica montana".

This genus differ from other thistle genera (Carduus, Silybum and Onopordum) in having feathered hairs to their achenes.
