BAI*
ciste modal, 3rd place of system components ...

teci'o

cmavo-compound
BAI*
cinmo modal, 3rd place (attitude about) emotionally; emoting about ...

tecu'u

cmavo-compound
BAI*
cusku modal, 3rd place (3rd party hearsay) as told to ...

tecycuxskicauzmi

lujvo
x_1 is the default in/of function x_2 pertaining to x_3 when no option is chosen/specified from potential/candidate pool (set, list) x_4 under additional/other conditions x_5
Chooser may be specified by x3 or x5 (albeit with somewhat different meanings) but is not inherently important to the property of a default.

tecyju'i

lujvo
j_1 is particular/fastidious about j_2=s_1.
Cf. {jundi}.

tecyselci'i

lujvo
c_2 is a hobbyist/collector/etc. of c_1=s_1.
See also {steci}, {se}, {cinri}.

tecyse'u

lujvo
s_1 is committed to s_2 with service s_3

tecyvla

lujvo
v_1 is a term/jargon (from a specialised area of knowledge) meaning v_2=s_2 in language v_3.
Cf. {valsi}, {steci}, {bangu}.

tede'i

cmavo-compound
BAI*
detri modal, 3rd place on a date measured at location ...

tedi'o

cmavo-compound
BAI*
diklo modal, 3rd place locally; at specific locus within range ...

tedmre

lujvo
m_1 surveys t_1=m_2 as m_3 (map or measurements) in unit m_4 with accuracy m_5
see also {tumymre}

tedu'i

cmavo-compound
BAI*
dunli modal, 3rd place equally; equal in property ...

tedu'o

cmavo-compound
BAI*
djuno modal, 3rd place knowingly; knowing about ...

tedyske

lujvo
s_1=t_1 is Earth science based on methodology s_3.
terdi2, terdi3 and saske2 subsumed. x1 is an all-embracing term for the sciences related to the planet Earth. It is arguably a special case in planetary science (={plinyske}). Not limited to reductionistic science, but also embrace holistic views. See also {derske}.

te'e

cmavo
FAhA3
location tense relation/direction; edged by/edging up to ...

te'ekno

fu'ivla
x_1 is a form of techno music performed/created by x_2 with characteristics x_3.
Cf. {zgike}, {dja'aza}, {sopselneizgi}, {naizgi}, {nolzgi}.

tefi'e

cmavo-compound
BAI*
finti modal, 3rd place creatively; created for purpose ...

tefpi'i

lujvo
x_1 is x_2 times the x_4th power of x_3 // x_1 = x_2 \times {x_3}^{x_4}
See {tenfa}, {pilji}, {gei}, {dektefpi'i}, {reltefpi'i}

tefsujme'o

lujvo
m_1 is a polynomial function in variable t_2=s_2 of degree (maximum power with nonzero coefficient) t_3 interpreted by rules m_2
m2 can include (but is not limited to) information about the underlying formal polynomial and/or ring of definition, steps of addition series (which terms are being summed), and input domain of the function. t2 is a variable of input (no longer an indeterminant, as it is for the underlying formal polynomial). See also: {cpolinomi'a}

tefteli

fu'ivla
x_1 is a roasted meatball (meal; a ball of minced or ground meat, roasted) consisting of x_2
{polpeta} is a more generic term. See also {frikadeli}, {sanmi}, {rectu}

tega'a

cmavo-compound
BAI*
zgana modal, 3rd place observed by means ...

tegyga'e

lujvo
g_1 (experiencer) feels texture g_2=t_1 (proterty-ka) by means/senses g_3 under conditions g_4.
The experiencer does not neccessarily intend to feel the texture. See {tegzga} for actively feeling.

tegygaska'e

lujvo
k_1 (experiencer) is able to feel [sensory stimulus] under conditions k_3 (event/state).
See also: {narte'ugaska'e}, {tegyga'e}.

tegzga

lujvo
z_1 palpates/touch-feels texture z_2=t_1 using senses/means z_3 under conditions z_4.
This is for actively palpating something. See {tegyga'e} for experiencing feeling (not neccessarily actively). Cf. {pencu}.

tei

cmavo
TEI
composite letteral follows; used for multi-character letterals.

te'i

experimental cmavo
BAI
at a point on time axis
{temjudri} modal. See also {de'i} and {ti'u}. ex.) su'o da nuntumdesku te'i li re no pa mu pi'e mu pi'e ci no pi'e re no pi'e re vo noi sinxa lo mentu ku'o te te'i u'y ty cy xi ma'u so (There was an earthquake at 2015-05-30 20:24 UTC+9.) / su'o da nuntumdesku te'i li re vo mu ze pa ze re pi so ze mu te te'i la juli'us (There was an earthquake at 2457172.975 of Julian date.)

teijbi

lujvo
j_1=t_2 (point in time / point-event) is near/approximates j_2=t_3 (point in time / point-event).
Cf. {jibni}, {temci}, {zi}.

te'i'o

experimental cmavo
UI3
discursive: specified by the speaker - unspecified by the speaker
Used to indicate that a referent(s) of the preceding word/structure (usually sumti) is/are specified by the speaker; See also {steci}, {sanji}

teipru

lujvo
x_1 is in the past of/earlier than/before x_2 in time sequence, separated by an interval of x_3
See {purci}, {temci}.

teirmokca

lujvo
x_1 is an instant/moment in time x_2
See {temci}, {mokca}

te'iski

lujvo
sk_1 specifies sk_2=st_2 among st_3 to audience sk_3 as having property sk_4=st_1

tei'u

TEIhU
elidable terminator of a JAhOI construct
See also: {ja'oi}

temau

cmavo-compound
BAI*

tembalvi

lujvo

See {balvi}, {temci}.

temci

gismu
-tem-
-tei-
x_1 is the time-duration/interval/period/[elapsed time] from time/event x_2 to time/event x_3.
Also age/elapsed time (= {niltei}). See also {cacra}, {cedra}, {citsi}, {ranji}, {tcika}, {junla}, {renvi}.

temcimni

lujvo
c_1 is eternal/everlasting.

temda'o

lujvo
d_1=t_2 (point in time) is far/distant in time from d_2=t_3 (point in time).
Cf. {darno}, {temci}, {zu}.

teme'a

cmavo-compound
BAI*
mleca modal, 3rd place (relative!) less than in property ...

teme'e

cmavo-compound
BAI*
cmene modal, 3rd place as a name used by ...

temfesti

lujvo
f_1 is a ruin that has decayed from time/event t_2 to time/event t_3
from {temci} {festi}

temjudri

lujvo
x_1 is a point on time axis, of event/state x_2, in system x_3.
{temci} zei {judri}. Both date and time may be x_1 all together. See {te'i} for BAI. See also {detri}, {tcika}. ex.) li re no pa mu pi'e mu pi'e ci no pi'e re no pi'e re vo cu mentu temjudri su'o nuntumdesku u'y ty cy xi ma'u so (There was an earthquake at 2015-05-30 20:24 UTC+9.) / li re vo mu ze pa ze re pi so ze mu cu temjudri su'o nuntumdesku la juli'us (There was an earthquake at 2457172.975 of Julian date.)

temli'u

lujvo
x_1=l_1 is a time traveller travelling over time interval x_2=l_2=t_1 from x_3=t_2 to x_4=t_3 with time machine/time travel device x_5=l_3
cf. {temci}, {litru}

tempru

lujvo
x_1 is in the past of/earlier than/before x_2 in time sequence, separated by an interval of x_3
See {purci}, {temci}

tempura

fu'ivla
x_1 is a tempura containing x_2

temsalri

lujvo
x_1 is the differintegral of x_2 with respect to time of order x_3 with starting point x_4

temse

experimental gismu
x_1 (event) is timelike-separated from x_2 (event) under signal means/in universe/by information channel (parametrization) x_3
Includes lightlike-separation. For events in the pastward light-cone (with the apex at ({mu'e}) x2), use {prutemse}; for futureward light-cone events, use {bavytemse}. See also: {calse}, {tcese}

temsepcau

lujvo
c_1=s_1 is immediately next to s_2 in time.
Cf. {temci}, {sepli}, {claxu}, {sepcau}, {zi}.

temu'i

cmavo-compound
BAI*
mukti modal, 3rd place motivated/motivating per the volition of ...

temu'u

cmavo-compound
BAI*
mupli modal, 3rd place as an example out of the set of ...

temyzi'e

lujvo
x_1 has time to do x_2; x_1 is free to spend time on x_2
See also {ziftei}.

tende

experimental gismu
x_1 (entity) tends, has tendency to x_2 (property of x_1)
See {dikni}, {lakne}. Proposed rafsi: -te'e-

tenfa

gismu
-tef-
x_1 is the exponential result of base x_2 to power/exponent x_3.
See also {dugri}, {te'a}

tengau

lujvo
g_1 extends t_1 to range t_2 [interval/extent] in dimension t_3 from relaxed range t_4.

tengu

gismu
-teg-
-te'u-
x_1 (property-ka) is a texture of x_2.
See also {rufsu}, {xutla}.

tenguar

obsolete cmevla
x_1 is Tengwar alphabet
Cf. {jbopomofo}

teni'i

cmavo-compound
BAI*
nibli modal, 3rd place entailment under logic system ...

tenpi'o

lujvo
x_1 is an accordion.

tensori

fu'ivla
x_1 is a tensor representing x_2 with properties x_3

tentaku

fu'ivla
x_1 is a tentacle
See also {jimca}, {tuple}

te'o

cmavo
PA5
digit/number: exponential e (approx 2.71828...).

te'odlito

fu'ivla
x_1 is a theodolite (surveying instrument)
See {jganu}, {merli}, {tutci}, {tumymre}

te'oi'i

experimental cmavo
mekso n-ary operator: tensor product/exterior product; letting "¤" denote the tensor product, A_1 ¤ A_2 ¤...¤ A_{n} .
Frequently denoted by a circled saltire. For all i, A_i must be a tensor.

te'oi'oi

experimental cmavo
TEhOIhOI
terminator, mekso: terminates the listing of an ordered sequence of indices for a tensor
Terminates members of selma'o GAhUhAU.

te'o zei dugri

zei-lujvo
d_1 is the natural logarithm of d_2.
See also {te'o}, {dugri}, {reldugri}, {pavnondugri}.

tepa'a

cmavo-compound
BAI*
panra modal, 3rd place (property) contrastingly; contrasting in property ...

tepcau

lujvo
x_1 is fearless/intrepid

tepi'o

cmavo-compound
BAI*
pilno modal, 3rd place (instrumental) a tool usage for purpose ...

tepo'i

cmavo-compound
BAI*
porsi modal, 3rd place sequentially; as an order on set of items ...

tepselspaji

lujvo
s_2=t_1 is alarmed/startled by s_1=t_2.
Cf. {spaji}, {terpa}.

tepsla

lujvo
s1 celebrates/recognizes/honors fear holiday s2 (event/abstract) with activity/[party] s3; s1 celebrates Halloween.

tepsne

lujvo
s_1=t_1 has a nightmare about/that s_2=t_2 (fact/idea/event/state).
Cf. {terpa}, {senva}.

tepspaji

lujvo
s_1=t_2 alarms/startles s_2=t_1.
Cf. {terpa}, {spaji}.

tepu'a

cmavo-compound
BAI*
pluka modal, 3rd place pleasingly; being pleasing under conditions ...

tepu'e

cmavo-compound
BAI*
pruce modal, 3rd place (outputs) processing into outputs ...

terai

cmavo-compound
BAI*
traji modal, 3rd place (superlative) -est; most extremely; at extreme ...

terba'a

lujvo
x_3=b_1 is a mark/spot on x_2=b_2 of material x_1=b_3.
{te} {barna}; see also {cinta}, {xinmo}

terba'i

lujvo
x_3=b_1 is great/grand in property x_2=b_2 (ka) by standard x_1=b_3.
{te} {banli}

terbajra

lujvo
x_3=b_1 runs on surface x_2=b_2 using limbs x_1=b_3 with gait x_4=b_4.
{te} {bajra}

terbakfu

lujvo
x_3=b_1 is a bundle/package/cluster/clump/pack [shape/form] containing x_2=b_2, held together by x_1=b_3.
{te} {bakfu}

terbakri

lujvo
x_3=b_1 is chalk from source x_2=b_2 in form x_1=b_3.
{te} {bakri}

terbaktu

lujvo
x_3=b_1 is a bucket/pail/can/deep, solid, wide-topped container of contents x_2=b_2, made of material x_1=b_3.
{te} {baktu}

terbancu

lujvo
x_3=b_1 exceeds/is beyond limit/boundary x_2=b_2 from x_1=b_3 in property/amount x_4=b_4 (ka/ni).
{te} {bancu}

terbandu

lujvo
x_3=b_1 (event) defends/protects x_2=b_2 (object/state) from threat/peril/potential x_1=b_3 (event).
{te} {bandu}; see also {ckape}, {bradi}, {gunta}

terbanxa

lujvo
x_3=b_1 is a bank owned by/in banking system x_2=b_2 for banking functions x_1=b_3 (event).
{te} {banxa}

terbanzu

lujvo
x_3=b_1 (object) suffices/is enough/sufficient for purpose x_2=b_2 under conditions x_1=b_3.
{te} {banzu}; see also {crutcini}

terba'o

lujvo
x_3=b_1 grows/expands [an increasing development] to size/into form x_2=b_2 from x_1=b_3.
{te} {banro}

terbargu

lujvo
x_3=b_1 arches/curves over/around x_2=b_2 and is made of x_1=b_3; x_3=b_1 is an arch over/around x_2=b_2 of material x_1=b_3.
{te} {bargu}

terbarja

lujvo
x_3=b_1 is a tavern/bar/pub serving x_2=b_2 to audience/patrons x_1=b_3.
{te} {barja}

terbasna

lujvo
x_3=b_1 emphasizes/accentuates/gives emphasis/stress/accent to x_2=b_2 by (action) x_1=b_3.
{te} {basna}

terbasti

lujvo
x_3=b_1 replaces/substitutes for/instead of x_2=b_2 in circumstance x_1=b_3; x_3=b_1 is a replacement/substitute.
{te} {basti}

terbatci

lujvo
x_3=b_1 bites/pinches x_2=b_2 on/at specific locus x_1=b_3 with x_4=b_4.
{te} {batci}

terbatke

lujvo
x_3=b_1 is a button/knob/handle on/for item x_2=b_2, with purpose x_1=b_3, made of material x_4=b_4.
{te} {batke}

terbau

lujvo
x_3=b_1 is a language/dialect used by x_2=b_2 to express/communicate x_1=b_3 (si'o/du'u, not quote).
{te} {bangu}

terbe'e

lujvo
x_3=b_1 is a crew/team/gang/squad/band of persons x_2=b_2 directed/led by x_1=b_3 organized for purpose x_4=b_4.
{te} {bende}

terbei

lujvo
x_3=b_1 carries/hauls/bears/transports cargo x_2=b_2 to x_1=b_3 from x_4=b_4 over path x_5=b_5; x_3=b_1 is a carrier/porter.
{te} {bevri}

terbe'i

lujvo
x_1=b_3 receives x_2=b_2 from sender x_3=b_1 from origin x_4=b_4 via means/medium x_5=b_5.
{te} {benji}; see also {judri}.

terbejbi'o

lujvo
be_3=bi_1 signs up / subscribes to be_1 for publication be_2 from be_4 by means be_5.
Cf. {benji}, {mrilu}.

terberti

lujvo
x_3=b_1 is to the north/northern side (right-hand-rule pole) of x_2=b_2 according to frame of reference x_1=b_3.
{te} {berti}

terbi'a

lujvo

{te} {bilma}

{te} {bilni}

{te} {binra}

{te} {binxo}

terbi'u

lujvo

{te} {bitmu}

terbli

lujvo

{te} {bliku}

terblo

lujvo

{te} {bloti}, if x_1 is a human, it may have the meaning "rowing".

terbo'a

lujvo

terbo'u

lujvo

Cf. {kamjybo'u}, {bogykamju}, {bongu}.

lujvo

{te} {barda}

terbradi

lujvo
x_3=b_1 is an enemy/opponent/adversary/foe of x_2=b_2 in struggle x_1=b_3.
{te} {bradi}

lujvo

{te} {bridi}

lujvo

{te} {briju}

{te} {canci}

lujvo
c_1 is a farmer/rancher, c_2 being the location of farm/ranch c_1, raising/producing c_4.

{te} {canre}

lujvo

Cf. {ckasu}, {bebna}.

lujvo
x_3=c_1 is small in property/dimension x_2=c_2 (ka) as compared with standard/norm x_1=c_3.
{te} {cmalu}

terctu

lujvo
x_1 is a teaching/ something taught to audience x_2 by teacher x_3 about subject x_4 by method x_5.

terd

cmevla
Earth.
Cf. {terdi}.

terda'iga'a

lujvo
d_3=g_1 is a baton of material g_2.
Broad meaning; any stick feasible for blunt force can be a terda'iga'a.

terdakyji'o

lujvo
j_1 is the point of a knife’s edge j_2=d_3 at locus j_3.

terdei

lujvo
x_3=d_1 is x_2=d_2 full days in duration by standard x_1=d_3.
{te} {djedi}

terdejni

lujvo
d_3 is a creditor that is owed d_2 by d_1 for provision of goods/services/loans d_4.
Cf. {dejni}, {seldejni}, {kagyseldejni}, {ze'i zei seldejni}, {ze'u zei seldejni}, {paurseldejni}.

terderske

lujvo
s_1=t_1 is pedalogy [science about soil composition] based on methodology s_3.
terderske2, terderske3 and saske2 subsumed. Pedalogy is one of two main branches of soil science (={derske}). See also {rokske},{kunske}.

terdi

gismu
-ted-
x_1 is the Earth/the home planet of race x_2; (adjective:) x_1 is terrestrial/earthbound.
(cf. {lunra}, {plini}, {solri}, {kensa}, {tsani}; {dertu} for ground, dirt, except when used to express physical relative frame of reference E.g. on the ground, the ground beneath us. {tsani})

terdji

lujvo
x_1 is the purpose for which x_2 is wanted by x_3.

terdrata

lujvo
d_3 distinguishes between d_2 and d_1.
Cf. {zgana}, {sanji}, {jimpe}, {jinvi}.

terdzu

lujvo
x_3=c_1 walks/strides/paces on surface x_2=c_2 using limbs x_1=c_3.
{te} {cadzu}; see also {tuple}

terfagri

lujvo
x_1 is an oxidizer (by default air/oxygen) for fuel x_2 burning in fire x_3
This is derived from {fagri}

terfarnilfrica

lujvo
x_1 is the difference between frame of reference x_2 and frame of reference x_3.
magnetic variation is the difference between the magnetic reference frame and the rotational reference frame; see {makfartci}

terfendi

lujvo
f_3 is a section of f_2 divided by agent f_1 and method f_4.
Cf. {pagbu}.

terfi'i

lujvo
x_1 (abstraction) is the purpose of x_2 (object) by creator/inventor x_3, inspired by x_4
= {te} {finti}. See {erpi}, {tefi'e}

terfra

lujvo
f_3 incites reaction f_2 from reactor f_1 under condition f_4.
Cf. {frati}.

terfu'e

lujvo
f_3 charges responsibility f_2 to f_1.
Cf. {fuzme}, {catni}.

terganzu

lujvo
g_3 is a setup of g_2 arranged by g_1 based on principle g_4.
Cf. {ganzu}, {cnici}.

terge'a

lujvo
x_1 is grammatically/syntactically correct in language x_2 according to grammar/parser x_3.
Largely synonymous with {gendra}.

tergu'i

lujvo
x_1 is a light source with lit x_2 with light x_3.

teri'a

cmavo-compound
BAI*
rinka modal, 3d place (phys./mental) causally under conditions ...

teris

cmevla
Terry

terjde

lujvo
x_1 is a danger that x_2 is warned of by event x_3.

terjeftu

lujvo
x_3=j_1 is x_2=j_2 weeks in duration by standard x_1=j_3.
{te} {jeftu}

terji'i

lujvo
x_1 is an opinion about/considered to be x_2 by x_3 with grounds for opinion x_4.

terjmi

lujvo
x_1 is a subject with fact/truth x_2 understood by x_3.

terjoma

fu'ivla
x_1 is a connective/conjunction of grammatical class x_2 for joining x_3 and x_4 in language x_5.
Shortened from {terjonma'o}. See also {terjo'e}, {cmavo}

terjonle'u

lujvo
x_1 (letteral: la'e zo BY/word-bu) is a hyphen/joining letter(al) in language x_2 with function in/context of use/with rules for use/with properties x_3, joining prefixed unit/lexeme/morpheme/string x_4 (quote) to postfixed unit/lexeme/morpheme/string x_5 (quote) in construct (full word) x_6 (quote)
x_1 joins words/morphemes/particles into a single cohesive, grammatical unit. x_4 and x_5 may be improper quotes. In English, "-" is such a hyphen letteral; in Lojban, {ybu}, {ry}, {ny}, and {ly} are such hyphen letterals (arguably, as is {y'y}). The fact that the letteral is used to join words is implicit and this function therefore need not be specified in x_3 in most cases.

terjonma'o

lujvo
x_1 is a connective/conjunction of grammatical class x_2 for joining x_3 and x_4 in language x_5.
See also {terjo'e}, {cmavo}

terjvi

lujvo
x_1 is a contest/competition between rival/opponent x_2 and participant/competitor x_3 with gain/prize x_4
Cf. {jivna}, {nunkei}, {ci'erkei}, {nundamba}, {nunda'a}.

terkagni

lujvo
k_3 is the charter/business/purpose granted/authorized/agreed to by authority k_2 to/for company/corporation/firm/partnership k_1.
Cf. {kagni}.

terkarni

lujvo
k_3 publishes journal/periodical/magazine/[newspaper] k_1 with content k_2 for audience k_4.
Cf. {ckupra}.

terkavbu

lujvo
x_1 is a trap/restraint with x_2 being captured/restrained by x_3 (object/event).

terkla

lujvo
From x_1 to x_2 goes x_3 via x_4 by means x_5.
Cf. {krastu}.

terkubli

lujvo
x_1 is an x_4 (def. x_2-1)-dimensional side of x_2-dimensional polyhedron x_3; x_1 is an edge when x_4=1; x_1 is a vertex when x_4=0.
cf. {te} {kubli}, {cimde}

terkunu

fu'ivla
x_1 is a conifer cone
See also {ckunu}.

terlisri

lujvo
l_3 tells/narrates about subject l_2 with narration l_1 to audience l_4.
Cf. {lisri}, {tavla}, {cusku}, {skicu}, {ciksi}.

termafyfe'i

lujvo
x_1 is a witch/sorceress

terma'i

lujvo
x_3=m_1 is x_2=m_2 months in duration by standard x_1=m_3.
{te} {masti}

terme'u

lujvo
x_3=m_1 is x_2=m_2 minutes in duration by standard x_1=m_3.
{te} {mentu}

termifckiku

lujvo
m_1=c_1 is a cryption key of m_3(cryption/cryptography algorithm)
Names of cryptography algorithms fit into m3. It does not distinguish a public key from a secret key if you choose a public-key cryptography. Also even not to distinguish it is a key to encrypt or not.

termita

fu'ivla
x_1 is a termite of species x_2

termi'u

lujvo
m_3 identifies m_2 with m_1.

termonsi'o

lujvo
s_1=m_3 is a model of forms/events m_2 by which m_1=s_2 is arranged, as thought by s_3.

termosra

lujvo
m_3 (non-agentive) rubs/brushes/scrubs against m_2 with frictional force m_1.
Cf. {mosra}, {termosygau}, {catke}.

termosygau

lujvo
g_1 rubs m_3 against/with m_2 using frictional force m_1.
Cf. {mosra}, {gasnu}, {termosra}, {ca'ermuvgau}.

termu'eske

lujvo
s_1 (mass of facts) is science of / about physics / universal rules of universe / cosmos tm_3 of domain / sphere tm_2, science in question based on methodology s_3.
Made from {termu'e} + {saske}. termu'e1 and saske2 subsumed. saske3 moved to end based on relative uselessness.

termu'i

lujvo
x_1 intends to/going to/is gonna do x_2 with motive x_3.
See also {mukti}, {zukte}

termu'igau

lujvo
x_1 (agent) convinces / persuades / motivates x_2 (agent) to do/be x_3 (ka/nu/zu'o) by means/motivation x_4 (nu)
See {mukti}, {gasnu}. See {bitygau} for another sense of "convince/persuade".

terna'a

lujvo
x_3=n_1 is x_2=n_2 years in duration by standard x_1=n_3.
{te} {nanca}

ternoi

lujvo
n_3 notifies / reports about n_2 in message n_1 to audience n_4.
Cf. {notci}.

ternupcpe

lujvo
n_3=c_1 makes a reservation n_2=c_2 from service provider n_1=c_3 by means c_4.
Cf. {nupre}, {cpedu}.

terpa

gismu
-tep-
-te'a-
x_1 fears x_2; x_1 is afraid/scared/frightened by/fearful of x_2 (event/tu'a object).
Also: x_1 feels terror about x_2; x_2 is fearsome/fearful/frightening/scary to x_1 (= {selte'a} to reorder places). See also {snura}, {xalni}, {xanka}, {virnu}.

terpanbo'u

lujvo
b_1 is a vomer (bone) performing function b_2 in body of b_3.

terpanryziltolju'i

lujvo
x1=j2=p3 (ka; jo'u/fa'u term) is the minor difference in/between x2=p2 and x3=p1 that is to be ignored, their similarity being by standard/in geometry x4; x2 is the same as/similar to/parallels x3 in standard/geometry x4 up to/modulo/except for/ignoring unimportant difference x1;
x1 is not the focus of the main consideration concerning the similarity between x2 and x3; x2 belongs to/is an element of the same equivalence class as x3, which depends on x4 in some way and which ignores the property x1. For example, tetrominoes "L" and "7" are similar up to the unimportant property of 90-degree rotation; thus: loka carna keiku ly terpanryziltolju'i zebu loka mapti. x2 and x3 are symmetric; while with {panra}, x1 (which is x3 in terpanryziltolju'i) is possibly of importance/focus/attention, for terpanryziltolju'i, x2 is. Additionally, lo {panra} and lo se panra are identical, therefore conversion under {te} does not affect the x2 and x3 positions of panra, so the overall structure does not need to have undergone an additional conversion. See: {panra}, {klesi}, {panrykle}, {panryzilbri}

terpebji'o

lujvo
x_1 is the nib/application-tip (for using) pen x_2 and applying ink x_3

terpebji'oganborcisni

lujvo
x_1 is a pen tip/nib with thickness/width x_2; x_2 is the kulmusim/width of the tip of pen/quill x_1
{cisni} is an experimental gismu. x2 could be treated as a unit, but additionally use {gucrau} or just {gutci} for disambiguation.

terpemci

lujvo
p_3 is a poet who has created poem(s)/verse(s) p_1 about plot/theme/subject/pattern p_2 for intended audience p_4.

terpikta

lujvo
p_3 (event/state) is a privilege entitled to p_2 guaranteed by p_1 under conditions p_4.
Cf. {krali}, {velbinra}.

terpinxe

lujvo
x_1=p_3 is a container out of which x_2=p_2 is drunk by x_3=p_1
{te} {pinxe}; see also: {kabri}

terpli

lujvo
x_1 (abstraction) is the purpose of x_2, used by x_3
= {te} {pilno}. See {erpi}, {terzu'e}, {tepi'o}

terporcmi

lujvo
x_1 is a member of the unordered set x_2 upon which rules x_3 are applied in order to produce list x_4; x_1 is a member of the elements constituting list x_4.
Also "x1 is part of list x4". cf. {cmima}, cmavo list {lu'a} and {lo'i}, {porsi}.

terprali

lujvo
x_1 (activity/event) is profitable to x_2, with profit/benefit/gain/advantage x_3
= {te} {prali}

terpygau

lujvo
g_1 frightens t_1 with/by t_2 (event).
Cf. {gasnu}, {terpa}, {selteptce}, {selte'a}.

tersei

lujvo
x_1 is the spatial distance between x_2 and x_3
See also {sepli}, {temci}

tersla

lujvo
s_3 is a activity/[party] for celebrating/recognizing/honoring s_2 (event/abstract) with participants s_1.
Cf. {salci}, {jmaji}, {jikca}, {si'artersla}.

tersmu

lujvo
x_1 understands/interprets/perceives the meaning of utterance/message/communication/symbol x_2 as meaning x_3 (du'u)

tersnidu

lujvo
x_3=s_1 is x_2=s_2 seconds in duration by standard x_1=s_3.
{te} {snidu}

terspe

lujvo
x_1 is a marriage tradition/custom/law according to which x_2 is married to x_3.

tersu'imei

lujvo
x_1 (property/relation) is x_2-ary/-adic

tersu'ubalni

lujvo
b_1=s_3 is a diving platform for diving/controlled falling to s_2 of diving tower/structure (natural/artificial) b_2.

tertau

lujvo
x_1 is the modified part/modificand of binary metaphor x_2 with modifying part x_3, giving meaning x_4 in usage/instance x_5
In both English and Lojban, the word {seltau} is the usual way to refer to the left word in a tanru, whereas {tertau} refers to the right word in the tanru.

tertcidu

lujvo
t_3 is a reading material / literature consisting of texts t_2 with audience t_1; t_3 is literary.
Use {lo'i} for "literature". Cf. {cukta}.

terto

gismu
-tet-
x_1 is a trillion [10^12] of x_2 in dimension/aspect x_3 (default is units).
Cf. {grake}, {mitre}, {snidu}, {stero}, {delno}, {molro}, {kelvo}, {xampo}, {gradu}, {litce}, {merli}, {centi}, {decti}, {dekto}, {femti}, {gigdo}, {gocti}, {gotro}, {kilto}, {megdo}, {mikri}, {milti}, {nanvi}, {petso}, {picti}, {xatsi}, {xecto}, {xexso}, {zepti}, {zetro}.

tervai

lujvo
x_3=v_1 (object/event) is important/significant to x_2=v_2 (person/event) in aspect/for reason x_1=v_3 (nu/ka).
{te} {vajni}

terva'i

lujvo
v_3 evaluates v_2 (object) as v_1 (quality).
Cf. {vamji}, {lanli}, {vajni}, {ckaji}.

tervencpe

lujvo
v_3=c_1 orders/requests v_2=c_2 from v_1=c_3 by means c_4.
Cf. {vecnu}, {cpedu}, {zarci}.

terve'u

lujvo
x_1 is a buyer purchasing goods x_2 from seller x_3 for amount/cost/expense x_4.
Made from {te} + {vecnu}. Short form: {erve}

tervi'a

lujvo
Under conditions x_1, x_2 is seen by x_3.

terxasne

lujvo
x_3 is a/the sweat gland of body x_2 secreting sweat x_1.
Synonymous {xasnycigla}.

terxra

lujvo
p_3 makes an image of p_2 (object/concept) with result p_1 (picture) in medium p_4.
Cf. {pixra}, {larcu}.

terxru

lujvo
x_1 is a state returned to with returned x_2 with return x_3 with state returned from x_4.

teryrorci

lujvo
x_3=r_1 engenders/procreates/begets x_2=r_2 with coparent x_1=r_3.
{te} {rorci}. See also: {rirni}, {selpanzi}

teryru'eca'a

lujvo
c_1 is an output device controlled/[triggered] by c_3 (agent).
Cf. {selru'eca'a}.

terzbasro

lujvo

Cf. {zbasu}, {sorcu}, {zbacu'u}, {selvensro}.

terzbi

lujvo

Cf. {nazbi}, {kevna}, {pluta}, {vasxu}.

terzbipu'i

lujvo

terzi'e

lujvo
x_1 is a right (entitlements/permissions of a legal/moral nature) of x_2 (action/quality) entitled to / held by x_3

terzilkancu

lujvo
x_1 (property) is satisfied by exactly x_2 (number) members among x_3 (plural)
See also {zilkancu}, {kaidza}.

terzu'e

lujvo
z_3 is the purpose of action z_2 by agent z_1.
Cf. {zukte}, {tezu'e}, {erpi}

terzukcau

lujvo
x_1 aimlessly or without purpose or goal does x_2.

tesau

cmavo-compound

sarcu modal, 3rd place (conditions 2) necessarily; necessarily under ...

tesete

tetybivysamsle

lujvo
se_1 is (close to) a trillion (10^12) of eight indivisible, most basic computer subunits of computer se_2; se_1 is a terabyte
In binary a terabyte is actually 1 099 511 627 776 bytes, but we can round off for brevity, and to parallel the metric units.

tibli'u

ticta'u

lujvo

The implied tc_1 is the event of ta_2 wearing ta_1. The implied ta_3 is deceiving tc_2 into tc_3.

lujvo

Cf. {jarco}, {tcica}, {jitfa}.

ticysku

lujvo

Harmful intent or result is not implied. Cf. {cusku}, {tcica}, {jitfa}.

ticyve'u

lujvo
v_1 fraudulently sells v_2 [goods/service/commodity] to buyer v_3=t_2 for amount/cost/expense v_4
from {tcica} {vecnu} c.f. {zerle'a}

ti'ekla

Cf. {trixe}, {klama}.

ti'erna

fu'ivla
x_1 hears (non-literal sense; is told or informed of) x_2 (du'u) from source x_3
Brivla form of {ti'e}. See {tirna}, {jungau}, {sanji}, {xusyju'o}

ti'evro

lujvo
v_1=c_1 is a back door/gateway/access between v_2 and v_3 of structure v_4.
Cf. {cravro}.

tifkai

lujvo
x_1 is the thing(s) shown/indicated/pointed to by the speaker when this word is used

tifmu'eza'i

lujvo
z_1 is real/really exists in this universe for z_2 under metaphysics z_3.
Reality (=loi ro tifmu'eza'i).

tifri

experimental gismu
x_1 is the audience/enjoying party of work/performance/program/transmission/experience x_2 (concrete or abstract); x_1 watches/listens/reads/experiences x_2
All connotations about the judgment of the experience by x_1 are neutral in this definition (despite the use of the "enjoy"). This word references a generalizing concept of x_1 being an audience to some work or experience, such as magic acts (even if x1 participates somewhat), theatrical plays, ovations (radio, storytelling, etc.), television programs, books, discussions or media productions on the Internet, etc. The core concept is audiencehood, regardless of the work being enjoyed/experienced and its form. There are no connotations about how x_2 is perceived by x_1 (that is: which senses are used), nor how x_2 is transmitted nor who or what allows x1 to experience it (that is: whether there is an agentive performer or just a piece of hardware that displays x_2), nor of the nature of x_2; the term is completely generic and general. See also {tigni}, {jarco}, {lifri}, {skina}, {kinzga}, {tirna}, {zgana}, {cradi}, {tivni}

tigdansu

lujvo
d_1 (individual, mass) dances concert dance/performance dance to accompaniment/music/rhythm d_2, for/before audience t_2.

tigni

gismu
-tig-
x_1 performs x_2 [performance] for/before audience x_3.
See also {jarco}.

tigra

experimental gismu
x_1 is a tiger (Panthera tigris) of subspecies/breed x_2
More specific than {tirxu}. See {bramlatu}

ti'i

cmavo
BAI
stidi modal, 1st place suggested by ...; proposed by ...

ti'ivni

fu'ivla
x_1 is a TV/television set/telly with screen/monitor x_2 and television receiver x_3.
Synonymous to {veltivjoividni} which just seems too long for such a common concept. See also: television screen/monitor(={tivyvidni}).

tijdzu

lujvo
x1=t1=c1 plods on surface x2=c2 with limbs x3=c3

See also {tunta}, {darxi}.

tiktaki

fu'ivla
x_1 is the sound of a clock ticking.
See also {onmatopo'eia}.

tilcfu

lujvo
x_1 is rich in details / detailed

tilju

gismu
-tij-
x_1 is heavy/weighty in mass/weight by standard x_2.
(cf. {linto}; {carmi}, se {junri} for metaphor, {bunda}, {junta})

tilminski

lujvo
x_1 (agent) elaborates on x_2 [explains x_2 in more detail] to audience x_3 with description x_4
x_1={skicu}_1={jmina}_1, x_2={skicu}_2={jmina}_3={tcila}_2, x_3={skicu}_3, x_4={skicu}_4={jmina}_2={tcila}_1.

tiltro

lujvo

tilvi'a

timske

lujvo
s_1 is meteorology with methodology s_3.

timsukyja'e

lujvo
x_1=j_1 (event/state) is the meteorological result of sudden weather change from previous weather/weather conditions x_2=j_2 (event/state) at location/region x_3=t_2, discontinuous/sharp at point x_4=s_2, in (more specific) aspect/process/function x_5=s_3

tinbe

gismu
-tib-
x_1 obeys/follows the command/rule x_2 made by x_3; (adjective:) x_1 is obedient.
See also {minde}, {lacri}, {javni}, {flalu}, {zekri}.

tinci

gismu
x_1 is a quantity of/contains/is made of tin (Sn); [metaphor: cheap or base metal].
See also {gunma}, {lante}, {boxfo}, {cnisa}, {jinme}.

tincyzba

lujvo
x_1 is a tinsmith

tingule

fu'ivla
x_1 feels tingling/pins and needles sensation/paresthesia/formication/limb falling asleep sensation/prickling/numbness at locus x_2
Prickling on the back of the neck or when embarrassed/nervous may or may not count. Fluid flowing through orifices (such as micturation) may also be classified as such (or not). Also includes "nerve buzzing" (no macroscopic vibrations or sounds, but it feels like it). See also: {ganse}, {cortu}.

tinju'i

lujvo
t_1=j_1 listens to/pays attention to sound t_2=j_2 with ambient background t_3.
Cf. {zgatirna}.

tinka'e

lujvo
k_1 is able to hear under conditions k_3 (event/state).
See also: {nartinka'e}.

tinmosycpina

lujvo
c_1=m_1=t_2, sound produced by the friction/contact/rubbing between m_2 and m_3, is a gride sound/hair-raising/sets one's teeth on edge/squicks/gives the willies/heebie-jeebies to t_1, who hears it against background/noise t_3.
This is epitomized by the sound of nails on a chalkboard. Short for seltinmosycpina. Cf. {pecrufcpina}.

tinsa

gismu
x_1 is stiff/rigid/inflexible/resistant in direction x_2 against force x_3 under conditions x_4.
Also sometimes: firm, hard; not limited to physical forces; e.g. mental rigidity. See also {bapli}, {jdari}, {nandu}, {torni}, {trati}, {xarnu}, {danre}, {stodi}.

tinydjutci

lujvo
s_1=tu_1 is a tool that aids s_2=ti_1 in hearing ti_2.
Usually an electroacoustic apparatus that fits in or behind the wearer's ear, and is designed to amplify and modulate sound for the wearer. Cf. {tutci}, {cabra}.

ti'o

cmavo
SEI
mathematical expression (mex) operator precedence (discursive).

ti'orkemsamtci

lujvo
t_1 is a shader on computer(s) including s_1.
See also: {ctino}, {ke}, {samtci}.

ti'ormanku

lujvo
x_1=m_1 is shade-darkened/has shadow x_2=c_1 cast upon it by obfuscating/blocking/(at least semi-)opaque object x_3=c_2 from energy/light/transmission source x_4=c_3; x_2 is the shadow-eclipse caste upon x_1 by x_3, blocking radiation from x_4
Possible uses include (but are not limited to) lunar-style eclipses in which the eclipsed object (as seen from another object) is not physically blocked from sight by yet another object but is shaded from sight by the shadow cast upon it by some object (possibly the one from which the eclipse is viewed). There is no real physical difference between this and a solar-style eclipse (both rely on linear alignment of bodies), but the chosen vantage point varies among them and thus causes different interpretations of the same phenomenon of alignment. In other words, it is an eclipse in which the eclipsed object is viewed to be darkened by a shadow (caste upon it by some object) with no significant blocking/impeding body physically betwixt the eclipsed object and the object from which viewing of the eclipse occurs.

ti'otci

lujvo
t_1=c_2 is a shade/blind for blocking light coming from/through c_3
See also {murta}.

tiotka

obsolete fu'ivla
x_1 is an aunt of x_2

tirlasino

fu'ivla
x_1 is a thylacine of species/breed x_2.
From "Thylacinus". See also {daskymabru}.

tirna

gismu
-tin-
x_1 hears x_2 against background/noise x_3; x_2 is audible; (adjective:) x_1 is aural.
See also {kerlo}, {sance}, {smaji}, {savru}, {voksa}, {ganse}, {zgana}.

tirse

gismu
-tir-
x_1 is a quantity of/contains/is made of iron (Fe); [metaphor: strong, durable, tarnishing].
Also (adjective:) x_1 is ferric/ferrous. See also {jinme}, {gasta}, {molki}.

tirxriubatu

obsolete fu'ivla
x_1 is a cheetah with coat/markings x_2.
A large cat of the genus and species Acinonyx jubatus. See also {tirxu}, {tirxrpardu}, {mlatu}.

tirxrpardu

fu'ivla
x_1 is a leopard of species/breed x_2 with coat markings x_2.
Cf. {tirxu}, {tirxrponka}, {mlatu}.

tirxrponka

fu'ivla
x_1 is a jaguar of species/breed with coat markings x_2.
Cf. {tirxu}, {tirxrpardu}, {mlatu}.

tirxu

gismu
x_1 is a tiger/leopard/jaguar/[tigress] of species/breed x_2 with coat markings x_3.
Due to the unusual grouping of concepts in this definition, {tigra} is favored for "tiger". /A great cat noted/recognized by its markings, metaphorically: stripes, tiger markings. See also {mlatu}.

tirxyjvecinfo

lujvo
c_1=t_1 is is a tiglon/tigon of breed/variety c_2=t_2.
A tiglon or tigon is a hybrid cross between a male tiger (Panthera tigris) and a lioness (Panthera leo).

tisna

gismu
-tis-
x_1 (object) fills/becomes stuffed [up]/inflates/blows up with material x_2; x_2 pours into x_1.
Implies some relative degree of fullness will result; agentive filling (= {tisyse'a}, {tisygau}, {tisyzu'e}); inflate/become inflated/blow up (= {gacytisna}, agentive {gacyse'a}); pour into (= {liktisna}, agentive {likse'a}). See also {culno}, {kunti}, {rinci}, {setca}.

tisycanti

lujvo
t_1=c_1 is a sausage filled with t_2.
{tisna} {canti}

titla

gismu
-tit-
x_1 is sweet/sugary/saccharine to observer x_2.
See also {sakta}, {slari}, {kurki}.

titnanba

Cf. {titla}, {nanba}, {jupypesxu}, {rutytisna}.

titselsai

lujvo
s_2=t_1 is dessert(s)/sweet course(s) of meal s_1 (mass).

titselsaismuci

See also: dessert spoon (measuring unit={mucyveldekpu})/measuring instrument={mucyveldekpyvau}).

titspi

lujvo

Cf. {spisa}, {titla}, {titnanba}, {sairfa'o}.

titygejyspa

tityzme

ti'u

cmavo
BAI
tcika modal, 1st place (for letters) associated with time ... ; attach time stamp.

ti'u'a

experimental cmavo
BAI
at N o'clock; at the hour N of the day.
{djecacrytcika} modal. ex. lo trene cu cliva ti'u'a li so (The train departs at nine o'clock.) See also {ti'u}; {ti'u'e}, {ti'u'i}.

ti'u'e

experimental cmavo
BAI
at the minute N of the hour.
{cacryme'utcika} modal. ex. mi ti xrukla ti'u'e li ci no (I will be back at thirty minutes past the hour.) See also {ti'u}; {ti'u'a}, {ti'u'i}.

ti'u'i

experimental cmavo
BAI
at the second N of the minute.
{metnidytcika} modal. ex. samymri ti mi ti'u'i li vo xa (This was e-mailed to me at 46 seconds past the minute.) See also {ti'u}; {ti'u'a}, {ti'u'e}.

tivni

gismu
-tiv-
x_1 broadcasts/televises programming x_2 via medium/channel x_3 to television receiver x_4.
Also x_1 is a broadcaster; x_2 programming (mass), program/show (ind.). See also {cradi}, {skina}, {vidni}, {benji}, {tcana}.

tivyvidni

lujvo
v_1 is a TV screen/television monitor showing graphics/information from television receiver t_4=v_2.
See also: TV/television set/telly (={veltivjoividni}/{ti'ivni})

tix

cmevla
Daughter
Cf. {tixnu}, {bes}, {mes}, {bun}, {mam}, {paf}.

tixmamta

lujvo
m_1=t_2 is the mother of daughter m_2=t_1.
Cf. {besmamta}, {tixpa'u}.

tixnu

gismu
-tix-
-ti'u-
x_1 is a daughter of mother/father/parents x_2; [not necessarily biological].
See also {bersa}, {panzi}.

tizma'e

lujvo
m_1 is a wheelchair/permobile carrying m_2 in/on surface/medium m_3, propelled by force m_4.

to

cmavo
TO
left parenthesis; start of parenthetical note which must be grammatical Lojban text.

to'a

cmavo
BY1
lower-case letteral shift.

to'ai

experimental cmavo
SE
conversion: move ['drag-and-drop'] 3rd place to 1st position. Everything else stays in the same order.
Before: x1 x2 x3 x4 x5, after: x3 x1 x2 x4 x5. Has the same effect as "te se". Proposed rafsi: -toz-

to'alfu

fu'ivla
x_1 (la'e zo BY/word-bu) is a lower-case letter/digit/symbol in alphabet/character-set x_2 representing x_3.
Syn {to'a zei lerfu}. See also {lerfu}, {to'a}, {ga'elfu}.

to'anzu

fu'ivla
x_1 pertains to Tòaq Dzũ culture/community/language in aspect x_2
Tòaq Dzũ is a constructed language created by la selpa'i.

to'a zei lerfu

zei-lujvo
x_1 (la'e zo BY/word-bu) is a lower-case letter/digit/symbol in alphabet/character-set x_2 representing x_3.
See also {lerfu}, {to'a}, {ga'e zei lerfu}.

tocyrapli

lujvo
x_1=t_1 tries to do/attain x_2=t_2 (ka) by actions/method x_3=t_3 (ka) for a total number of tries x_4=r_2.
cf. {troci}, {rapli}.

todbi'olanka

lujvo
l_1 is the chrysalis of species t_2.
Cf. {toldi}, {binxo}, {lanka}, {ciftoldi}.

todma'u

lujvo
x_1 is butterfly imago/adult butterfly of species x_2

todytaibo'u

lujvo
b_1 is a sphenoid bone (os sphenoidale) performing function b_2 in body of b_3.

to'e

cmavo
-tol-
-to'e-
NAhE
polar opposite scalar negator.

to'ebo

cmavo-compound
NAhE+BO
negation sumti qualifier: the opposite of.
Cf. {to'e}, {bo}, {na'ebo}, {no'ebo}, {je'abo}.

to'ei'au

experimental cmavo
VUhU
binary mathematical operator: Jordan totient function J_a(b)
Produces the number of a-tuples of strictly positive integers all less than or equal to b that form a coprime (a+1)-tuple together with b. J_1=Phi where Phi is the Euler totient function.

to'eki'unai

cmavo-compound
BAI*
na'e tolki'u modal, first place; despite the reason...
Cf. {na'e} {tolki'u}

to'emu'inai

cmavo-compound
BAI*
na'e tolmu'i modal, first place; despite the motive...
Cf. {na'e}, {tolmu'i}.

to'eni'inai

cmavo-compound
BAI*
na'e tolni'i modal, first place; despite the logically sufficient condition...
Cf. {na'e}, {tolni'i}.

to'eri'anai

cmavo-compound
BAI*
na'e tolri'a modal, first place; despite the cause...
Cf. {na'e}, {tolri'a}.

togmo'a

lujvo
x_1 is a melody consisting of tones/pitches x_2

togra'ijmavra

lujvo
v_1 is a sostenuto pedal of instrument x_2=t_3.
Cf. {togysmajmavra}, {pipno}.

togygu'i

lujvo
x_1 [energy] is laser illuminating x_2 from light source x_3 with frequency x_4.

togysmajmavra

lujvo
x_1 is a soft pedal of instrument x_2=t_3.
Cf. {togra'ijmavra}, {pipno}.

toi

cmavo
TOI
elidable terminator: right parenthesis/end unquote; seldom elidable except at end of text.

to'i

cmavo
TO
open editorial unquote (within a quote); contains grammatical text; mark with editorial insert.

toi'e

experimental cmavo
TOIhE
start UI-applicative metalinguistic UI-parenthetical
Presently (without this word), there is no "official" way to apply a UI cmavo to another (instead, they merely express simultaneous emotions pertaining to the relevant construct). This word begins a parenthetical which can contain UI cmavo and applies these cmavo as a string of UI to the immediately previous UI cmavo metalinguistically (as if the external UI is/are any other type of word which can be acted upon by UI). An omitted UI (external or internal) in this case is equivalent to {ge'e}. Since the produced parenthetical functions as UI, nested or subsequent such parentheticals operate on it as it operates on external UI cmavo. For details on grouping and application, see {koi'e}. See also: {toi'o}.

toi'o

experimental cmavo
TOIhO
end UI-applicative metalinguistic UI-parenthetical (elidable terminator)
Terminates {toi'e} parenthetical. Inherently functions as {fu'o} (only if abstraction-level and otherwise appropriately accessed) on any internal UI cmavo, with the added functionality of metalinguistic application. See also: {toi'e}.

tokios

obsolete cmevla
Tokyo

toknu

gismu
-tok-
x_1 is an oven [enclosure that heats its contents] for baking/heating/drying x_2.
See also {nanba}.

tokpona

fu'ivla
x_1 reflects Toki Pona culture/nationality/language in aspect x_2

toksina

fu'ivla
x_1 is a toxine

tolba'i

lujvo
b_1 is low/inferior/abject in property b_2 (ka) by standard b_3.
Cf. {to'e}, {banli}, {malfadni}.

tolbanzu

lujvo
x_1 (object) is utterly insufficient for purpose x_2 under conditions x_3.
{to'e}+{banzu}

tolba'o

lujvo
b_1 shrinks/contracts to size/into form b_2 from b_3.
Cf. {banro}, {cmaze'a}, {brame'a}, {cmabi'o}.

tolcanci

lujvo
c_1 materializes/suddenly appears at location c_2 according to senses/sensor c_3.
{to'e} {canci}, see also {spaji}, {zgana}

tolcando

lujvo
c_1 is busy.
Cf. {to'e}, {cando}, {zukcfu}.

tolcau

lujvo
x_1 has/is with x_2

tolcfa

lujvo
c_1 [state/event/process] concludes/ceases/stops/ends its occurrence.

tolcfabalvi

lujvo
x_1 (event) happens in the aftermath of x_2; x_1 happens after the end of x_2
See also {cfapru}, {ba'o}.

tolcfagau

lujvo
g_1 stops/ends c_1 [state/event/process].
Cf. {to'e}, {cfari}, {gasnu}, {sisti}.

tolcfari'i

lujvo
r_1 is/are the ritual/proceedings for adjourning/ending c_1[event/state/process] by community r_2 with rules c_4.
{to'e}, {cfari}, {cfari'i}, {sisti}, {mulgau}, {fanmo}.

tolcilce

lujvo
(adjective:) c_1 is tame / “un-wild”.
See also: {cilce}, {to'e}

tolcimni

lujvo
c_1 is finite/ending/unlasting/limited in property/dimension c_2, to degree c_3 (quantity)/of type c_3
See {to'e} {cimni}.

tolcimnyselcmi

lujvo
c_2 is a finite set with members c_1.
See also: {cimnyselcmi}.

tolci'o

lujvo
c_1 is old (opposite of young) by standard c_2.

tolci'oze'a

lujvo
x1=c1=z1 grows old by amount x2=z3

tolckape

lujvo
c_1 is safe for c_2 under conditions c_3
from {to'e} {ckape} c.f. {nurxru} {tolnu'a}

tolckire

lujvo
x_1 feels resentment/bitterness towards x_2 for action x_3; x_1 is resentful
See {to'e} {ckire}

tolclite

lujvo
c_1 is rude in matter c_2 according to standard/custom c_3.
Cf. {clite}, {to'e}, {le'o}, {sezytoltro}.

tolcliva

lujvo
x_1 arrives at x_2 via route x_3

tolcpa

lujvo
c_1 leaves c_2, which they brought, at c_3
Cf. {to'e}, {cpacu}, {cirko}, {punji}, {norcpa}, {fesli'a}, {radycru}.

tolcri

lujvo
x_1 acquires property x_2 (ka).

tolcru

lujvo
x_1 forbids/prohibits x_2 under conditions x_3.
See also {e'anai}

tolcu'i

lujvo
c_1 (event/state/property) is impossible under condition c_2.
Cf. {cumki}.

tolcumla

lujvo
x_1=c_1 is cocky/chesty/arrogant about x_1=c_2 (abstraction).

toldarsi

lujvo
x_1 is timid/shy/abashed/reluctant to do /be x_2.
See also {u'ocu'i}

toldarsygau

lujvo
x_1 discourages x_2 from doing/being x_3.
See also {e'enai}

toldi

gismu
-tod-
x_1 is a butterfly/moth of species/breed x_2.
See also {cinki}.

toldicra

lujvo
d_1 (event) resumes/[continues/restarts] d_2 (object/event/process) due to quality d_3; d_2 starts again

toldji

lujvo
x_1 is reluctant/unwilling/disinclined to x_2 for purpose x_3.
See also {aunai}

toldju

lujvo
x_1 frustrates / hinders x_2 from doing event/activity x_3; x_1 makes doing x_3 harder for x_2
Not the emotional sense of "frustrate", which is {se} {steba} or {fanza}. This is a difficult concept to gloss in English; the desired sense is more like "un-help", and is equivalent to {to'e} {sidju}. See {zunti}

toldra

lujvo
d_1 is wrong in property/aspect d_2 (ka) in situation d_3 by standard d_4.
Cf. {drani}, {xlali}.

toldrpleksipi

fu'ivla
x_1 is a monarch butterfly of subspecies x_2.
Member of species Danaus plexippus. Cf. {toldi}.

toldu'e

lujvo
x_1 is a shortage/deficiency/insufficiency/derth/too little of x_2 by standard x_3.
See also {mo'a}

tolfalkla

lujvo
k_1=f_1 comes/goes against stream/current/gravity/force to destination k_2=f_2 from origin k_3=f_3 in in gravity well/frame of reference f_4 via route k_4 using means/vehicle k_5.

tolfalnu

lujvo
x_1 is a fan, a propeller for creating movement in fluid x_2 by drawing power from a vehicle/motor x_3
Note that {falnu} is a device (x1) for converting the movement of some fluid medium x2 into power for some motor or vehicle x3.

tolfa'o

lujvo
x_1 is a beginning of thing/process x_2
See also {fanmo}, {krasi}

tolfau

lujvo
x_1 (event) is an event that doesn't happen/occur/take place
See {fasnu}.

tolfa'u

lujvo
f_1 rises to f_2 from f_3 in gravity well/frame of reference f_4.
Cf. {to'e}, {farlu}, {galmu'u}.

tolfaucu'i

lujvo
under conditions x_2, it is possible that x_1 (event/state/property) doesn't happen

tolfautolcu'i

lujvo
under conditions x_2, it is not possible that x_1 (event/state/property) doesn't happen / x_1 necessarily happens

tolfekybi'o

lujvo
f_1=b_1 (action/event) becomes calm/calms down/is pacified under conditions f_2 by standard b_3.
For person, use tu'a x1.

tolferti

lujvo
x_1 is sterile/non-fertile/unable to procreate x_2; x_1 is unable to support the growth/development of x_2
See {ferti}

tolfragapci

lujvo
x_1=t_1=g_1 is inert gas of material/composition including x_2=g_2, under conditions x_3=g_3.
Inert gases are different from noble gases both in the intension and the extension. Noble gases, nitrogen gas and some compound gases are called inert gas depending on context, though some heavier noble gases, as well as nitrogen, react with other substances under certain conditions. See {to'e} {frati} {gapci}; {navni}.

tolfrinyna'u

lujvo
x_1 is an irrational number.
{to'e} {frinu} {namcu}. See also {frinyna'u}, {xarna'u}, {tolxarna'u}, {mrena'u}, {lujna'u}.

tolgei

lujvo
g_1 is gloomy/downcast/unhappy about g_2 (event/state).
Cf. {to'e}, {gleki}, {badri}.

tolgeitce

lujvo
m_1=g_1 is miserable/in dispair about g_2 (event/state).
Cf. {to'e}, {gleki}, {mutce}.

tolgurgau

lujvo
x_1=ga_1 unrolls/unravels object x_2=gu_1 on/against surface x_3=gu_2, with axis/ axle of rotation x_4=gu_3.
Cf. {to'e}, {gunro}, {gasnu}.

tolja'e

lujvo
The negation of x_1 (event/state) is a result/outcome/conclusion of antecedent x_2 (event/state). x_1 is prevented by x_2.
{to'e} {jalge}. “lo nu broda cu tolja'e lo nu brode” has the same meaning as “lo nu na broda cu jalge lo nu brode”.

toljgari

lujvo
j_1 lets go/releases j_2 from j_3 (part of j1) at locus j_4 (part of j2).
Cf. {to'e}, {jgari}, {zifcru}.

tolju'i

lujvo
x_1 avoids/ignores/directs attention away from object/affair x_2.
See also {a'anai}

toljursa

lujvo
x1=j1 is gentle to x2=j2

tolkai

lujvo
x_1 is characterized by the polar opposite of x_2 (ka)
Brivla form of {to'e}; (ko'a tolkai lo ka broda) = (ko'a to'e broda). See {dukti}, {norkai}

tolkanxe

lujvo
k_1 is an alternative denial (nand/Scheffer stroke ↑), stating that k_2 (du'u) and k_3 (du'u) are not both true.
Truth-condition: FTTT (={inajanai}). Scheffer stroke ↑ (=tolkanxe bu).

tolkargu

lujvo
k_1 (object/commodity/property/event) is inexpensive to k_2 by standard k_3.
Cf. {to'e}, {kargu}.

tolkau

lujvo
x_1 (property) is not satisfied by anything among x_2 (plural)
See also {kampu}, {nonydza}

tolke'i

lujvo
x_1 is callous/implacable/heartless/merciless/ruthless towards x_2 (person) about x_3 (abstraction).
See also {kusru}, {uunai}

tolki'u

lujvo
x_1 (event/state) is a reason/justification/explanation for/causing/permitting the negation of x_2 (event/state). x_1 prevents x_2.
{to'e} {krinu}. “lo nu broda cu tolki'u lo nu brode” has the same meaning as “lo nu broda cu krinu lo nu na brode”.

tolkli

lujvo
x1 (object/medium) is unclear/murky/obfuscating/(at least somewhat/semi-)opaque/impeding/with obstacle/fogs with regard to transmission x2
Do not use for "befuddling"/"confusing". A solar-style eclipse could be so characterized (in which case medium x1 is the solid body of Luna or another significant object); an eclipse caused by a significant physical object blocking the viewing of another (from yet another) by physically intervening (being positioned betwixt them).

tolkraice

fu'ivla
x_1 is disloyal / unfaithful / treacherous to x_2 (person, institution, or custom)
= {to'e} {kraice}. See {traide}

tolkri

lujvo
x_1 disbelieves/rejects x_2 as false about x_3.
See also {ianai}

tolku'arka

fu'ivla
x_1 is an antiquark of flavor x_2
See {ku'arka}

tolkuflenku

lujvo
x_1 is uncomfortably cold to x_2
See {lenku}, {tolkufra}, {kuflenku}, {tolkufygla}

tolkufra

lujvo
k_1 feels discomfort/is uncomfortable with conditions/environmental property(ies) k2.
Cf. {to'e}, {kufra}, {cinmo}.

tolkufygau

lujvo
x_1 is creepy/terrible/unpleasant/troubling to/creeps out x_2; x_1 is creepy/terrible/unpleasant/troubling
{juxre}, {kufra}, {gasnu}

tolkufygla

lujvo
x_1 is uncomfortably hot to x_2
See {glare}, {kufra}, {kufygla}

tolku'o

lujvo
k_1 is a ridge in/on object/surface k_2.
Cf. {to'e}, {skuro}.

tolmadba'i

lujvo
b_1=m_3 grandly exhibits the corruptness b_2=m_1 of unethical mass b_3=m_2.

tolmanfo

lujvo
x_1 (object/event) is irregular/heterogenous in property x_2 (ka).
See also: {manfo}.

tolmapti

lujvo
m_1 is incompatible with m_2 in aspect m_3.
Cf. {frica}, {dukti}.

tolmencre

lujvo
c_1=m_2 (person) is unintelligent/dumb/stupid by standard c_3.
Cf. {menli}, {certu}, {bebna}, {pensi}, {mencre}

tolmifygau

lujvo
g_1 deciphers m_1 into m_2 out of coding system m_3.
{kligau}, {ciksi}, {jimpe}, {tcidu}.

tolmle

lujvo
x_1 is ugly to x_2 in aspect x_3 (ka) by aesthetic standard x_4.
Example 15.73 (cll 1.1). Cf. {to'e}, {melbi}, {tolmlemau}, {tolmlerai}, {mectolmlerai}, {tolmleme'a}, {tolmletce}.

tolmlemau

lujvo
z_1=m_1 is uglier/[more unsightly] than z_2 to m_2 in aspect m_3 (ka) by amount z_4.
Cf. {to'e}, {melbi}, {zmadu}, {tolmle}, {tolmlerai}, {mectolmlerai}, {tolmleme'a}.

tolmleme'a

lujvo
ml_1=me_1 is less ugly/unsightly than ml_2 to me_2 in aspect me_3 (ka) by amount ml_4.
Cf. {to'e}, {melbi}, {mleca}, {tolmlemau}, {tolmlerai}, {mectolmlerai}.

tolmlerai

lujvo
m_1=t_1 is the ugliest/[most unsightly] among set/range t_3 to m_2 in aspect m_3 (ka) by aesthetic standard m_4.
Cf. {to'e}, {melbi}, {zmadu}, {tolmle}, {tolmlemau}, {mectolmlerai}, {tolmleme'a}.

tolmletce

lujvo
m_1=t_1 is hideous/grotesque to t_2 in aspect t_3 (ka) by aesthetic standard t_4.
Cf. {to'e}, {melbi}, {mutce}, {tolmle}.

tolmocpla

lujvo
x_1 invents strategy (long-term plan) x_2 for achieving x_3 (event/state).

tolmo'i

lujvo
m_1 forgets fact/memory m_2 about subject m_3.
Cf. {to'e}, {morji}, {nalmo'i}. Assumes that {morji} refers to a change of state i.e. 'remember'= 'bring to mind'.

tolmu'i

lujvo
x_1 (event/state) motivates/is a motive/incentive for the negation of x_2 (event/state), per volition of x_3. x_1 prevents x_2.
{to'e} {mukti}. “lo nu broda cu tolmu'i lo nu brode” has the same meaning as “lo nu broda cu mukti lo nu na brode”.

tolna'e

lujvo
x_1 (du'u) confirms/corroborates/verifies x_2 (du'u) under rules/logic x_3; x_1 (du'u) is an evidence for x_2 (du'u)
See {to'e} {natfe}

tolnei

lujvo
x_1 dislikes x_2
= {to'e} {nelci}. See {xebni}, {rigni}

tolni'i

lujvo
x_1 (event/state) logically necessitates/entails/implies the negation of x_2 (event/state), under rules/logic system x_3. x_1 prevents x_2.
{to'e} {nibli}. “lo nu broda cu tolni'i lo nu brode” has the same meaning as “lo nu broda cu nibli lo nu na brode”.

tolni'o

lujvo
x_1 is old (un-novel) to observer x_2 in feature x_3 (ka) by standard x_4
{laldo} (= {to'e} {citno}) is old in terms of age, while {tolni'o} (= {to'e} {cnino}) is old in terms of novelty. See {slabu}

tolnu'a

lujvo
s_1 is threatened by s_2 (event)
from {to'e} {snura} c.f. {ckape}

tolpa'a

lujvo
x_1 despairs/is despondent/pessimistic about x_2, expected likelihood x_3.
Cf. {to'e}, {pacna}, {norpa'a}. See also {a'onai}

tolpanra

lujvo
x_1 contrasts-with/is-distinguished-from/is-set-apart-from x_2 in property/aspect x_3
Things are parallel, analogous or equivalent in some property when they share that property, not when they differ in it, so the te {panra} has to be the property which they share and makes them parallel. When the focus is on a property that they don't share, the things are said to contrast in that property, they are not parallel in it. See also {panra}.

tolpifygau

lujvo
x_1 frees/liberates/releases x_2 from captivity by x_3

tolplana

lujvo
x_1 is thin/skinny/[underweight] [excessively thin/unswollen] by standard x_2
If you believe in a difference between {rotsu} and {plana}, then you believe in the difference between {cinla} and {tolplana}. cf. {barda}, {cinla}, {ganra}, {rotsu}, {clani}, {tordu}, {condi}, {caxno}, {cmalu}, {plana}.

tolplixau

lujvo
x_1 is worse than useless to agent x_2 by the standard of purpose x_3
See {narplixau}, {plixau}, {mabla}, {xlali}

tolplo

lujvo
p_1 (force) unbends/smoothens/flattens p_2 at locus/flatten crease(s)/bend(s) p_3.

tolplogau

lujvo
p_1=g_1 [person/agent] unbends/smoothens/flattens p_2 at locus/flatten crease(s)/bend(s) p_3.

tolpluja

lujvo
p_1 is simple/not complicated/not complex/easy/not intricate in aspect/property p_2 by standard p_3

tolpo'u

lujvo
x_1 is functional/operational/usable for function x_2; x_1 works properly
See also {spofu}, {cikre}, {daspo}.

tolprali

lujvo
x_1 is a damage/harm/loss to x_2 resulting from activity/process x_3.
See also {prali}

tolpro

lujvo
p1 permits/consents p2 (person/force ind./mass) about p3 (abstract).

tolpu'a

lujvo
p_1 (event/state) seems unpleasant to p_2 under conditions p_3.
See also: {to'e}, {pluka}

tolracli

lujvo
x_1=r_1 (action/activity/behavior) is irrational by standard x_2=r_2
Inadequate reason or emotional distress may for example be the motivation of an irrational event. Cf. {racli}.

tolri'a

lujvo
x_1 (event/state) effects/physically causes the negation of x_2 (event/state). x_1 prevents x_2.
{to'e} {rinka}. “lo nu broda cu tolri'a lo nu brode” has the same meaning as “lo nu broda cu rinka lo nu na brode”.

tolrinsa

lujvo
r_1 opposite of greets / offers goodbyes to r_2 in manner r_3 (action).
Made from {to'e} + {rinsa}.

tolri'ugau

lujvo
x_1 releases x_2 from restraint/binding x_3 to do/be x_4 .
See also {rinju}, {gasnu}, {zifcru}

tolrunjavji'e

lujvo
j_1=r_1 is/pertains to nature (geology/wildlife).

tolsakci

lujvo
s_1 blows/exhales fluid/gas from high pressure of s_2 to low pressure of s_3.
Cf. {to'e}, {sakci}, {bifca'e}.

tolse'a

lujvo
s_1 (agent) withdraws/pulls out/extracts/removes s_2 from interior/members of s_3
from {to'e} {setca}

tolselci'i

lujvo
x_1=c_2 is bored with x_2=c_1.
Cf. {cinri}, {selci'i}, {nalselci'i}, {norselci'i}, {a'unai}.

tolselklosamseltcana

lujvo
t_2=d_2 is a/the wide area network (WAN) that includes nodes t_1=d_1=s_1 whose function/purpose is s_2.
See also: {selklosamseltcana}, {samseltcana}.

tolselmansa

lujvo
m_2 is dissatisfied by m_1 with regard to property (ka)/state m_3.
Cf. {mansa}, {selmansa}, {tolgei}.

tolselto'i

lujvo
t_2 (load/force/torque) untwists t_1.
Cf. {to'e}, {torni}.

tolsi'a

lujvo
x_1 disrespects/disregards/snubs/derides x_2.
Cf. {to'e}, {sinma}, {tolsi'arai}, {ionai}.

tolsi'arai

lujvo
t_1=s_1 holds s_2 in utmost contempt among set/range t_4.
Cf. {to'e}, {sinma}, {traji}, {tolsi'a}, {ionai}.

tolsisti

lujvo
x_1 [agent] begins activity/process/state x_2.
Cf. {to'e}, {sisti}, {cfagau}, {co'arbi'o}.

tolsnuti

lujvo
x_1 (event) is deliberate, intentional on the part of x_2
See also {zukte}, {jai} {zu'e}

tolspe

lujvo
x_1 is a bachelor / single / unmarried.

tolspofu

lujvo
x_1 is capable of performing functions/ready for use or service x_2; x_1 is operable, functional, operational, usable, unbroken, useable, utile
See also {akti}, {ka'e} se {pilno}, {spofu}

tolsraseldau

lujvo
d_2=s_2 is a con/contra-argument (C) against argument s_2, by arguer d_1.

tolstace

lujvo
x_1 is dishonest to x_2 about matter/fact x_3
= {to'e} {stace}. See {jifsku}, {ticysku}, {traide}

tolsti

lujvo
x_1 [agent] begins activity/process/state x_2.
Cf. {to'e}, {sisti}, {cfagau}, {co'arbi'o}.

tolsurcaukancu

lujvo
k_1 subitizes (effortlessly/immediately/instantly counts the number in/recognizes the cardinality of) set k_2 to be k_3 [number/count], counted by/in terms of units k_4
"Counting off" does not really make sense for this word. Must be extremely rapid without very much active tabulation/numeric processing/calculation; also must be confident and accurate in order to be true subitization (although this word my apply to false/imperfect subitization). See also: {tolsurla}, {kancu}.

tolsurla

lujvo
s_1 expends effort/is actively/effortfully involved in doing/being s_2 (activity)
See also: {a'i}, {lazni}, {renvi}, {snada}, {surla}, {tatpi}, {troci}.

tolta'i

lujvo
x_1 is unfatigued/unwearied/refreshed/feels energetic due to x_2 (event)

toltankomo

fu'ivla
x_1 (agent) does x_2 (amount/property of x_1) as little as it/he/she/they do(es) x_3 (relation between x_1 and x_2)
See also {tankomo}.

toltaske

lujvo
t_1 is quenched and has enough of drink/fluid/lubrication t_2.
See also {banzu}, {taske} {tolxagji}, {pinxe}.

toltce

lujvo
x_1 is little/limited in property x_2 towards x_3.
See also {so'u}

toltelgau

lujvo
g_1 unlocks lock s_1 on s_2 by mechanism s_3.
Cf. {to'e}, {stela}, {gasnu}, {telgau}, {telga'o}, {telcaugau}, {kargau}.

toltende

lujvo
x_1 (entity) is disinclined to do/be x_2 (ka)
= {to'e} {tende}. See {rivbi}, {toldarsi}, {toldji}

toltenfa

lujvo
x_1 is the exponential root of x_2 with exponent x_3 // x_1 is the x_3th root of x_2 // x_1 = \sqrt[x_3]{x_2}
Brivla form of {fe'a}. See {tenfa}, {dugri}

toltinsa

lujvo
x_1 is flexible/supple/limber/bendable/non-resistant in direction x_2 against force x_3 under conditions x_4.
not limited to physical forces; e.g. mental rigidity. See also {tinsa}, {ranti}, {bapli}, {jdari}, {nandu}, {torni}, {trati}, {xarnu}, {danre}, {stodi}.

toltu'i

lujvo
x_1 disagrees with person(s)/position/side x_2 that x_3 (du'u) is true about matter x_4.
See also {ienai}

tolve'i

lujvo
x_1 forgets experience x_2 (li'i)
= {to'e} {vedli}. See {tolmo'i}, {li'i}, {li'imdu}

tolvlina

lujvo
v_1 is a joint denial (nor/Peirce's arrow ↓), stating that neither v_2 (du'u) nor v_3 (du'u) are true.
Truth-condition: FFFT (={inajenai}). Peirce's arrow ↓(=tolvlina bu).

tolvri

lujvo
x_1 is a coward in activity x_2 (event) by standard x_3.
Cf. {to'e}, {virnu}, {pronalka'e}, {u'onai}.

tolvudypai

lujvo
v_1=p_1 is unfair / is corrupt (in authority) / does injustice to/in matter p_2 by standard v_2.
See also: {vudypai}

tolvu'e

lujvo
v_1 is immoral by standard v_2.

tolvut

cmevla
rabies.
See also {tolvutu}.

tolvutu

fu'ivla
x_1 is rabid with symptoms x_2.
See also {tolvut}.

tolxagji

lujvo
xa_1 is sated/full and has enough of food/fuel xa_2.
See also: {xagji}, {banzu}, {toltaske}, {cidja}, {citka}.

tolxanka

lujvo
x_1 is calm/tranquil/serene about x_2 (abstraction) under conditions x_3.
Cf. {to'e}, {xanka}.

tolxarna'u

lujvo
x_1 is a real number.
{mrena'u} is another lujvo for the same meaning. Cf. {to'e} {xanri} {namcu}, {mrena'u}; {xarna'u}, {lujna'u}; {ka'o}

tolxregau

lujvo
x_1=g_1 separates/unmixes x_2=m_1 into components x_3=m_2.
cf. {mixre}, {gasnu}

tolxu'a

lujvo
x_1 (agent) denies that x_2 (du'u) is true.
Cf. {to'e}, {xusra}, {natfe}, {nafmupli}, {nafxu'a}.

tolylau

lujvo
x_1 is soft/quiet/making only a bit of noise, at observation point x_2 by standard x_3.
“Silent” is {smaji}, whereas tolylau refers to a small amount of sound. Likewise, “totally noisy” is {tolsma}, which is even greater than {cladu}. {smaji} < {tolylau} < {cladu} < {tolsma}.

tolylaxygau

lujvo
g_1 unbalances l_1 with force l_2.
Cf. {to'e}, {lanxe}, {gasnu}.

tolylazni

lujvo
l_1 (person) is hardworking/working hard at work/effort concerning action l_2.
Cf. {lazni}.

tolyli'a

lujvo
c_1 arrives at c_2 via route c_3.
Cf. {cliva}, {tolcanci}.

tolyli'armi

lujvo
x_1 (du'u - fact or kau-question) is obscure (not easily understood) / unclear to x_2
{to'e} {li'armi}. See {li'anai}

tolzau

lujvo
x_1 disapproves of/objects to plan/action x_2.
See also {i'anai}

tolzdi

lujvo
x_1 is boring/dreary/wearisome/tedious to x_2 in property/aspect x_3.
See also {u'inai}

tolzi'o

lujvo
x_1 is Arctic in aspect x_2.
see also {berti}

tonberi

fu'ivla
x1 is a Tonberry of species/breed/strain/type x2
Tonberries are not edible plant parts! Beware!

tonga

gismu
-tog-
-to'a-
x_1 is a tone/note of frequency/pitch x_2 from source x_3.
See also {rilti}, {zgike}, {janbe}, {siclu}.

to'o

cmavo
FAhA4
location tense relation/direction; departing from/directly away from ...

to'okla

lujvo
x_1 goes/moves away from x_2
{klama} {to'o} x_2. See {cliva}, {muvdu}

torbrato'a

lujvo
x1=tor1=ton1 is a squeak from source x2=ton3

torceli

fu'ivla
x_1 is x_2 torrs by standard x_3.
synonym {magmiltre}

torcrida

lujvo
c_1 is a dwarf of mythos/religion c_2, short by measurement standard t_3.
Cf. {torpre}, {brabracrida}, {firkre}, {ranmi}.

tordu

gismu
-tor-
-to'u-
x_1 is short in dimension/direction x_2 (default longest dimension) by measurement standard x_3.
See also {cmalu}, {jarki}, {caxno}, {cinla}, {clani}.

torluznaukosta

lujvo
x_1 is a doublet

torneio

fu'ivla
x_1 is a tournament for gain x_2
See {grinunjvi}, {jivna}

torni

-ton-
-to'i-
x_1 twists under load/force/torsion x_2.
See also {tinsa}, {trati}.

torpalku

lujvo
p_1=t_1 are shorts [short pants] of material p_2, short in the “leg” direction, short by measurement standard t_3.
Cf. {tordu}, {palku}.

torpre

lujvo
t_1=p_1 is a dwarf/midget [short in stature resulting from a medical condition; not not necessarily human] by standard t_3.
Not to be confused with "Little people [mythology]" (={ridytorpre}), "Hobbit" (={ridrxobi}), "Dwarf" [mythology/fantasy] (={du'erga}).

torsipna

lujvo
x1=s1 naps/[sleeps for a short time]

torso

experimental gismu
x_1 is the torso (part of body excluding head and limbs) of x_2
See {cutne}, {betfu}, {xadni}, {stani}

tortei

lujvo
t_1 is a short time/duration/interval/period/elapsed time from time/event t_2 to time/event t_3.
Cf. {clatei}, {snidu}.

tortiia

fu'ivla
x_1 is a Mexican tortilla, a flat round bread made out of x_2 (e.g. cornmeal or flour)
In Mexican cuisine often served with a filling or topping such as {dembi} - 'beans', {rectu} - 'meat', {sanso} - 'sauce', {smetana} - 'sour cream' or {cirla} - 'cheese'. Spanish tortilla is {omle}.

torveki

fu'ivla
x_1 is a summary of x_2 (subject), described by x_3 to audience x_4
See also {tordu}, {skicu}, {uenzi}

to'u

cmavo
UI3
discursive: in brief - in detail.
See also {tordu}, {clani}, {tcidu}.

to'unai

cmavo-compound
UI*3
discursive: in brief - in detail.

traduki

fu'ivla
x_1 translates x_2 (source) into x_3 (result/product)
Similar to {fanva} but with different place structure. fanva_3 and fanva_4 can be mimicked by attaching {pe} {bau} to the x_2 and x_3.

tradutxu'a

lujvo
x_1=t_1 is hypocritical in action t_2=d_1, which is contrary to assertion x_2, under conditions t_3.
Cf. {dukti}, {tarti}, {xusra}, {jitfa}, {tcica}.

traide

fu'ivla
x_1 betrays custom x_2 (proposition); x_1 is a traitor; x_1 violates their allegiance
See {zekri}

traji

gismu
-rai-
x_1 is superlative in property x_2 (ka), the x_3 extreme (ka; default ka zmadu) among set/range x_4.
Also: x_1 is x_3-est/utmost in x_2 among x_4; x_1 is the x_3 end of x_4; x_1 is extreme; x_1 is simply x_3. (cf. cmavo list {rai}, {jimte}, {milxe}, {mutce}, note contrast with milxe and mutce rather than with mleca and zmadu, which are values for x_3, {banli}, {curve}, {fanmo}, {krasi}, {manfo}, {prane})

trajynei

lujvo
x_1 likes x_2 from among x_3 the most; x_2 is x_1's favorite/favourite x_3.

trakeia

fu'ivla
x_1 is a trachea of body/body part x_2

trano

gismu
x_1 is a quantity of/contains/is made of nitrogen/ammonia/nitrates.
(adjective:) x_1 is nitric/nitrous. See also {vacri}.

tranrzalpetre

fu'ivla
x_1 is a quantity of saltpeter.
Cf. {trano}.

transistora

fu'ivla
x_1 is a transistor

trati

gismu
x_1 is taut/tense/strained tight in direction x_2.
See also {tinsa}, {torni}, {tagji}, {tcena}, {kluza}.

treci'e

lujvo
x_1 is the metric system with relations x_2 among units x_3 and properties x_4.

trendelenburge

fu'ivla
x_1 (humanoid body) is in (reverse) Trendelenburg position with the feet are higher than the head by x_2 (angle measurement; units must be specified)
x_2 is normally assumed to be the branch cut ranging from -π radians (exclusive) to positive π radians (inclusive); a positive x_2 mantissa (for the units) in this range implies that the feet of x_1 are higher than the head thereof, meaning that this word refers to the proper Trendelenburg position; a negative x_2 mantissa in the aforementioned interval produces the reverse Trendelenburg position; x_2 must be given as a measurement (use {radno}, etc. with {be} in order to access the mantissa) but the pure numbers {no}, {ma'u}, and {ni'u} may be used, in which case they are restricted to the normally assumed range.

trene

gismu
-ren-
-re'e-
x_1 is a train [vehicle] of cars/units x_2 (mass) for rails/system/railroad x_3, propelled by x_4.
A railed vehicle or train of vehicles; also subway ({tu'unre'e}), metro, trolley, tramway (= {lajre'e}), roller coaster; monorail (= {dadre'e}); cable car, sky car, ski lift (= {cildadre'e}). See also {tcana}.

Cf. {tricu}.

truspe

lujvo

Cf. {turni}, {tcadu}, {raltca}.

tsaba

experimental gismu
x1 pertains/is related to/reflects (the) strong nuclear force [fundamental physical interaction]/chromodynamic interaction in manner/with properties/in state/with realization x2, coupling to x3 in manner/with strength x4
See also: {jikfi}, {vubla}, {dicma}, {grava}, {xigzo}.

tsali

tsani

-tan-
