See also {gapru}, {kensa}, {tarci}, {terdi}.

tsanuki

fu'ivla
x_1 is a raccoon dog, or tanuki

tsapei

lujvo
p_1=t_1 meditates (thinks hard; possibly with psuedo-religious motivation) on subject concept p_2.
See also {tsali} and {pensi}.

tsapi

gismu
x_1 is a seasoning/condiment/spice causing flavor/effect x_2 (event/property).
Also: x_1 flavors x_2 (tu'a). See also {vrusi}.

tsaprcinamomu

fu'ivla
x_1 is a quantity of cinnamon spice causing flavor/effect x_2 (event/property).
See also cinnamon tree (={ricrcinamomu}).

tsaprguinense

obsolete fu'ivla
x_1 is a quantity of Guinea/Ashanti/Benin Pepper/ false Cubeb causing flavor/effect x_2 (event/property).
See also pepper plant (={sparpipera}), black/white/green pepper (={tsaprnigru}), long pepper (={tsaprpipali}), cubeb (={tsaprkubeba}), pepper spice in general (={tsaprpipera}).

tsaprilici

fu'ivla
x_1 is a star aniseed/(Chinese) star anise (Illicium verum) causing flavor/effect x_2.

tsaprkanela

fu'ivla
x_1 is a quantity of cinnamon bark/wild cinnamon/white cinnamon causing flavor/effect x_2.
See also "canella tree" (={ricrkanela}).

tsaprkubeba

fu'ivla
x_1 is a quantity of cubeb/tailed pepper (Piper cubeba) causing flavor/effect x_2 (event/property).
See also pepper plant (={sparpipera}), black/white/green pepper (={tsaprnigru}), long pepper (={tsaprpipali}), West African pepper (={tsaprguinense}), pepper spice in general (={tsaprpipera}).

tsaprlauru

fu'ivla
x_1 is a quantity of laurel leaf (Laurus nobilis) causing flavor/effect x_2 (event/property).

tsaprnigru

fu'ivla
x_1 is a quantity of black peppar (Piper nigrum) causing flavor/effect x_2, of type x_3.
Black peppar (x3=lo'e {xekri}), green peppar (x3=lo'e {crino}), white peppar (x3=lo'e {blabi}). See also pepper plant (={sparpipera}), long pepper (={tsaprpipali}), cubeb (={tsaprkubeba}), West African pepper (={tsaprguinense}), pepper spice in general (={tsaprpipera}).

tsaprpipali

fu'ivla
x_1 is a quantity of long peppar (Piper longum) causing flavor/effect x_2 (event/property).
From sanskrit "pippali". See also pepper plant (={sparpipera}), black/white/green pepper (={tsaprnigru}), cubeb (={tsaprkubeba}), West African pepper (={tsaprguinense}), pepper spice in general (={tsaprpipera}).

tsaprpipera

fu'ivla
x_1 is a quantity of pepper (genus Piper) causing flavor/effect x_2 (event/property).
See also pepper plant (={sparpipera}), black/white/green pepper (={tsaprnigru}), long pepper (={tsaprpipali}), cubeb (={tsaprkubeba}), West African pepper (={tsaprguinense}).

tsaprpiperi

fu'ivla
x_1 is pepper (genus ''Piper'') with flavor x_2.
Cf. {cpinytsapi}, {spatrpiperi}, {kapsiku}.

tsaprzafera

fu'ivla
t_1 is saffron [spice] causing flavor/effect x2 (event/property).

tsapyvu'i

lujvo
v_1=t_2 is a seasoned flavor of v_2.

tsar

cmevla
a tsar (emperor of Russia)

tsarainaitrusi'o

lujvo
s_1 is a fascist ideology as applied by t_1 among/in people/territory/domain t_2 based on the works of thinker s_3
From {tsali}, {traji}, {natmi}, {turni}, {sidbo}. Cf. {trudjigri}, {ka'irtrusi'o}, {dzejdasratrusi'o}, {vricykricrutrusi'o}, {fairpaltrusi'o}, {guntrusi'o}, {natpamtrusi'o}.

tsasmani

lujvo
s_1 is a gorilla of species/subspecies s_2.

tsautu

fu'ivla
x_1 (entity) is a sketch, draft, outline, preliminary sketch, rough draft, rough sketch, sketch map, sketch plan of x_2 (entity)
See also {platu}

tsebi'o

lujvo
b_1=z_1 sits down on surface z_2.
Cf. {zutse}, {binxo}, {cfatse}, {nitytse}. Simple {zutse} refers to the act of sitting, whereas {tsebi'o} means the act of becoming seated.

tseingu

fu'ivla
x_1 (node in a tree graph) and x_2 (node in the same tree graph) have an essentially unique most recent (graph-nearest) common ancestor node A such that x_3 [nonnegative integer; li] is the minimum element of the set consisting only of d(A, x_1) and of d(A, x_2), and such that x_4 [integer; li] is d(A, x_1) - d(A, x_2), where d is the graph geodesic distance (defined to be infinite if nodes are not connected in the correct direction).
This word can be used to specify the concept of "nth cousin m-times removed"-ness; x1 and x2 would be the cousins, x3-1 = n, and x4 is related to m but is signed. The relationship need not actually be cousinhood (as perceived by English); direct ancestor-defendant pairs, (aunt/uncle)-(niece/nephew) pairs, and in fact any pair of family members with a well-specified most recent common ancestor (that is known) have this relationship to one another. This word can be used for specifying the number of "great"'s in the title of a relationship between x1 and x2 (with some calculational forethought). The tree diagram can be more generic than a family tree though; thus cousinhood is just a way to put it into context/application and is noy really essential to the meaning except through analogy. Notice the ordering of all terms; if the graph is directed, the arguments of the distance matters. The graph should probably be a tree locally if it is to be a well-defined relationship.

tsekla

lujvo
x_1 rides on x_2 to x_3 from x_4 via x_5

tsekuuoia

fu'ivla
x_1 is a sequoia/redwood plant/tree (subfamily Sequoioideae) of species/breed x_2

tserseiza

fu'ivla
z_1 sits in seiza position on surface z_2.

tsesebe

fu'ivla
x_1 is a sassaby/topi/korrigum/damalisk of species/breed x_2.
see also {bajbakni}

tsestu

lujvo
s_1=z_2 is a seat for s_2=z_2.
Differs from {stizu} in that it focuses on the space rather than the object. Cf. {stuzi}, {zutse}.

tsetupyzbe

lujvo
t_1=zb_1 is a lap [body part] of t_2=zu_1 supporting zb_2.
Cf. {tuple}, {zutse}, {zbepi}, {galtupcra}. A lap only exists in a seated form, and not when a being is standing erect or when it is lying down.

tsiju

gismu
-tsi-
x_1(s) is/are (a) seed(s)/spore(s) [body-part] of organism x_2 for producing offspring x_3.
Also germ cell; implies actual potential for self-development; seeds generally contain embryo and food, and hence would include a fertilized egg. See also {tarbi}, {dembi}, {grute}, {jbari}, {sombo}, {spati}, {sovda}.

tsina

gismu
-sin-
x_1 is a stage/platform/dais/[scaffold] at/in x_2 supporting x_3, made of material x_4.
(x_3 object/event); See also {greku}, {jubme}.

tsirkuso

fu'ivla
x_1 is a circus group/band/performer(s) performing x_2 (abstraction)
Cf. {tigni}, {draci}, {xajmi}, {zajba}

tsirmiristika

fu'ivla
x_1 is a nutmeg seed (genus Myristica) of species/strain x_2 causing flavor/effect x_3 (event/property)..
See also nutmeg tree (={ricrmiristika}), mace (={grutrmiristika}).

tsirvanila

fu'ivla
t_1 is/are (a) vanilla seed(s) of vanilla orchid sp_1=t_2.

tsiselcigla

lujvo
c_2=t_1 is semen secreted by organism c_3 for producing offspring t_3.

tsispa

lujvo
x_1=t_2 is a spermatophyte/phanerogam producing seed(s) t_1, of species/strain/cultivar s_2

tsubame

fu'ivla
x_1 is a swallow of species x_2
See also {cipni}

tsukate

fu'ivla
x_1 is a succade, a candied peel of plant x_2
Usually x_2 is a citrus, e.g. citron or Citrus medica. See {sakta}, {grute}

tsukini

fu'ivla
x_1 is a zucchini squash (L. cucurbita pepo).
A long, dark-green type of {guzme} eaten raw or cooked.

tsuktsu'ange

fu'ivla
x_1 is in zugzwang
Not limited to Chess.

tsuku

experimental gismu
x_1 arrives at x_2 via route x_3
See {cliva}, {klama}, {tolyli'a}. Synonymous with {darca}.

tsunami

fu'ivla
x_1 is a tsunami caused by x_2.

tsustani

lujvo
x1=r1=s1 is a trunk of x2=s2

tsutre

lujvo
x_1=m_1=r_1 measures x_2=m_2 meters in its third longest direction x_3=m_3=r_2 by measurement standard x_4=m_4.
x1 {rotsu} is not asserted, which is why rotsu3 is absent. Cf. {clatre}, {gantre}

tu

cmavo
-tuf-
KOhA6
pro-sumti: that yonder; distant demonstrative it; indicated thing far from speaker&listener.

tu'a

cmavo
LAhE
extracts a concrete sumti from an unspecified abstraction; equivalent to le nu/su'u [sumti] co'e.

tu'ai

experimental cmavo
LU
abstraction described by quoted text
Turns any grammatical quoted text into an abstraction. Terminated by {li'u}. Equivalent to {tu'a} {la'e} {lu}, or {du'au} {lu}. See {tau'e}.

tubnu

gismu
-tu'u-
x_1 is a length of tubing/pipe/hollow cylinder [shape/form] of material x_2, hollow of material x_3.
Also tube, sleeve, leg, hose, (adjective:) tubular. See also {kevna}, {canlu}.

tubra

experimental gismu
x_1 is a limb/appendage/extremity of body/entity x_2 used for purpose x_3
Any extremity used for manipulation, support, mobility, flight/swimming, etc. Usually, it can move and be controlled actively by x2 (if conscious). The term may or may not be applicable to heads, tails, mandibles, antennae, or plant parts, but occasionally may. It is more general than {tuple} or {birka}. It is also useful for talking about limbs which are rather anatomically different from human limbs: fish fins or tails, spider legs, snail feet (possibly), elephant trunks, etc. In winged insects/entities (including machinary), it can refer to wings as well as legs (especially in birds as opposed to insects, but even then as well); care must be taken if one wishes to be more clear. "Tentacle": {tu'urtubra}. See also {torso}, {xadji}.

tubrkulosi

fu'ivla
x_1 is a tuberculosis

tubypa'i

lujvo
x_1 feels brotherly/sisterly/fraternal love [philia] toward x_2

tubyspe

lujvo
s_1 is a brother/sister-in-law (brother's/sister's spouse) of m_2 under law/custom/tradition/system/convention sp_3.
Omit x_4=s_2=m_1. Cf. {speni}, {bunspe}, {me'ispe}.

tu'e

cmavo
TUhE
start of multiple utterance scope; used for logical/non-logical/ordinal joining of sentences.

tu'ei

experimental cmavo
SE
makes a new selbri, the first two places of which are to be filled with sumti from the first two abstraction places of the selbri following this word
'ko'a jai broda tu'a ko'e' = 'ko'a tu'ei broda ko'e'

tugbi'o

lujvo
x_1=b_1=t_1 settles issue x_2=t_4 with person x_3=t_2, agreeing that x_4=t_3 (du'u) is true.
Cf. {tugni}, {sarxe}, {fapro}, {darlu}, {xarnu}.

tugni

gismu
-tug-
-tu'i-
x_1 [person] agrees with person(s)/position/side x_2 that x_3 (du'u) is true about matter x_4.
See also {sarxe}, {mapti}, {darlu}, {natfe}, {panpi}, {sarji}.

tugysi'u

lujvo
t_1=t_2=s_1 are unanimous / sharing the same view on t_3=s_2 (du'u).
Cf. {simxu}, {tugni}.

tu'i

cmavo
BAI
stuzi modal, 1st place (used to situate letters) associated with site ... ; label with location.

tu'iter

cmevla
Twitter

tu'itrfolo

fu'ivla
x_1 follows x_2 on Twitter

tuitsku

obsolete fu'ivla
x_1 tweets/posts tweet x_2 (text/sedu'u) to audience x_3

tu'itsku

fu'ivla
x_1 tweets/posts tweet x_2 (text/sedu'u) to audience x_3
See {kibykarni}

tujbalji

lujvo
b_1 is a bulb [body-part] of tulip (defined by flower shape) t_1.

tujli

gismu
-tuj-
x_1 is a tulip (defined by flower shape) of species/strain x_2.
See also {spati}.

tujrxomeria

obsolete fu'ivla
t_1 is a cape tulip (genus Homeria) of species/strain t_2.

tulcti

lujvo
c_1=t_1 swallows c_2.
From {tunlo} {citka}.

tumcakrespa

lujvo
x1=s2=r1 is a tortoise of species x2=r2

tumfakli'u

lujvo
l_1 explores lands in l_2=t_2 discovering facts f_2 using means l_3
from {tumla} {facki} {litru}

tumgre

lujvo
x_1=p_1 is cross-country of/crosses terrain x_2=p_2=t_1 to destination side x_3=p_3 from origin side x_4=p_4.
See {tumla}, {pagre}.

tumkupypaumerko

lujvo
x1 pertains to/is a part of land-continuous/contiguous/continental U.S.A. region in aspect/property x2

tumla

gismu
-tum-
-tu'a-
x_1 is a parcel/expanse of land at location x_2; x_1 is terrain.
(cf. {vacri}, {xamsi}; {tutra}, which need not be land, {gugde}, {xamsi})

tumrmadagaskara

fu'ivla
x1 pertains to the Madagascar island/land/subcontinent in property x2
Confer: {fi'ortu'a}, {friko}, {gugdemugu}, {malgaci}

tumrzilandia

obsolete fu'ivla
x_1 pertains to the continent/continental plate of Zealandia (including its islands) in geography/geology/hydrology/zoology/culture/nationality in aspect x_2
See also: {sralrsaxulo}, {sralo}

tumsfe

lujvo
s_1 is the ground of land s_2=t_1 at location t_2.
Cf. {sefta}, {tumla}.

tumsfeni'a

lujvo
c_1 is/are underground/subterranean beneath ground t_1=s_1=c_2 in frame of reference c_3.

tumspa

lujvo
s_1 is a land plant/embryophyta/metaphyta/plantae sensu strictissimo of species/strain/cultivar s_2 at location t_2.
This group includes the liverworts, hornworts, mosses, and vascular plants, as well as fossil plants similar to these surviving groups.

tumyma'e

lujvo
m_1 is a vehicle carrying m_2 in/on terrain/land surface t_1=m_3, propelled by m_4.
See also {matrytu'ama'e}.

tumymre

lujvo
m_1 surveys t_1=m_2 as m_3 (map or measurements) in unit m_4 with accuracy m_5
see also {tedmre}

tunba

gismu
-tub-
x_1 is a sibling of x_2 by bond/tie/standard/parent(s) x_3.
See also {bruna}, {mensi}, {tamne}.

tunka

gismu
-tuk-
x_1 is made of/contains/is a quantity of copper (Cu); [metaphor: reddish, electrical conductor].
See also {jinme}, {lastu}, {ransu}.

tunlo

gismu
-tul-
-tu'o-
x_1 gulps/swallows.
x_1 swallows down food/drink. x_2 (= {tulpinxe}, {tulcti}, {ctitu'o} (the latter two are more general - for food or beverage); swallow/engulf (= {galxycti}, {galxynerbi'o}, {galxygre}. See also {citka}, {pinxe}, {galxe}.

tunri'a

lujvo
x_1=r_1 (nu) physically causes x_2=t_1 (object, usually pointed) to poke x_3=t_2 (experiencer) under conditions x_4=r_3
x_4 are the conditions of the causation. Use {jai} or tack its rafsi -jax- on the front to make the x_1 into an concrete sumti, presumably the person doing the poking.

tunta

gismu
-tun-
x_1 (object, usually pointed) pokes/jabs/stabs/prods x_2 (experiencer).
Agentive (= {tungau}, {tunzu'e}). See also {balre}, {dakfu}, {darxi}, {fanza}, {jicla}, {katna}, {tikpa}.

tu'o

cmavo
PA5
null operand (used in unary mekso operations).
See also {xo'e}.

tu'oi

experimental cmavo
KOhA7
null connective operand; used to fill empty places in JOI
Used with JOI to create sets/masses/sequences containing zero or one members. "{tu'oi} {ce} {tu'oi}" = the empty set ({lo} {kutysetmima}), "la .djon. {joi} {tu'oi}" = the mass consisting of only John. See {tu'o}, {zi'o}, {zai'o}

tupcutci

lujvo
c_1 is a boot for covering/protecting leg c_2=t_1, and of material c_3.
Cf. {bracutci}, {karcutci}.

tuple

gismu
-tup-
-tu'e-
x_1 is a/the leg [body-part] of x_2; [metaphor: supporting branch].
See also {stani}, {zbepi}, {jamfu}, {jimca}, {sanli}.

tupyjanco

lujvo
j_1 is a hip attaching attaching leg j_2=t_1 to body j_3=t_2.
See also {tupyjanbo'u} for hip bone

tur

cmevla
Thor/Tor
God in norse mythology; common Scandinavian name

turbana

fu'ivla
x_1 is a turban

turdida

fu'ivla
x_1 is a bird of family Turdidae (thrush, bluebird / American robin etc.) of species x_2
See {ctesa'acpi}, {cipni}

turing zei sucyskami

zei-lujvo
sk_1 is a Turing machine for purpose sk_2.
See {sucyskami}.

turko

experimental gismu
x_1 reflects Turkish culture/nationality/language in aspect x_2

turne'i

lujvo
x_1 is a descendant of x_2 in hierarchy x_3
Distributive across all three arguments. See {stura}, {nenri}, {grafu}, {tcana}, {dzena}, {turnela}, {tursei}, {turnersei}, {turtuba}. No in-language definition for now because of uncertainty about grafu's definition.

turnela

fu'ivla
x_1 is a child of x_2 (one level below it) in hierarchy x_3
Distributive across all three arguments. See {stura}, {nenri}, {grafu}, {tcana}, {dzena}, {turne'i}, {tursei}, {turnersei}, {turtuba}. No in-language definition for now because of uncertainty about grafu's definition.

turnersei

lujvo
x_1 is a descendant of x_2, x_3 levels down from it, in hierarchy x_4
Distributive across all four arguments. See {stura}, {nenri}, {grafu}, {tcana}, {dzena}, {turne'i}, {turnela}, {tursei}, {turtuba}. No in-language definition for now because of uncertainty about grafu's definition.

turni

gismu
-tru-
x_1 governs/rules/is ruler/governor/sovereign/reigns over people/territory/domain/subjects x_2.
x_2 need not be complete specification of set of governed; reign/rule (= {noltru}); king/queen/sovereign (= {nolraitru}); pure democracy (= {roltrusi'o}), representative democracy (= {rolka'itrusi'o}), viceroy (= {ka'itru}), pure communism (= {kaurpo'esi'o}), board of directors/trustees, steering committee (= {trukamni}); government (= {trugunma}, {trugri} (emphasizing the components), {truci'e} (emphasizing the organization)). See also {catni}, {minde}, {tutra}, {jecta}, {gugde}, {ponse}, {jitro}.

tursei

lujvo
x_1 is x_3 (undirected) hops away from x_2 in graph x_4
Note the switched x_2 and x_3. Distributive across all four arguments. See {stura}, {nenri}, {grafu}, {tcana}, {dzena}, {turne'i}, {turnela}, {turnersei}, {turtuba}. No in-language definition for now because of uncertainty about grafu's definition.

turtuba

fu'ivla
x_1 and x_2 share common parent x_3 in hierarchy x_4
Distributive across all four arguments. See {stura}, {nenri}, {grafu}, {tcana}, {dzena}, {turne'i}, {turnela}, {tursei}, {turnersei}. No in-language definition for now because of uncertainty about grafu's definition.

tutci

gismu
-tci-
x_1 is a tool/utensil/resource/instrument/implement used for doing x_2; [form determines function].
(cf. {cabra}, {minji}, se {pilno}, {zukte}, {sazri}, basic tool types: {salpo}, {pulni}, {cfine}, {klupe}, {jendu}, {xislu}, {vraga}; utensils: {forca}, {smuci}, {dakfu}; specifics: {balre}, {mruli}, {cinza}, {garna}, {pijne}, {pambe}, {canpa}, {pilno}, {vraga})

tutle

experimental gismu
x_1 is/reflects/pertains to race/societal(/social) classification x_2 culture/status in aspect x_3, of subtype/particular subcategory/group/tribe x_4, by definition/standard/societal classification system x_5
See also: {kapli}, {maska}, {rindo}, {xispo}.

tutlycatra

lujvo
x_1=c_1 commits genocide against race/group/people x_2=t_2=c_2 by means x_3=c_3
{tutle} is experimental. Race-based. Not necessarily successful, but it treats loi se tutle as a mass, in which case not all members must die (although some do) in order for the mass to experience its "killing".

tutpaupau

lujvo
t_1=p_1 is a district of p_2 administered by t_2.
An administrative district is usually a second-level division of a country, hence the reduplicated "-paupau". Cf. {turni}, {gugde}.

tutra

gismu
-tut-
x_1 is territory/domain/space of/belonging to/controlled by x_2.
See also {catni}, {turni}, {jecta}, {gugde}, {ponse}, {steci}, {tumla}.

tutra'a

lujvo
s1 pertains to territory of s2=t2
Cultural gismu replacement for geography: From gismu {tutra} and {srana}.

tutske

lujvo
s_1 is geography based on methodology s_3.

tu'u

cmavo
TUhU
elidable terminator: end multiple utterance scope; seldom elidable.

tu'urbirka

lujvo
b_1 = t_1 is a tentacle / tube-shaped arm [body part] of b_2.
The other places of tubnu (outer and inner material of the tube) are dependant on the body with the tentacle; generally they'll just be "skin" and "blood" or "flesh" anyways. Made from {tubnu} and {birka}.

tu'urcurnu

lujvo
t_1 is a tubeworm of species t_2.

tu'urki

fu'ivla
x_1 reflects Turkish culture/nationality/language in aspect x_2.
Cf. {bangrturkie}, {kulnrturkie}, {xelso}, {ropno}, {xazdo}.

tu'urpi'o

lujvo
p_1 is an organ/pipe organ/mechanical organ (keyboard musical instrument).
Although "tubnu" implies "pipe organ" (or more loosely, "mechanical organ", as defined by Wikipedia), "tu'urpi'o" may also informally be used to mean non-pipe organs. See also: {mrupi'o}, {balpi'o}, {sa'irpi'o}, {cpupi'o}, {runpi'o}, {dicpi'o}

tu'ursluni

lujvo
s_1 is a Welsh onion/Japanese bunching onion (Allium fistulosum) of variety/strain s_2.

ty

cmavo
BY2
letteral for t.

tylidos

cmevla
Toledo, Ohio, U.S.A.

tyrontos

cmevla
Toronto

u

cmavo
A
logical connective: sumti afterthought whether-or-not.

ua

cmavo
UI1
attitudinal: discovery - confusion/searching.
See also {facki}, {cfipu}, {sisku}.

u'a

cmavo
UI1
attitudinal: gain - loss.
See also {jinga}, {selne'u}, {prali}, {cirko}.

uacintyn

cmevla
Washington.

UAcintyn

cmevla
Washington

uai

experimental cmavo
UI1
attitudinal: friendly/friendishly/amicably/companionship/compatriotship/comradeship - antagonistically/enemyishly
See also: {ai}, {au}, {iu}, {o'e}, {ua}, {ui}, {kansa}, {pendo}, {prami}

u'ai

experimental cmavo
UI1
attitudinal: triumph/victory - draw/tie/inconclusive - defeat/loss
Does not imply superiority. Related to: {io}, {o'a}, {ui}, {oinai}, {uo}, {u'a}.

uakmaio

fu'ivla
x_1 is a macaw of species x_2
May also include conures. See also {spitaki}, {babgalo}.

ualdo

fu'ivla
x_1 is a waldo, a remote manipulation slave device that mimics the motions of x_2 (master device)
Usually master device is a person, operator or a device manipulated by such operator. See also {xance}

uanai

cmavo-compound
UI*1
attitudinal: discovery - confusion/searching.

u'anai

cmavo-compound
UI*1
attitudinal: gain - loss.

uanji

fu'ivla
x_1 is a toy, plaything played by x_2
{kelci} describes playing a game, of which {uanji} might be a component. See also {kelci}, {keitci}, {keldai}.

uaransis

cmevla
Varanasi

uargali

fu'ivla
x_1 is a dingo of breed x_2

uatno

fu'ivla
x_1 is measured in x_2 watts of power (default 1)
See {klani}, {dikca}

uau

experimental cmavo
UI1
Attitudinal: impressed/amazed - unimpressed (neutral)/blasé/bland/commonplace - unimpressed (negative)/disappointed/bored
Not necessarily positive (one can be inpressed by/amazed by another's foolishness, ignorance, etc., for example; this feeling of amazement is not quite ironic or sarcastic, but it is a bit wry).

ubu

bu-letteral
BY*
letteral for u.

ubutycys zei cacra

zei-lujvo
c_1 is c_2 hours in duration (default is 1 hour) by the Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) time standard.

ue

cmavo
UI1
attitudinal: surprise - not really surprised - expectation.
See also {spaji}.

u'e

cmavo
UI1
attitudinal: wonder - commonplace.
See also {manci}, {fadni}.

ueb

cmevla
The World Wide Web.

uebjugau

fu'ivla
x_1 links x_2 to resource x_3 with link x_4.
See also {urli}.

uebre

fu'ivla
x_1 pertains to the world wide web in aspect x_2.
See also {ueb}, {kibro}, {kibypapri}, {kibyca'o}.

uecu'i

cmavo-compound
UI*1
attitudinal: surprise - not really surprised - expectation axis.

uei

experimental cmavo
UI3a
discursive: optional answer premarker
See also {pau}, {spuda}

ue'i

experimental cmavo
UI1
attitudinal: excitement - lack of excitement - boredom
Used to express excitement (enthusiasm, exhilaration). The opposite expresses boredom (dullness), while the cu'i-form expresses "indifference". See {fizbu}, {tolzdi}

uei'e

experimental cmavo
attitudinal: excited encouragement
Used to show excited encouragement, e.g. "Let's play!". = {ue'i} + {e'e}. See {fizbu}, {talsa}

uenai

cmavo-compound
UI*1
attitudinal: surprise - expectation.

u'enai

cmavo-compound
UI*1
attitudinal: wonder - commonplace.

uenba'u

fu'ivla
x_1 pronounces x_2 (text) as x_3 (sound)
See {uenzi}, {bacru}. Also, x_3 is the pronunciation of x_2 ({te} {uenba'u} for reordered places).

uencu

fu'ivla
x_1 (entity) is a document with content x_2 (entity)
material substance (including electronic ones) on which thoughts of persons are represented by any species of conventional mark or symbol. See also {te} {tcidu}, {cukta}, {uenzi}, {papri}, {fa'o}.

u'ene'e

cmavo-compound
UI*1
attitudinal cluster: disappointment
{u'e} + {ne'e}. Suggested as a third position on the {u'e} scale; this is suggested to avoid having to reassign {u'enai} to {u'e}{cu'i}.

uensni

fu'ivla
x_1 is text meaning x_2 in language x_3
See {sinxa}, {uenzi}, {smuni}

uenzi

fu'ivla
x_1 is an utterance or text about x_2
{cusku}, {bangu}, {gerna}

uepei

cmavo-compound
UI*1
attitudinal: surprise question.

uerna

fu'ivla
x_1 is a plant of clade Rosids of specied x_2
See also {alna}, {poplu}.

See also {gleki}.

u'i

uibu

uicmo

fu'ivla
x_1 cheers/squeals with joy with sound x_2
Confer: {iicmo}, {gleki}, {cmoni}, .{ui}

See also {uidja zei tanbo}

uidja zei tanbo

See also {uidja}

uidje

fu'ivla
x_1 is a widget of user interface x_2.
See also: button (={batke zei uidje}), checkbox (={jetnu zei uidje}), radio button (={gribatke zei uidje}), tooltip (={skicu zei uidje}), text field (={ciska zei uidje}), address bar (={samjudri zei uidje}), drop-down list (={pejypoi zei uidje}), progress bar (={nilmu'o zei uidje}), label (={tcita zei uidje}), window (={pevyca'o zei uidje}).

uikipedias

obsolete cmevla
Wikipedia.

uikis

cmevla
Wiki, WikiWikiWeb.

uilkinse

fu'ivla
x_1 is semantically regularized in x_2 (property of x1)
Can be applied to taxonomies, languages, linguistic constructs. See also {kalsa}, {ganzu}, {smuni}, {prane}

u'imla

fu'ivla
x_1 is a lolcat/picture of animal x_2 with humorous caption x_3.
Etymology: Combination of {u'i} and {mlatu} and meant to parallel {u'ivla}.

uinai

UI*1
attitudinal: happiness - unhappiness.

u'inai

uiski

uitki

fu'ivla
x_1 is a wiki/collaborative web site with subject/theme/content x_2.

uitkipedia

obsolete fu'ivla
x_1 pertains to Wikipedia in aspect x_2.
See also {uitki}.

uitkipediia

fu'ivla
x_1 is Wikipedia

u'ivla

fu'ivla
x_1 is a word meaning x_2 in language x_3 and silly/funny/clever for reason x_4 (usually etymological).
The word {u'ivla} is itself an u'ivla, as it is an unconventional portmanteau of {u'i} and -vla- (a rafsi of {valsi}) and also a pun on the word {fu'ivla}. Another example is {u'imla}.

ui'y

experimental cmavo
BY*
letteral for :)
Synonynous with .{uibu}. [This word is presently not allowed by morphological and phonotactic constraints. See: .{a'y}, .{y'i}]

ulmu

fu'ivla
x_1 is an elm of species/variety x_2.
See also {na'itsi}

ulsa

fu'ivla
x_1 is an ulcer on/in x_2

ultime

fu'ivla
x_1 is the finale/final/last part leading up to completion of x_2
See {incipe}, {mulno}, {fasnu}, {pruce}

unki

fu'ivla
x_1 is a Big Cat of genus Uncia of taxon x_2
Genus {unki} - 'Uncia': {irbisa} - 'Snow Leopard, Uncia uncia (mountains of central and south Asia)'. See also {bramlatu}

unsa

fu'ivla
x_1 weight x_2 ounces (by default 1)

untri

fu'ivla
x_1 is a theory of x_2; an explanation, based on observing it, of its structure, rules, or why it works the way it does

uo

cmavo
UI1
attitudinal: completion - incompleteness.
See also {mulno}, {mansa}, {fanmo}, {snada}.

u'o

cmavo
UI1
attitudinal: courage - timidity - cowardice.
See also {virnu}.

u'ocu'i

cmavo-compound
UI*1
attitudinal: courage - timidity - cowardice.

uonai

cmavo-compound
UI*1
attitudinal: completion - incompleteness.

u'onai

cmavo-compound
UI*1
attitudinal: courage - timidity - cowardice.

uorfopno

fu'ivla
x_1 is Standard Average European, reflects Standard Average European (SAE) Sprachbund in aspect x_2
See also {ropno}, {bangu}, {sprakebunda}

uortele

fu'ivla
x_1 is a carrot of species / variety / cultivar x_2
See also {patlu}, {genja}

upsi

fu'ivla
x_1 (entity) acknowledges making mistake x_2 (property of x_1)
{sei} {upsi} = 'Oops! Whoops!' See {srera}, {randa}, {jinvi}

urci

fu'ivla
x_1 is poison ivy/oak/sumac / lacquer tree of species x_2.
see also {ponjo} {cinta}, {xalkrxuruci}, {spatrnakardiace}, {rakcro}, {srebandu}

urja

fu'ivla
x_1 (property of x_2) is urgent / needs to be immediately done by x_2 for x_3 (event) to happen

urli

fu'ivla
x_1 is the URL/address of web page/resource/file x_2.
Very similar to "{judri} fi lo {uebre} se .u lo {kibro}".

urtika

fu'ivla
x_1 is a nettle (genus Urtica) of species x_2

urxaima

fu'ivla
x_1 reflects Uralic culture/geography/language/identity in aspect x_2

utc

cmevla
name: UTC, Universal Coordinated Time (time standard)
Variants: {ubutycys}, {ubu}{ty}{cy} (may or may not be prefixed with {li'ai}); {u'y} and {uy} are also sometimes seen in place of {ubu}. See {detri}, {tcika}, {detcacryvu'u}

utlinani

fu'ivla
x_1 pertains to Klingon/Klingonese culture/nationality/language in aspect x_2

utra

fu'ivla
x_1 is an otter of species x_2

uu

cmavo
UI1
attitudinal: pity - cruelty.
See also {kecti}.

u'u

cmavo
UI1
attitudinal: repentance - lack of regret - innocence.
See also {xenru}, {zugycni}.

u'ucu'i

cmavo-compound
UI*1
attitudinal: repentance - lack of regret - innocence.

uunai

cmavo-compound
UI*1
attitudinal: pity - cruelty.

u'unai

cmavo-compound
UI*1
attitudinal: repentance - lack of regret - innocence.

uuZIT

cmevla
Wuzzy

uy

experimental cmavo
BY
letteral for the u semi-vowel, sometimes written as ŭ

u'y

experimental cmavo
BY
letteral for u.
Synonymous with the original CLL definition of .{ubu}.

u zei bangu

zei-lujvo
x_1 is the U-conlang, used by x_2 to communicate x_3.
Refers to http://mw.lojban.org/papri/U_(conlang)

va

cmavo
-vaz-
VA
location tense distance: near to ... ; there at ...; a medium/small distance from ...

va'a

cmavo
VUhU3
unary mathematical operator: additive inverse; [- a].

vabycta

lujvo
x1=v2 looks around

vacmurse

lujvo
m_1=c_1 is the dusk of day m_2=c_2 at location m_3=c_3.
Cf. {cermurse}.

vacmursynalcando

lujvo
c_1 is vespertine/active during the dusk v_1=m_1.
See also: crepuscular (={mursynalcando}).

vacri

gismu
-var-
x_1 is a quantity of air/normally-gaseous atmosphere of planet x_2, of composition including x_3.
See also {gapci}, {kijno}, {trano}, {tumla}, {vasxu}, {xamsi}.

vacycti

lujvo
x_1 eats x_2 for dinner

vacysai

lujvo
s_1 (mass) is a dinner (evening meal), supper composed of dishes including s_2.
Cf. {cersai}, {dormijysai}, {ctesai}, {citka}, {cidja}.

va'e

cmavo
MOI
convert number to scalar selbri; x_1 is at (n)th position on scale x_2.

va'ei

experimental cmavo
ROI
converts number to scalar tag; specifies the value on fuzzy logic scale; to the degree (n) on scale ...

va'ei'a

experimental cmavo
PA5
digit/number: Dom Hans van der Laan's plastic number ρ = 1.324717957244746025960908854…
The unique real solution of (x^3)-x-1=0; algebraic.

vai

cmavo
PA2
digit/number: hex digit F (decimal 15) [fifteen].
Experimental rafsi: -vav-

va'i

cmavo
UI3
discursive: in other words - in the same words.
See also {cneselsku}.

va'inai

cmavo-compound
UI*3
discursive: in other words - in the same words.

vairsoi

lujvo
s_1=v_1 is a military officer in army s_2.
Cf. {vajni}, {sonci}, {jemja'a}.

vajlani

fu'ivla
The amount x_1 (property of a number) is significant

vajni

gismu
-vaj-
-vai-
x_1 (object/event) is important/significant to x_2 (person/event) in aspect/for reason x_3 (nu/ka).
Also: x_1 matters to x_2 in aspect/respect x_3. See also {banli}, {ralju}, {vamji}, {dirba}, {kargu}, {pajni}.

vajrai

lujvo
x_1=v_1=t_1 is most important/most significant to x_2=v_2 in aspect/for reason x_3=v_3 among set/range x_4=t_4.
{vajni}+{traji}

vajraifla

lujvo
f_1=v_1=t_1 is the constitution of f_3=v_2.
Cf. {vajni}, {traji}, {flalu}, {zuktruci'e}, {flatruci'e}, {pairtruci'e}, {flacfatrugri}, {flazautrugri}.

vajyki'i

lujvo
x_1 is relevant to x_2 in way x_3

valkra

lujvo
x_1 is the etymology of word/phrase x_2

valrtosmabru

fu'ivla
x_1 is a tosmabru word
Note: for obvious reasons, {zo} will probably not work here. You probably want {lo'u}/{le'u} or {zoi} to quote x_1. A tosmabru word looks like a lujvo, but it falls apart into several cmavo and a lujvo/gismu. For more see http://mw.lojban.org/index.php?title=tosmabru_test. See also {valslinku'i}.

valrxazdomru

fu'ivla
x_1 is a xazdmru word
Note: for obvious reasons, {zo} will probably not work here. You probably want {zoi} or {zo'oi} to quote x_1. ¶ A xazdmru word is a putative zi'evla that will turn into a lujvo-form if the syllabic consonants are filled in with y, thus xaz,dm,ru → xazdymru ({xazdo} zei {mruli}). No words of these shapes have ever been defined or used in the corpus. These shapes are banned following a proposal and can't be entered into jbovlaste. See {vlaturge'a}, {valslinku'i}, {valrtosmabru}

valsi

gismu
-val-
-vla-
x_1 is a word meaning/causing x_2 in language x_3; (adjective: x_1 is lexical/verbal).
See also {slaka}, {bangu}, {cmavo}, {cmene}, {gismu}, {jufra}, {rafsi}, {smuni}.

valsitosmabru

fu'ivla
x_1 is a tosmabru word
Note: for obvious reasons, {zo} will probably not work here. You probably want {lo'u}/{le'u} or {zoi} to quote x_1. A tosmabru word looks like a lujvo, but it falls apart into several cmavo and a lujvo/gismu. For more see http://mw.lojban.org/index.php?title=tosmabru_test. See also {valslinku'i}.

valslinku'i

fu'ivla
x_1 is a slinku'i word
Note: for obvious reasons, {zo} will probably not work here. You probably want {zoi} to quote x_1. A slinku'i word form looks like a stage-4 {fu'ivla}, but would be ambiguous when following certain cmavo, so it is disallowed. For more see http://mw.lojban.org/index.php?title=lo_valslinku%27i_cu_mo. See also {valrtosmabru}.

valsrkognato

fu'ivla
x_1 is a cognate of x_2.
Synonymous to {kognato}. See also {valsi}, {lengua}.

valtcizbaga

lujvo
x_1 is a tcizbaga word
A {tcizbaga} word looks like a {lujvo} morphologically (though it may contain undefined {gismu} or {rafsi}) but it is defined as a {fu'ivla}/{zi'evla}.

valtogmo'a

lujvo
t_1=m_1 is the tone of word v_1=m_2 with characteristics t_2=m_3.
The linguistic tone is used to distinguish a difference in meaning, for example in Chinese. Cf. {valsi}, {tonga}, {morna}.

valvula

fu'ivla
x_1 is a valve, a device that controls the flow of x_2 through a pipe x_3

vamji

gismu
-vam-
-va'i-
x_1 (ni) is the equivalent value/worth of x_2 [item(s) of value] to x_3 for use/appreciation x_4.
Also: x_2 is worth x_1 to x_3; (for x_2 person:) x_2 merits (one sense), (adjective:) x_2 is worthy (= selva'i for reordered places); merit reward (= {nemselva'i}); receive merited reward (= {vamselne'u}); x_2 may be a specific object, a commodity (mass), an event, or a property; pedantically, for objects/commodities, this is sumti-raising from ownership of the object/commodity (= {posyva'i}, {posyselva'i} for unambiguous semantics). (cf. {jdima}, {jerna}, {vecnu}, {dirba}, {janta}, {kargu}, {pleji}; see note at jdima on cost/price/value distinction, {vajni})

vampire

fu'ivla
x_1 is a vampire
See also {blupinxe}

vamrai

lujvo
v_1=t_1 is the most valuable among items v_2=r_4 to v_3 for purpose v_4.
Made from {vamji} + {traji}.

vamtu

gismu
-vat-
x_1 vomits/regurgitates x_2; x_1 throws x_2 up; [violent] digestive expulsion.
(x_2 is non-gaseous); See also {rigni}, {jetce}, {kafke}, {sputu}.

vamveile'ikarda

lujvo
x_1=k_1=vr_4 is a stored-value/gift/pre-paid card with stored value x_2=va_1=vr_1 for usage x_3=va_4=p_4, accepted by payee/merchant x_4=va_3=p_3
Mustn't be associated with account debit/credit since value is pre-set (and stored wherever). Normally anonymous/without cardholder. Cf. {lejykarda}, {baxydinkarda}, {jitseldejykarda}, {detseldejykarda}, {maksriveikarda}, {lejykardymi'i}, {jdini}.

vanbarja

lujvo
b_1 is a wine tavern/tavern/bar/pub serving wine b_2=v_1 to audience/patrons b_3.

vanbi

gismu
-vab-
x_1 (ind./mass) is part of an environment/surroundings/context/ambience of x_2.
(adjective:) x_1 is ambient. See also cmavo list {va'o}, {sruri}, {jibni}, {jbini}, {ferti}, {tcini}.

vanbi zei uidje

zei-lujvo
u_1 is a context menu in user interface u_2.
See {uidje}.

vanci

gismu
-vac-
x_1 is an evening [from end-of-work until sleep typical for locale] of day x_2 at location x_3.
This evening (= {cabvanci}); tomorrow evening (= {bavlamvanci}); yesterday evening (= {prulamvanci}). See also {cerni}, {murse}, {tcika}.

vandani

fu'ivla
x_1 is a 完蛋/ wándàn / fucked up situation

vandula

fu'ivla
x_1 is lavender of species/variety x_2.

x_1 predicts, prophesies x_2 (clause) like Baba Vanga
See also {ba'a}, {kanpe}

vanjba

lujvo
x_1 is a grape of species/variety x_2.

vanjbajisra

lujvo
ji_1 is made of/contains/is a quantity of grape juice made from grape/grapes ji_2=jb_1=v_2.
See also: {vanjba}, {vanju}, {jbari}, {jisra}

vanjyjikru

lujvo
j_1 is a brandy distilled from v_2.
Cf. {xalka}, {jikru}, {birje}, {vanju}, {uiski}, {campania}, {vo'otka}, {koinka}.

vanrtaraksaku

v_1 is made of/contains/is a quantity of dandelion wine from dandelion petals v_2.

s_1=v_1 is vinegar made from v_2.

vanxila

fu'ivla
x_1 is some vanilla, the extract of the fruit of the vanilla plant

va'o

BAI
vanbi modal, 1st place (conditions 1) under conditions ...; in environment ...

varcavas

cmevla

lujvo

From {vacri} and {muvgau}, or equivalently, {vacri}, {muvdu}, and {gasnu}.

x_1 is vanilla.

varxamsi

from {vacri} {xamsi}

Cf. {vacri}, {xamsi}, {saske}, {varxamsi}, {xasyske}, {tutske}.

vasru

gismu
-vas-
-vau-
x_1 contains/holds/encloses/includes contents x_2 within; x_1 is a vessel containing x_2.
[also accommodates, container; containment need not be total; x_2 is Contained. in x_1 (= selvau for reordered places)]; See also {bartu}, {jbini}, {nenri}, {zvati}, {cpana}, {botpi}, {lanka}.

vasxu

gismu
-vax-
-va'u-
x_1 breathes/respires x_2 [gas].
(though used to make the Lojban word, clue word vascular is erroneous, actually pertaining to the circulatory system that carries the respired oxygen to the tissues); See also {fepri}, {kijno}, {vacri}.

vau

cmavo
VAU
elidable: end of sumti in simple bridi; in compound bridi, separates common trailing sumti.

va'u

cmavo
BAI
xamgu modal, 1st place beneficiary case tag complement benefiting from ...

vau'au'o

PA5
omega constant, Lambert product-log W(1)
See also: {dei'au'o}

va'urpante

lujvo
p_1=v_1 protests with a sigh about p_2 (event/state) to audience p_3 with action p_4.
Cf. {vasxu}, {pante}, {patyva'u}.

vaxni'ajinru

lujvo
j_1=c_1=v_1 (object/person) is scuba diving beneath/below/under from c_2 (object/water surface) in frame of reference c_3 breathing/respiring v_2 [gas], submerged in liquid j_2.

vaxni'ajirpre

lujvo
p_1=v_1 is a scuba diver breathing gas v_2.

vaxselnandu

lujvo
n_2=v_1 has difficulty breathing gas v_2 under conditions n_3; n_1=v_1 pants.
Cf. {vasxu}, {nandu}, {ta'irva'u}.

vaxtu'u

lujvo
x_1 is the trachea of x_2

vaxydicra

lujvo
d_1 chokes v_1 by/with d_3.
Cf. {vasxu}, {dicra}, {dirva'u}.

ve

cmavo
-vel-
SE
4th conversion; switch 1st/4th places.

ve'a

cmavo
VEhA
location tense interval: a small/medium region of space.

vebe'i

cmavo-compound
BAI*
benji modal, 4th place transmit origin ...

veci'e

cmavo-compound
BAI*
ciste modal, 4th place as a system with synergy in ...

vecnu

gismu
-ven-
-ve'u-
x_1 [seller] sells/vends x_2 [goods/service/commodity] to buyer x_3 for amount/cost/expense x_4.
x_1 is a salesperson/salesman/vendor; x_3 buys x_2 from x_1 (= {terve'u} for reordered terms); x_4 is the price of x_2 to x_3 (= {velve'u} for reordered terms); for sale (= {fitselve'u}, {selvenfriti}); x_2 may be a specific object, a commodity (mass), an event, or a property; pedantically, for objects/commodities, this is sumti-raising from ownership of the object/commodity (= {posyve'u}, {posyselve'u} for unambiguous semantics). (cf. {canja}, {dunda}, {janta}, {pleji}, {jerna}, {kargu}, {prali}, {zarci}, {vamji}, {jdima}; see note at {jdima} on cost/price/value distinction, {fepni}, {friti}, {jerna}, {rupnu})

vecu'u

cmavo-compound
BAI*
cusku modal, 4th place in expression medium ...

vede'i

cmavo-compound
BAI*
detri modal, 4th place on a date according to calendar ...

vedli

experimental gismu
x_1 remembers experience x_2 (li'i)
x_1 lifri x_2 is implied. See also {morji}, {lifri}. Proposed short rafsi -ve'i-.

vedu'o

cmavo-compound
BAI*
djuno modal, 4th place under epistemology ...

ve'e

cmavo
-ve'e-
VEhA
location tense interval: the whole of space.

vefi'e

cmavo-compound

finti modal, 4th place creatively; created from ideas/elements ...

vega'a

cmavo-compound
BAI*
zgana modal, 4th place (under conditions) observed under observing conditions ...

vei

cmavo
VEI
left mathematical bracket.

ve'i

cmavo
VEhA
location tense interval: a tiny region of space.

vei'i

experimental cmavo
UI2
evidential: I remember (experiencing) - I deny remembering
See {moi'i}, {vedli}, {morji}, {kai'e}, {lai'i}. Split from {ba'a} so that it can be properly negated with {nai} or questioned with {pei}

veisle

lujvo
x_1 is a record cell or field containing data x_2, part of record x_3
See also {datnyvau}

veisri

lujvo
x_1=d_1=v_4 is a signal recording and playback tape-type medium (cassette/DAT/tape drive) containing data/sound/image x_2=v_2 with data storage mechanism/method x3 (analog/digital)
Cf. {datnysri}, {srimakyvelvei}.

veka'a

cmavo-compound
BAI*
klama modal, 4th place via route ...

vektori

fu'ivla
x_1 is a vector (mathematical object/number/operator) representing (object/information) x_2 with properties x_3
This definition refers to the object, not the representation. A given vektori is not changed by a change of base no matter how its appearance does, and two vektori are not the same, even if they are represented in equivalent forms in some bases (or even the same one). The object need only satisfy the vector axioms. A vector is not really a list. Since this word does not really concern itself with dual spaces, its scope probably includes many bras and/or kets (although the context/meaning of the bra/ket matters).

velbajra

lujvo
x_4=b_1 runs on surface x_2=b_2 using limbs x_3=b_3 with gait x_1=b_4.
{ve} {bajra}

velbancu

lujvo
x_4=b_1 exceeds/is beyond limit/boundary x_2=b_2 from x_3=b_3 in property/amount x_1=b_4 (ka/ni).
{ve} {bancu}

velbatci

lujvo
x_4=b_1 bites/pinches x_2=b_2 on/at specific locus x_3=b_3 with x_1=b_4.
{ve} {batci}

velbatke

lujvo
x_4=b_1 is a button/knob/handle on/for item x_2=b_2, with purpose x_3=b_3, made of material x_1=b_4.
{ve} {batke}

velbe'e

lujvo
x_4=b_1 is a crew/team/gang/squad/band of persons x_2=b_2 directed/led by x_3=b_3 organized for purpose x_1=b_4.
{ve} {bende}

velbei

lujvo
x_4=b_1 carries/hauls/bears/transports cargo x_2=b_2 to x_3=b_3 from x_1=b_4 over path x_5=b_5; x_4=b_1 is a carrier/porter.
{ve} {bevri}

velbe'i

lujvo
x_4=b_1 transfers/sends/transmits x_2=b_2 to receiver x_3=b_3 from transmitter/origin x_1=b_4 via means/medium x_5=b_5.
{ve} {benji}; see also {krasi}.

velbinra

lujvo
x_4=b_1 insures/indemnifies x_2=b_2 against peril x_3=b_3 providing benefit x_1=b_4.
{ve} {binra}

velbi'u

lujvo
x_4=b_1 is a wall/fence separating x_2=b_2 from x_3=b_3, and subdividing x_1=b_4.
{ve} {bitmu}

velbo'a

lujvo
x_4=b_1 is a wave/periodic pattern in medium x_2=b_2, with wave-form x_3=b_3, wave-length x_1=b_4 and frequency x_5=b_5.
{ve} {boxna}

velcange

lujvo
x_4=c_1 is a farm/ranch at x_2=c_2, of rancher x_3=c_3 raising/producing x_1=c_4.
{ve} {cange}, see also {banro}

velcanja

lujvo
x_4=c_1 exchanges/trades/barters commodity x_2=c_2 for x_3=c_3 with x_1=c_4.
{ve} {canja}

velcki

lujvo
x_1 is an explanation of x_2 (event/state/property) to x_3 by x_4.
Cf. {ciksi}.

velcli

lujvo
x1 is a learning source for learning x2 (du'u) about subject x3 for learner x4 by method x5

velcradyjunla

lujvo
j_1=c_4 is a radio clock receiving the time from broadcaster/radio transmitter c_1.

veldilcu

lujvo
x_1 is the division-remainder of "x_2/x_3" with quotient x_4 // x_1 = x_2 modulo x_3
"x_1 == x_2 % x_3" in many programming languages.

velfi'i

lujvo
x_1 is the inspiration for creating x_2 for purpose x_3 by creator x_4
= {ve} {finti}. See {vozyfi'i}, {vefi'e}

veljbe

lujvo
j_4 is the birthplace, the parent(s) being j_2, the birthdate being j_3, of j_1.
Cf. {jbena}.

veljvo

lujvo
x_1 is a metaphor [of affix compound] with meaning [of affix compound] x_2 with argument [of affix compound] x_3 with affix compound x_4; x_1 is the tanru/metaphor construct of complex word/affix compound/lujvo x_4
x4 is a compound word that is composed of various morphological/lexical "parts" that represents the underlying tanru/construct x1. Since this word is language-independent, the metaphor construct need not be successively-binary, as it is in Lojban. x1 is the tanru construct that underlies/is used to interpret/analyze/"break apart" lujvo x4.

velkakpa

lujvo
x_1 is a digging limb/tool for digging material x_2 up/out of x_3 (source/hole) with agent x_4.
Cf. {canpa}.

velkakpymru

lujvo
m_1=k_4 is a pickaxe for digging up/hitting m_2 [target] consisting of head m_3 propelled by m_4.
Cf. {kakpa}, {mruli}.

velkla

lujvo
x_1=k_4 is a route that leads to x_2=k_2, from x_3=k_3, travelled by x_4=k_1 by means x_5=k_5.

velmresri

lujvo
d_1 is a measuring tape made out of material d_2, measuring on scale m_4 (si'o).
Cf. {merli}, {dasri}.

velripyzbe

lujvo
z_1 is an abutment of one of the ends z_2=c_4 of the bridge span of the bridge c_1, and is of material z_3.

velski

lujvo
s_4 is a description of s_2 to audience s_3 by describer s_1.
Cf. {pinka}, {selsku}, {pixra}.

velsku

lujvo
x_1 is the expression medium of expression x_2 addressed to audience x_3 by speaker x_4

velsudu

fu'ivla
x_1 has a speed of x_2 space units covered in x_3 time period; x_1 has the magnitude of velocity measured by x_2 (space units) traversed in time x_3 (event)
Directional component is expressed using {fa'a} or {seka'a}. See also {sutra}, {tcelerita}.

veltcika

lujvo
x_1 is the time zone where x_2 happens on day x_3 at time x_4.

veltcikybi'a

lujvo
x_1 is jetlagged with symptoms x_2 going to x_3 from x_4.

veltivjoividni

lujvo
x_1 is a TV/television set/telly with screen/monitor x_2=v_1 and television receiver x_3=t_4.
Synonymous to {ti'ivni}. See also television screen (={tivyvidni}).

velventerzu'e

lujvo
z_3=v_4 is the sales quota for v_1=z_1 to sell v_2 to v_3.
Cf. {vecnu}, {zukte}, {vencu'u}, {cumnunve'u}.

velve'u

lujvo
x_1 is the sales price of x_2 to x_3 from/at vendor x_4.

velvi'u

lujvo
v_1 is the result/remnant/remainder when v_2 is removed/subtracted/deducted/taken away from v_3 by v_4.
Cf. {vimcu}.

velylumxu'i

lujvo
xu_1=l_4 is an instance of detergent xu_2, with purity xu_3.
See also: {ve}, {lumci}, {xukmi}.

vemau

cmavo-compound
BAI*
zmadu modal, 4th place (relative!) more than/exceeding by amount ...

veme'a

cmavo-compound
BAI*
mleca modal, 4th place (relative!) less than by amount ...

venci'e

lujvo
c_1 is a market (system) interrelated by structure c_2 (social relations / institutions / procedures / infrastructures) of components c_3=v_2 (goods/services/information) displaying c_4 (economy).

vencu'u

lujvo
c_1 is/are the sales function/activities of c_2=v_1 selling v_2 to v_3; c_1 is sales.
Cf. {vecnu}, {cuntu}, {selvensro}, {janta}, {faircu'u}, {zbacu'u}.

vendeta

fu'ivla
x_1 is a vendetta against x_2 for wrong x_3 with vengeance x_4
See {venfu}

venfu

gismu
-vef-
x_1 takes revenge on/retaliates against x_2 (person) for wrong x_3 (nu) with vengeance x_4 (nu).
Also avenge; (adjective:) x_1 is vengeful. See also {sfasa}, {cnemu}.

vensa

gismu
-ves-
x_1 is spring/springtime [warming season] of year x_2 at location x_3; (adjective:) x_1 is vernal.
See also {citsi}, {crisa}, {critu}, {dunra}.

vente

experimental gismu
x_1 is the ventral part of body x_2
Opposite of dorsum. Not necessarily should be the frontal part of the body. See also {bekpi}, {betfu}, {flira}

ventile

fu'ivla
x_1 is a valve

venvei

lujvo
x_1=vr_1 is a record of x_2=ve_1 [seller] having sold x_3=ve_2 [goods/service/commodity] to buyer x_4=ve_3 for amount/cost/expense x_5=ve_4, stored on medium x_6=vr_4.
Cf. {vecnu}, {vreji}

venxa'a

lujvo
x_1 is a mailer about v_2 from x_3=v_1 for audience x_2=v_3.
Cf. {vecnu}, {xatra}, {cuntu}, {zaircu'u}, {zairsnucu'u}, {venynoicu'u}, {venxatrycu'u}, {zacfoncu'u}, {faircu'u}, {vencu'u}.

venxatrycu'u

lujvo
c_1 the direct mail business/activity/function for goods/products/services/activities v_2 from/by x_3=v_1 to audience x_2=v_3.
Cf. {vecnu}, {xatra}, {cuntu}, {zaircu'u}, {zairsnucu'u}, {venynoicu'u}, {venxa'a}, {zacfoncu'u}, {faircu'u}, {vencu'u}.

venynoi

lujvo
n_1 is an advertisement about n_2=v_2 by n_3=v_1 to intended audience n_4=v_3.
Cf. {vecnu}, {notci}, {venynoicu'u}, {zairsnucu'u}, {karni}, {cradi}, {tivni}.

venynoicu'u

lujvo
c_1 the advertising business/activity/function about goods/products/services/activities n_2=v_2 from/by n_2=v_1 to audience n_4=v_3.
Cf. {vecnu}, {notci}, {cuntu}, {venynoi}, {zaircu'u}, {zairsnucu'u}, {venxatrycu'u}, {zacfoncu'u}, {faircu'u}, {vencu'u}.

venzmi

lujvo
z_1 is a vending machine offering v_2 to v_3 for sale cost v_4 under condition z_3.

venzula

fu'ivla
x_1 reflects culture/nationality/language/geography of Venezuela in aspect x_2

ve'o

cmavo
VEhO
right mathematical bracket.

vepa'a

cmavo-compound
BAI*
panra modal, 4nd place (standard/geometry) similarly; similar by standard ...

vepre

experimental gismu
x_1 is a non-binary-gendered/intersex/asexual/nongendered/transgendered and immature/young person of age x_2 immature by standard x_3
Word dispreferred in metaphor/example as sexist (use instead {verba}). See also: {nixli}, {nanla}, {verba}, {bersa}, {tixnu}, {nunmu}.

vepu'e

cmavo-compound
BAI*
pruce modal, 4th place (set of stages) passing through processing stages ...

verai

cmavo-compound
BAI*
traji modal, 4th place (set) -est; most extremely; superlative among ...

verba

gismu
-ver-
-ve'a-
x_1 is a child/kid/juvenile [a young person] of age x_2, immature by standard x_3.
Not necessarily human. See also {cifnu}, {makcu}, {citno}, {panzi}, {nanla}, {nixli}, se {rirni}, {bersa}.

verbakni

lujvo
b_1=c_1 is a stirk/yearling [young cattle/beef-producer/bovine], of age n_2, immature/defined as a stirk/yearling by standard n_3, of species/breed b_2.

vercedra

lujvo
c_1 is the childhood (time of being a child) of v_1.
Cf. {cedra}, {verba}, {kamve'a}.

vercka

lujvo
c_1 is a crib made of c_2 for a child c_3=v_1 of age v_2.
not necessarily with bars; see also {slicka}

verclibau

lujvo
b_1=c_3 is a native language of b_2=v_1=c_1 to express b_3.

verku'i

lujvo
x_1 is a take care of with taken care of-child x_2.

verntineidja

fu'ivla
x_1 is a teenager of age x_2.
Refers to humans who are at least 13 years old, but younger than 20 years. See also: {verba}.

versiio

fu'ivla
x_1 is a version of x_2
See {ve} {farvi}, {mupli}

verteba

fu'ivla
x_1 is a vertebra of body or body-part x_2
See also {bongu}, {bekpi}

veslabjvezirspa

lujvo
x_1 is a spring snowflake (Leucojum vernum) of species/strain x_2.

vetai

cmavo-compound
BAI*
tamsmi modal, 4th place similarly; sharing ideal form in property ...
{tamsmi} is x_1 resembles x_2 sharing ideal form/shape x_3 in property x_4

veti'u

cmavo-compound
BAI*
tcika modal, 4th place (for letters) as a time at location ...

ve'u

cmavo
VEhA
location tense interval: a large region of space.

vi

cmavo
-viz-
VA
location tense distance: here at ... ; at or a very short/tiny distance from ...

vi'a

cmavo
VIhA
dimensionality of space interval tense: 2-space interval; throughout an area.

vibgle

lujvo
g_1 (giver) has vaginal sex with g_2=v_2 (receiver).
Cf. {gletu}, {molgle}, {gaxygle}.

vibna

gismu
-vib-
x_1 is a/the vagina [body-part] of x_2.
See also {cinse}, {gletu}, {pinji}, {plibu}, {vlagi}, {mabla}.

vibnrbarpinji

fu'ivla
x_1 is the gynosome/female intermittent sexual organ [body-part] of x_2
This is a penetrative sexual organ used by females (egg-bearers) to penetrate and extract sperm and possibly seminal fluid from sexual partners. It is not a clitoris (as of a vagina into which sperm is injected).

vibykafke

lujvo
k_1=v_2 farts out k_2 [predominantly gaseous] from vagina k_3=v_1.
Cf. {vibna}, {kafke}.

vicma'o

lujvo
x_1 is an eraser word
This corresponds to selma'o SI, SA and SU in Lojban.

vicra'e

lujvo
v_1=r_1 cuts (removes during editing) v_2=r_2 from v_3 leaving v_4.
Cf. {vimcu}, {ralte}, {fukra'e}, {fukpu'i}.

victerlu'i

lujvo
v_2=l_3 is trash/rubbish/garbage/refuse removed from v_3=l_2 by v_1=l_1 (agent)

vidgapci

lujvo
g_1=v_1 is poison gas under conditions g_3.

vidni

gismu
x_1 is a video monitor/CRT/screen [machine] serving function x_2.
See also {skina}, ve {tivni}.

vidnyja'o

lujvo
j_1=v_1 (video monitor/screen) displays j_2 to j_3; j_2 is the display of monitor j_1=v_1 shown to j_3.
Cf. {vidni}, {jarco}, {ekra}.

vidnyselclu

lujvo
x_1=c_2 completely fills the display of monitor/screen x_2=c_1=v_1; x_1=c_2 is “in fullscreen”.
x_1=c_2 is not very specific here. It could refer, for example, to a computer program ({samtci}), a window ({pevyca'o zei uidje}), a movie ({skina}) or something else.

vidnysle

lujvo
s_1 is a pixel of screen s_2=v_1.

vidnyxra

lujvo
p_1 is a screenshot showing p_2, made by p_3 (user), in medium p_4.
Cf. {vidni}, {pixra}.

vidru

gismu
-vir-
x_1 is a virus of species/breed/defining property x_2 capable of infecting [at] x_3.
See also {jurme}.

vidyplin

cmevla
Name: Venus
A {jvocmevo} meaning "{vindu} {plini}", or "toxic planet". Named so because pretty much everything about it seems to be hostile to life. Even Carl Sagan once stated that it is the planet "most like Hell". See also {relplin} {remsol} {stoplin} {remted} {remlur} {xunplin} {balplin} {melplin}.

vi'e

cmavo
VIhA
dimensionality of space interval tense: 4-space interval; throughout a spacetime.

vi'ecpe

lujvo
c_1=v_2 invites c_3=v_1 to v_2 (place/event) in manner c_4.
Cf. {vitke}, {cpedu}, {zvacpe}.

vi'ei'e

experimental cmavo
PA5
digit/number: Lévy-Khinchin constant γ = e^{(π^2)/(12Log_e(2))} ≈ 3.2758…
Some definitions of a constant likewise named are the natural logarithm of this number.

vi'e zei saske

zei-lujvo
x_1=s_1 is a science of physics based on methodlogy x_2=s_3.
The branch of science concerned with the study of properties and interactions of space, time, matter and energy. See {saske}

vifne

gismu
-vif-
(adjective:) x_1 is fresh/unspoiled.
See also {fusra}.

vi'i

cmavo
VIhA
dimensionality of space interval tense: 1-space interval; along a line.

vijblo

lujvo
b_1 is an aircraft carrier carrying b_2, propelled by b_3.
